6577
6578/*
6579 * Function given to ExpandGeneric() to obtain the list of internal
6580 * or user defined function names.
6581 */
6582char_u *get_function_name(expand_T *xp, int idx)
6583{
6584 static int intidx = -1;
6585 char_u *name;
6586
6587 if (idx == 0)
6588 intidx = -1;
6589 if (intidx < 0) {
6590 name = get_user_func_name(xp, idx);
6591 if (name != NULL((void*)0))
6592 return name;
6593 }
6594 if (++intidx < (int)(sizeof(functions) / sizeof(struct fst))) {
6595 STRCPY(IObuff, functions[intidx].f_name)strcpy((char *)(IObuff), (char *)(functions[intidx].f_name));
6596 STRCAT(IObuff, "(")strcat((char *)(IObuff), (char *)("("));
6597 if (functions[intidx].f_max_argc == 0)
6598 STRCAT(IObuff, ")")strcat((char *)(IObuff), (char *)(")"));
6599 return IObuff;
6600 }
6601
6602 return NULL((void*)0);
6603}
6604
6605/*
6606 * Function given to ExpandGeneric() to obtain the list of internal or
6607 * user defined variable or function names.
6608 */
6609char_u *get_expr_name(expand_T *xp, int idx)
6610{
6611 static int intidx = -1;
6612 char_u *name;
6613
6614 if (idx == 0)
6615 intidx = -1;
6616 if (intidx < 0) {
6617 name = get_function_name(xp, idx);
6618 if (name != NULL((void*)0))
6619 return name;
6620 }
6621 return get_user_var_name(xp, ++intidx);
6622}
6623
6624
6625
6626
6627/*
6628 * Find internal function in table above.
6629 * Return index, or -1 if not found
6630 */
6631static int
6632find_internal_func (
6633 char_u *name /* name of the function */
6634)
6635{
6636 int first = 0;
6637 int last = (int)(sizeof(functions) / sizeof(struct fst)) - 1;
6638
6639 /*
6640 * Find the function name in the table. Binary search.
6641 */
6642 while (first <= last) {
6643 int x = first + ((unsigned)(last - first)) / 2;
6644 int cmp = STRCMP(name, functions[x].f_name)strcmp((char *)(name), (char *)(functions[x].f_name));
6645 if (cmp < 0)
6646 last = x - 1;
6647 else if (cmp > 0)
6648 first = x + 1;
6649 else
6650 return x;
6651 }
6652 return -1;
6653}
6654
6655/*
6656 * Check if "name" is a variable of type VAR_FUNC. If so, return the function
6657 * name it contains, otherwise return "name".
6658 */
6659static char_u *deref_func_name(char_u *name, int *lenp, int no_autoload)
6660{
6661 dictitem_T *v;
6662 int cc;
6663
6664 cc = name[*lenp];
6665 name[*lenp] = NUL'\000';
6666 v = find_var(name, NULL((void*)0), no_autoload);
6667 name[*lenp] = cc;
6668 if (v != NULL((void*)0) && v->di_tv.v_type == VAR_FUNC3) {
6669 if (v->di_tv.vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)) {
6670 *lenp = 0;
6671 return (char_u *)""; /* just in case */
6672 }
6673 *lenp = (int)STRLEN(v->di_tv.vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(v->di_tv.vval.v_string));
6674 return v->di_tv.vval.v_string;
6675 }
6676
6677 return name;
6678}
6679
6680/*
6681 * Allocate a variable for the result of a function.
6682 * Return OK or FAIL.
6683 */
6684static int
6685get_func_tv (
6686 char_u *name, /* name of the function */
6687 int len, /* length of "name" */
6688 typval_T *rettv,
6689 char_u **arg, /* argument, pointing to the '(' */
6690 linenr_T firstline, /* first line of range */
6691 linenr_T lastline, /* last line of range */
6692 int *doesrange, /* return: function handled range */
6693 int evaluate,
6694 dict_T *selfdict /* Dictionary for "self" */
6695)
6696{
6697 char_u *argp;
6698 int ret = OK1;
6699 typval_T argvars[MAX_FUNC_ARGS20 + 1]; /* vars for arguments */
6700 int argcount = 0; /* number of arguments found */
6701
6702 /*
6703 * Get the arguments.
6704 */
6705 argp = *arg;
6706 while (argcount < MAX_FUNC_ARGS20) {
6707 argp = skipwhite(argp + 1); /* skip the '(' or ',' */
6708 if (*argp == ')' || *argp == ',' || *argp == NUL'\000')
6709 break;
6710 if (eval1(&argp, &argvars[argcount], evaluate) == FAIL0) {
6711 ret = FAIL0;
6712 break;
6713 }
6714 ++argcount;
6715 if (*argp != ',')
6716 break;
6717 }
6718 if (*argp == ')')
6719 ++argp;
6720 else
6721 ret = FAIL0;
6722
6723 if (ret == OK1)
6724 ret = call_func(name, len, rettv, argcount, argvars,
6725 firstline, lastline, doesrange, evaluate, selfdict);
6726 else if (!aborting()) {
6727 if (argcount == MAX_FUNC_ARGS20)
6728 emsg_funcname(N_("E740: Too many arguments for function %s")"E740: Too many arguments for function %s", name);
6729 else
6730 emsg_funcname(N_("E116: Invalid arguments for function %s")"E116: Invalid arguments for function %s", name);
6731 }
6732
6733 while (--argcount >= 0)
6734 clear_tv(&argvars[argcount]);
6735
6736 *arg = skipwhite(argp);
6737 return ret;
6738}
6739
6740
6741/*
6742 * Call a function with its resolved parameters
6743 * Return FAIL when the function can't be called, OK otherwise.
6744 * Also returns OK when an error was encountered while executing the function.
6745 */
6746static int
6747call_func (
6748 char_u *funcname, /* name of the function */
6749 int len, /* length of "name" */
6750 typval_T *rettv, /* return value goes here */
6751 int argcount, /* number of "argvars" */
6752 typval_T *argvars, /* vars for arguments, must have "argcount"
6753 PLUS ONE elements! */
6754 linenr_T firstline, /* first line of range */
6755 linenr_T lastline, /* last line of range */
6756 int *doesrange, /* return: function handled range */
6757 int evaluate,
6758 dict_T *selfdict /* Dictionary for "self" */
6759)
6760{
6761 int ret = FAIL0;
6762#define ERROR_UNKNOWN0 0
6763#define ERROR_TOOMANY1 1
6764#define ERROR_TOOFEW2 2
6765#define ERROR_SCRIPT3 3
6766#define ERROR_DICT4 4
6767#define ERROR_NONE5 5
6768#define ERROR_OTHER6 6
6769 int error = ERROR_NONE5;
6770 int i;
6771 int llen;
6772 ufunc_T *fp;
6773#define FLEN_FIXED40 40
6774 char_u fname_buf[FLEN_FIXED40 + 1];
6775 char_u *fname;
6776 char_u *name;
6777
6778 /* Make a copy of the name, if it comes from a funcref variable it could
6779 * be changed or deleted in the called function. */
6780 name = vim_strnsave(funcname, len);
6781
6782 /*
6783 * In a script change <SID>name() and s:name() to K_SNR 123_name().
6784 * Change <SNR>123_name() to K_SNR 123_name().
6785 * Use fname_buf[] when it fits, otherwise allocate memory (slow).
6786 */
6787 llen = eval_fname_script(name);
6788 if (llen > 0) {
6789 fname_buf[0] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
6790 fname_buf[1] = KS_EXTRA253;
6791 fname_buf[2] = (int)KE_SNR;
6792 i = 3;
6793 if (eval_fname_sid(name)) { /* "<SID>" or "s:" */
6794 if (current_SID <= 0)
6795 error = ERROR_SCRIPT3;
6796 else {
6797 sprintf((char *)fname_buf + 3, "%" PRId64"l" "d" "_", (int64_t)current_SID);
6798 i = (int)STRLEN(fname_buf)strlen((char *)(fname_buf));
6799 }
6800 }
6801 if (i + STRLEN(name + llen)strlen((char *)(name + llen)) < FLEN_FIXED40) {
6802 STRCPY(fname_buf + i, name + llen)strcpy((char *)(fname_buf + i), (char *)(name + llen));
6803 fname = fname_buf;
6804 } else {
6805 fname = xmalloc(i + STRLEN(name + llen)strlen((char *)(name + llen)) + 1);
6806 memmove(fname, fname_buf, (size_t)i);
6807 STRCPY(fname + i, name + llen)strcpy((char *)(fname + i), (char *)(name + llen));
6808 }
6809 } else
6810 fname = name;
6811
6812 *doesrange = FALSE0;
6813
6814
6815 /* execute the function if no errors detected and executing */
6816 if (evaluate && error == ERROR_NONE5) {
6817 char_u *rfname = fname;
6818
6819 /* Ignore "g:" before a function name. */
6820 if (fname[0] == 'g' && fname[1] == ':') {
6821 rfname = fname + 2;
6822 }
6823
6824 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1; /* default rettv is number zero */
6825 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
6826 error = ERROR_UNKNOWN0;
6827
6828 if (!builtin_function(rfname, -1)) {
6829 /*
6830 * User defined function.
6831 */
6832 fp = find_func(rfname);
6833
6834 /* Trigger FuncUndefined event, may load the function. */
6835 if (fp == NULL((void*)0)
6836 && apply_autocmds(EVENT_FUNCUNDEFINED, rfname, rfname, TRUE1, NULL((void*)0))
6837 && !aborting()) {
6838 /* executed an autocommand, search for the function again */
6839 fp = find_func(rfname);
6840 }
6841 /* Try loading a package. */
6842 if (fp == NULL((void*)0) && script_autoload(rfname, TRUE1) && !aborting()) {
6843 /* loaded a package, search for the function again */
6844 fp = find_func(rfname);
6845 }
6846
6847 if (fp != NULL((void*)0)) {
6848 if (fp->uf_flags & FC_RANGE2)
6849 *doesrange = TRUE1;
6850 if (argcount < fp->uf_args.ga_len)
6851 error = ERROR_TOOFEW2;
6852 else if (!fp->uf_varargs && argcount > fp->uf_args.ga_len)
6853 error = ERROR_TOOMANY1;
6854 else if ((fp->uf_flags & FC_DICT4) && selfdict == NULL((void*)0))
6855 error = ERROR_DICT4;
6856 else {
6857 /*
6858 * Call the user function.
6859 * Save and restore search patterns, script variables and
6860 * redo buffer.
6861 */
6862 save_search_patterns();
6863 saveRedobuff();
6864 ++fp->uf_calls;
6865 call_user_func(fp, argcount, argvars, rettv,
6866 firstline, lastline,
6867 (fp->uf_flags & FC_DICT4) ? selfdict : NULL((void*)0));
6868 if (--fp->uf_calls <= 0 && isdigit(*fp->uf_name)((*__ctype_b_loc ())[(int) ((*fp->uf_name))] & (unsigned
short int) _ISdigit)
6869 && fp->uf_refcount <= 0)
6870 /* Function was unreferenced while being used, free it
6871 * now. */
6872 func_free(fp);
6873 restoreRedobuff();
6874 restore_search_patterns();
6875 error = ERROR_NONE5;
6876 }
6877 }
6878 } else {
6879 /*
6880 * Find the function name in the table, call its implementation.
6881 */
6882 i = find_internal_func(fname);
6883 if (i >= 0) {
6884 if (argcount < functions[i].f_min_argc)
6885 error = ERROR_TOOFEW2;
6886 else if (argcount > functions[i].f_max_argc)
6887 error = ERROR_TOOMANY1;
6888 else {
6889 argvars[argcount].v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0;
6890 functions[i].f_func(argvars, rettv);
6891 error = ERROR_NONE5;
6892 }
6893 }
6894 }
6895 /*
6896 * The function call (or "FuncUndefined" autocommand sequence) might
6897 * have been aborted by an error, an interrupt, or an explicitly thrown
6898 * exception that has not been caught so far. This situation can be
6899 * tested for by calling aborting(). For an error in an internal
6900 * function or for the "E132" error in call_user_func(), however, the
6901 * throw point at which the "force_abort" flag (temporarily reset by
6902 * emsg()) is normally updated has not been reached yet. We need to
6903 * update that flag first to make aborting() reliable.
6904 */
6905 update_force_abort();
6906 }
6907 if (error == ERROR_NONE5)
6908 ret = OK1;
6909
6910 /*
6911 * Report an error unless the argument evaluation or function call has been
6912 * cancelled due to an aborting error, an interrupt, or an exception.
6913 */
6914 if (!aborting()) {
6915 switch (error) {
6916 case ERROR_UNKNOWN0:
6917 emsg_funcname(N_("E117: Unknown function: %s")"E117: Unknown function: %s", name);
6918 break;
6919 case ERROR_TOOMANY1:
6920 emsg_funcname(e_toomanyarg, name);
6921 break;
6922 case ERROR_TOOFEW2:
6923 emsg_funcname(N_("E119: Not enough arguments for function: %s")"E119: Not enough arguments for function: %s",
6924 name);
6925 break;
6926 case ERROR_SCRIPT3:
6927 emsg_funcname(N_("E120: Using <SID> not in a script context: %s")"E120: Using <SID> not in a script context: %s",
6928 name);
6929 break;
6930 case ERROR_DICT4:
6931 emsg_funcname(N_("E725: Calling dict function without Dictionary: %s")"E725: Calling dict function without Dictionary: %s",
6932 name);
6933 break;
6934 }
6935 }
6936
6937 if (fname != name && fname != fname_buf)
6938 free(fname);
6939 free(name);
6940
6941 return ret;
6942}
6943
6944/*
6945 * Give an error message with a function name. Handle <SNR> things.
6946 * "ermsg" is to be passed without translation, use N_() instead of _().
6947 */
6948static void emsg_funcname(char *ermsg, char_u *name)
6949{
6950 char_u *p;
6951
6952 if (*name == K_SPECIAL(0x80))
6953 p = concat_str((char_u *)"<SNR>", name + 3);
6954 else
6955 p = name;
6956 EMSG2(_(ermsg), p)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(ermsg))), (char_u *)(p));
6957 if (p != name)
6958 free(p);
6959}
6960
6961/*
6962 * Return TRUE for a non-zero Number and a non-empty String.
6963 */
6964static int non_zero_arg(typval_T *argvars)
6965{
6966 return (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1
6967 && argvars[0].vval.v_number != 0)
6968 || (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_STRING2
6969 && argvars[0].vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)
6970 && *argvars[0].vval.v_string != NUL'\000');
6971}
6972
6973/*********************************************
6974 * Implementation of the built-in functions
6975 */
6976
6977
6978/*
6979 * Get the float value of "argvars[0]" into "f".
6980 * Returns FAIL when the argument is not a Number or Float.
6981 */
6982static int get_float_arg(typval_T *argvars, float_T *f)
6983{
6984 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FLOAT6) {
6985 *f = argvars[0].vval.v_float;
6986 return OK1;
6987 }
6988 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1) {
6989 *f = (float_T)argvars[0].vval.v_number;
6990 return OK1;
6991 }
6992 EMSG(_("E808: Number or Float required"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E808: Number or Float required"
))));
6993 return FAIL0;
6994}
6995
6996/*
6997 * "abs(expr)" function
6998 */
6999static void f_abs(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7000{
7001 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FLOAT6) {
7002 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7003 rettv->vval.v_float = fabs(argvars[0].vval.v_float);
7004 } else {
7005 varnumber_T n;
7006 int error = FALSE0;
7007
7008 n = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error);
7009 if (error)
7010 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7011 else if (n > 0)
7012 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
7013 else
7014 rettv->vval.v_number = -n;
7015 }
7016}
7017
7018/*
7019 * "acos()" function
7020 */
7021static void f_acos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7022{
7023 float_T f;
7024
7025 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7026 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7027 rettv->vval.v_float = acos(f);
7028 else
7029 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7030}
7031
7032/*
7033 * "add(list, item)" function
7034 */
7035static void f_add(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7036{
7037 list_T *l;
7038
7039 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Default: Failed */
7040 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
7041 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
7042 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, (char_u *)_("add() argument")gettext((char *)("add() argument")))) {
7043 list_append_tv(l, &argvars[1]);
7044 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
7045 }
7046 } else
7047 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
7048}
7049
7050/*
7051 * "and(expr, expr)" function
7052 */
7053static void f_and(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7054{
7055 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0))
7056 & get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7057}
7058
7059/*
7060 * "append(lnum, string/list)" function
7061 */
7062static void f_append(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7063{
7064 long lnum;
7065 char_u *line;
7066 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
7067 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
7068 typval_T *tv;
7069 long added = 0;
7070
7071 /* When coming here from Insert mode, sync undo, so that this can be
7072 * undone separately from what was previously inserted. */
7073 if (u_sync_once == 2) {
7074 u_sync_once = 1; /* notify that u_sync() was called */
7075 u_sync(TRUE1);
7076 }
7077
7078 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
7079 if (lnum >= 0
7080 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
7081 && u_save(lnum, lnum + 1) == OK1) {
7082 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
7083 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
7084 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7085 return;
7086 li = l->lv_first;
7087 }
7088 for (;; ) {
7089 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7090 tv = &argvars[1]; /* append a string */
7091 else if (li == NULL((void*)0))
7092 break; /* end of list */
7093 else
7094 tv = &li->li_tv; /* append item from list */
7095 line = get_tv_string_chk(tv);
7096 if (line == NULL((void*)0)) { /* type error */
7097 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
7098 break;
7099 }
7100 ml_append(lnum + added, line, (colnr_T)0, FALSE0);
7101 ++added;
7102 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7103 break;
7104 li = li->li_next;
7105 }
7106
7107 appended_lines_mark(lnum, added);
7108 if (curwin->w_cursor.lnum > lnum)
7109 curwin->w_cursor.lnum += added;
7110 } else
7111 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
7112}
7113
7114/*
7115 * "argc()" function
7116 */
7117static void f_argc(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7118{
7119 rettv->vval.v_number = ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len);
7120}
7121
7122/*
7123 * "argidx()" function
7124 */
7125static void f_argidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7126{
7127 rettv->vval.v_number = curwin->w_arg_idx;
7128}
7129
7130/// "arglistid" function
7131static void f_arglistid(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7132{
7133 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7134 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7135 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
7136 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7137 long n = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
7138 if (n >= 0) {
7139 tp = find_tabpage(n);
7140 }
7141 } else {
7142 tp = curtab;
7143 }
7144
7145 if (tp != NULL((void*)0)) {
7146 win_T *wp = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], tp);
7147 if (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
7148 rettv->vval.v_number = wp->w_alist->id;
7149 }
7150 }
7151 } else {
7152 rettv->vval.v_number = curwin->w_alist->id;
7153 }
7154}
7155
7156/*
7157 * "argv(nr)" function
7158 */
7159static void f_argv(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7160{
7161 int idx;
7162
7163 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7164 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
7165 if (idx >= 0 && idx < ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len))
7166 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(alist_name(&ARGLIST((aentry_T *)(curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_data)[idx]));
7167 else
7168 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
7169 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7170 } else {
7171 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
7172 for (idx = 0; idx < ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len); ++idx) {
7173 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, alist_name(&ARGLIST((aentry_T *)(curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_data)[idx]), -1);
7174 }
7175 }
7176}
7177
7178/*
7179 * "asin()" function
7180 */
7181static void f_asin(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7182{
7183 float_T f;
7184
7185 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7186 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7187 rettv->vval.v_float = asin(f);
7188 else
7189 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7190}
7191
7192/*
7193 * "atan()" function
7194 */
7195static void f_atan(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7196{
7197 float_T f;
7198
7199 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7200 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7201 rettv->vval.v_float = atan(f);
7202 else
7203 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7204}
7205
7206/*
7207 * "atan2()" function
7208 */
7209static void f_atan2(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7210{
7211 float_T fx, fy;
7212
7213 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7214 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &fx) == OK1
7215 && get_float_arg(&argvars[1], &fy) == OK1)
7216 rettv->vval.v_float = atan2(fx, fy);
7217 else
7218 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7219}
7220
7221/*
7222 * "browse(save, title, initdir, default)" function
7223 */
7224static void f_browse(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7225{
7226 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
7227 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7228}
7229
7230/*
7231 * "browsedir(title, initdir)" function
7232 */
7233static void f_browsedir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7234{
7235 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
7236 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7237}
7238
7239
7240/*
7241 * Find a buffer by number or exact name.
7242 */
7243static buf_T *find_buffer(typval_T *avar)
7244{
7245 buf_T *buf = NULL((void*)0);
7246
7247 if (avar->v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
7248 buf = buflist_findnr((int)avar->vval.v_number);
7249 else if (avar->v_type == VAR_STRING2 && avar->vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)) {
7250 buf = buflist_findname_exp(avar->vval.v_string);
7251 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
7252 /* No full path name match, try a match with a URL or a "nofile"
7253 * buffer, these don't use the full path. */
7254 FOR_ALL_BUFFERS(bp)for (buf_T *bp = firstbuf; bp != ((void*)0); bp = bp->b_next
) {
7255 if (bp->b_fname != NULL((void*)0)
7256 && (path_with_url(bp->b_fname)
7257 || bt_nofile(bp)
7258 )
7259 && STRCMP(bp->b_fname, avar->vval.v_string)strcmp((char *)(bp->b_fname), (char *)(avar->vval.v_string
)) == 0) {
7260 buf = bp;
7261 break;
7262 }
7263 }
7264 }
7265 }
7266 return buf;
7267}
7268
7269/*
7270 * "bufexists(expr)" function
7271 */
7272static void f_bufexists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7273{
7274 rettv->vval.v_number = (find_buffer(&argvars[0]) != NULL((void*)0));
7275}
7276
7277/*
7278 * "buflisted(expr)" function
7279 */
7280static void f_buflisted(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7281{
7282 buf_T *buf;
7283
7284 buf = find_buffer(&argvars[0]);
7285 rettv->vval.v_number = (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_p_bl);
7286}
7287
7288/*
7289 * "bufloaded(expr)" function
7290 */
7291static void f_bufloaded(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7292{
7293 buf_T *buf;
7294
7295 buf = find_buffer(&argvars[0]);
7296 rettv->vval.v_number = (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_ml.ml_mfp != NULL((void*)0));
7297}
7298
7299
7300/*
7301 * Get buffer by number or pattern.
7302 */
7303static buf_T *get_buf_tv(typval_T *tv, int curtab_only)
7304{
7305 char_u *name = tv->vval.v_string;
7306 int save_magic;
7307 char_u *save_cpo;
7308 buf_T *buf;
7309
7310 if (tv->v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
7311 return buflist_findnr((int)tv->vval.v_number);
7312 if (tv->v_type != VAR_STRING2)
7313 return NULL((void*)0);
7314 if (name == NULL((void*)0) || *name == NUL'\000')
7315 return curbuf;
7316 if (name[0] == '$' && name[1] == NUL'\000')
7317 return lastbuf;
7318
7319 /* Ignore 'magic' and 'cpoptions' here to make scripts portable */
7320 save_magic = p_magic;
7321 p_magic = TRUE1;
7322 save_cpo = p_cpo;
7323 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
7324
7325 buf = buflist_findnr(buflist_findpat(name, name + STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)),
7326 TRUE1, FALSE0, curtab_only));
7327
7328 p_magic = save_magic;
7329 p_cpo = save_cpo;
7330
7331 /* If not found, try expanding the name, like done for bufexists(). */
7332 if (buf == NULL((void*)0))
7333 buf = find_buffer(tv);
7334
7335 return buf;
7336}
7337
7338/*
7339 * "bufname(expr)" function
7340 */
7341static void f_bufname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7342{
7343 buf_T *buf;
7344
7345 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
7346 ++emsg_off;
7347 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
7348 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7349 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_fname != NULL((void*)0))
7350 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf->b_fname);
7351 else
7352 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
7353 --emsg_off;
7354}
7355
7356/*
7357 * "bufnr(expr)" function
7358 */
7359static void f_bufnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7360{
7361 buf_T *buf;
7362 int error = FALSE0;
7363 char_u *name;
7364
7365 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
7366 ++emsg_off;
7367 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
7368 --emsg_off;
7369
7370 /* If the buffer isn't found and the second argument is not zero create a
7371 * new buffer. */
7372 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)
7373 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
7374 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error) != 0
7375 && !error
7376 && (name = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0])) != NULL((void*)0)
7377 && !error)
7378 buf = buflist_new(name, NULL((void*)0), (linenr_T)1, 0);
7379
7380 if (buf != NULL((void*)0))
7381 rettv->vval.v_number = buf->b_fnum;
7382 else
7383 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7384}
7385
7386/*
7387 * "bufwinnr(nr)" function
7388 */
7389static void f_bufwinnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7390{
7391 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
7392 ++emsg_off;
7393
7394 buf_T *buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], TRUE1);
7395 int winnr = 0;
7396 bool_Bool found_buf = false0;
7397 FOR_ALL_WINDOWS(wp)for (win_T *wp = firstwin; wp != ((void*)0); wp = wp->w_next
) {
7398 ++winnr;
7399 if (wp->w_buffer == buf) {
7400 found_buf = true1;
7401 break;
7402 }
7403 }
7404 rettv->vval.v_number = (found_buf ? winnr : -1);
7405 --emsg_off;
7406}
7407
7408/*
7409 * "byte2line(byte)" function
7410 */
7411static void f_byte2line(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7412{
7413 long boff = 0;
7414
7415 boff = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) - 1; /* boff gets -1 on type error */
7416 if (boff < 0)
7417 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7418 else
7419 rettv->vval.v_number = ml_find_line_or_offset(curbuf,
7420 (linenr_T)0, &boff);
7421}
7422
7423static void byteidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int comp)
7424{
7425 char_u *t;
7426 char_u *str;
7427 long idx;
7428
7429 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
7430 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7431 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7432 if (str == NULL((void*)0) || idx < 0)
7433 return;
7434
7435 t = str;
7436 for (; idx > 0; idx--) {
7437 if (*t == NUL'\000') /* EOL reached */
7438 return;
7439 if (enc_utf8 && comp)
7440 t += utf_ptr2len(t);
7441 else
7442 t += (*mb_ptr2len)(t);
7443 }
7444 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(t - str);
7445}
7446
7447/*
7448 * "byteidx()" function
7449 */
7450static void f_byteidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7451{
7452 byteidx(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
7453}
7454
7455/*
7456 * "byteidxcomp()" function
7457 */
7458static void f_byteidxcomp(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7459{
7460 byteidx(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
7461}
7462
7463int func_call(char_u *name, typval_T *args, dict_T *selfdict, typval_T *rettv)
7464{
7465 listitem_T *item;
7466 typval_T argv[MAX_FUNC_ARGS20 + 1];
7467 int argc = 0;
7468 int dummy;
7469 int r = 0;
7470
7471 for (item = args->vval.v_list->lv_first; item != NULL((void*)0);
7472 item = item->li_next) {
7473 if (argc == MAX_FUNC_ARGS20) {
7474 EMSG(_("E699: Too many arguments"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E699: Too many arguments"))
));
7475 break;
7476 }
7477 /* Make a copy of each argument. This is needed to be able to set
7478 * v_lock to VAR_FIXED in the copy without changing the original list.
7479 */
7480 copy_tv(&item->li_tv, &argv[argc++]);
7481 }
7482
7483 if (item == NULL((void*)0))
7484 r = call_func(name, (int)STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)), rettv, argc, argv,
7485 curwin->w_cursor.lnum, curwin->w_cursor.lnum,
7486 &dummy, TRUE1, selfdict);
7487
7488 /* Free the arguments. */
7489 while (argc > 0)
7490 clear_tv(&argv[--argc]);
7491
7492 return r;
7493}
7494
7495/*
7496 * "call(func, arglist)" function
7497 */
7498static void f_call(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7499{
7500 char_u *func;
7501 dict_T *selfdict = NULL((void*)0);
7502
7503 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
7504 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
7505 return;
7506 }
7507 if (argvars[1].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0))
7508 return;
7509
7510 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FUNC3)
7511 func = argvars[0].vval.v_string;
7512 else
7513 func = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
7514 if (*func == NUL'\000')
7515 return; /* type error or empty name */
7516
7517 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7518 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
7519 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
7520 return;
7521 }
7522 selfdict = argvars[2].vval.v_dict;
7523 }
7524
7525 (void)func_call(func, &argvars[1], selfdict, rettv);
7526}
7527
7528/*
7529 * "ceil({float})" function
7530 */
7531static void f_ceil(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7532{
7533 float_T f;
7534
7535 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7536 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7537 rettv->vval.v_float = ceil(f);
7538 else
7539 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7540}
7541
7542/*
7543 * "changenr()" function
7544 */
7545static void f_changenr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7546{
7547 rettv->vval.v_number = curbuf->b_u_seq_cur;
7548}
7549
7550/*
7551 * "char2nr(string)" function
7552 */
7553static void f_char2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7554{
7555 if (has_mbyte) {
7556 int utf8 = 0;
7557
7558 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
7559 utf8 = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7560
7561 if (utf8)
7562 rettv->vval.v_number = (*utf_ptr2char)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
7563 else
7564 rettv->vval.v_number = (*mb_ptr2char)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
7565 } else
7566 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_string(&argvars[0])[0];
7567}
7568
7569/*
7570 * "cindent(lnum)" function
7571 */
7572static void f_cindent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7573{
7574 pos_T pos;
7575 linenr_T lnum;
7576
7577 pos = curwin->w_cursor;
7578 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
7579 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
7580 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = lnum;
7581 rettv->vval.v_number = get_c_indent();
7582 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
7583 } else
7584 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7585}
7586
7587/*
7588 * "clearmatches()" function
7589 */
7590static void f_clearmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7591{
7592 clear_matches(curwin);
7593}
7594
7595/*
7596 * "col(string)" function
7597 */
7598static void f_col(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7599{
7600 colnr_T col = 0;
7601 pos_T *fp;
7602 int fnum = curbuf->b_fnum;
7603
7604 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], FALSE0, &fnum);
7605 if (fp != NULL((void*)0) && fnum == curbuf->b_fnum) {
7606 if (fp->col == MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL)) {
7607 /* '> can be MAXCOL, get the length of the line then */
7608 if (fp->lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
7609 col = (colnr_T)STRLEN(ml_get(fp->lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(fp->lnum))) + 1;
7610 else
7611 col = MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL);
7612 } else {
7613 col = fp->col + 1;
7614 /* col(".") when the cursor is on the NUL at the end of the line
7615 * because of "coladd" can be seen as an extra column. */
7616 if (virtual_active() && fp == &curwin->w_cursor) {
7617 char_u *p = get_cursor_pos_ptr();
7618
7619 if (curwin->w_cursor.coladd >= (colnr_T)chartabsize(p,
7620 curwin->w_virtcol - curwin->w_cursor.coladd)) {
7621 int l;
7622
7623 if (*p != NUL'\000' && p[(l = (*mb_ptr2len)(p))] == NUL'\000')
7624 col += l;
7625 }
7626 }
7627 }
7628 }
7629 rettv->vval.v_number = col;
7630}
7631
7632/*
7633 * "complete()" function
7634 */
7635static void f_complete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7636{
7637 int startcol;
7638
7639 if ((State & INSERT0x10) == 0) {
7640 EMSG(_("E785: complete() can only be used in Insert mode"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E785: complete() can only be used in Insert mode"
))));
7641 return;
7642 }
7643
7644 /* Check for undo allowed here, because if something was already inserted
7645 * the line was already saved for undo and this check isn't done. */
7646 if (!undo_allowed())
7647 return;
7648
7649 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4 || argvars[1].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
7650 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
7651 return;
7652 }
7653
7654 startcol = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
7655 if (startcol <= 0)
7656 return;
7657
7658 set_completion(startcol - 1, argvars[1].vval.v_list);
7659}
7660
7661/*
7662 * "complete_add()" function
7663 */
7664static void f_complete_add(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7665{
7666 rettv->vval.v_number = ins_compl_add_tv(&argvars[0], 0);
7667}
7668
7669/*
7670 * "complete_check()" function
7671 */
7672static void f_complete_check(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7673{
7674 int saved = RedrawingDisabled;
7675
7676 RedrawingDisabled = 0;
7677 ins_compl_check_keys(0);
7678 rettv->vval.v_number = compl_interrupted;
7679 RedrawingDisabled = saved;
7680}
7681
7682/*
7683 * "confirm(message, buttons[, default [, type]])" function
7684 */
7685static void f_confirm(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7686{
7687 char_u *message;
7688 char_u *buttons = NULL((void*)0);
7689 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
7690 char_u buf2[NUMBUFLEN30];
7691 int def = 1;
7692 int type = VIM_GENERIC0;
7693 char_u *typestr;
7694 int error = FALSE0;
7695
7696 message = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
7697 if (message == NULL((void*)0))
7698 error = TRUE1;
7699 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7700 buttons = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
7701 if (buttons == NULL((void*)0))
7702 error = TRUE1;
7703 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7704 def = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
7705 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7706 typestr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[3], buf2);
7707 if (typestr == NULL((void*)0))
7708 error = TRUE1;
7709 else {
7710 switch (TOUPPER_ASC(*typestr)(((*typestr) < 'a' || (*typestr) > 'z') ? (*typestr) : (
*typestr) - ('a' - 'A'))) {
7711 case 'E': type = VIM_ERROR1; break;
7712 case 'Q': type = VIM_QUESTION4; break;
7713 case 'I': type = VIM_INFO3; break;
7714 case 'W': type = VIM_WARNING2; break;
7715 case 'G': type = VIM_GENERIC0; break;
7716 }
7717 }
7718 }
7719 }
7720 }
7721
7722 if (buttons == NULL((void*)0) || *buttons == NUL'\000')
7723 buttons = (char_u *)_("&Ok")gettext((char *)("&Ok"));
7724
7725 if (!error)
7726 rettv->vval.v_number = do_dialog(type, NULL((void*)0), message, buttons,
7727 def, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
7728}
7729
7730/*
7731 * "copy()" function
7732 */
7733static void f_copy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7734{
7735 item_copy(&argvars[0], rettv, FALSE0, 0);
7736}
7737
7738/*
7739 * "cos()" function
7740 */
7741static void f_cos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7742{
7743 float_T f;
7744
7745 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7746 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7747 rettv->vval.v_float = cos(f);
7748 else
7749 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7750}
7751
7752/*
7753 * "cosh()" function
7754 */
7755static void f_cosh(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7756{
7757 float_T f;
7758
7759 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7760 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
7761 rettv->vval.v_float = cosh(f);
7762 else
7763 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7764}
7765
7766/*
7767 * "count()" function
7768 */
7769static void f_count(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7770{
7771 long n = 0;
7772 int ic = FALSE0;
7773
7774 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
7775 listitem_T *li;
7776 list_T *l;
7777 long idx;
7778
7779 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
7780 li = l->lv_first;
7781 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7782 int error = FALSE0;
7783
7784 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
7785 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7786 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
7787 if (!error) {
7788 li = list_find(l, idx);
7789 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
7790 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), idx)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(idx
));
7791 }
7792 }
7793 if (error)
7794 li = NULL((void*)0);
7795 }
7796
7797 for (; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next)
7798 if (tv_equal(&li->li_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0))
7799 ++n;
7800 }
7801 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
7802 int todo;
7803 dict_T *d;
7804 hashitem_T *hi;
7805
7806 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)) {
7807 int error = FALSE0;
7808
7809 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7810 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
7811 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
7812 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
7813 }
7814
7815 todo = error ? 0 : (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
7816 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
7817 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
7818 --todo;
7819 if (tv_equal(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)&
dumdi)))->di_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0))
7820 ++n;
7821 }
7822 }
7823 }
7824 } else
7825 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "count()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("count()"));
7826 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
7827}
7828
7829/*
7830 * "cscope_connection([{num} , {dbpath} [, {prepend}]])" function
7831 *
7832 * Checks the existence of a cscope connection.
7833 */
7834static void f_cscope_connection(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7835{
7836 int num = 0;
7837 char_u *dbpath = NULL((void*)0);
7838 char_u *prepend = NULL((void*)0);
7839 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
7840
7841 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
7842 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7843 num = (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
7844 dbpath = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
7845 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
7846 prepend = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], buf);
7847 }
7848
7849 rettv->vval.v_number = cs_connection(num, dbpath, prepend);
7850}
7851
7852/*
7853 * "cursor(lnum, col)" function
7854 *
7855 * Moves the cursor to the specified line and column.
7856 * Returns 0 when the position could be set, -1 otherwise.
7857 */
7858static void f_cursor(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7859{
7860 long line, col;
7861 long coladd = 0;
7862
7863 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7864 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7865 pos_T pos;
7866
7867 if (list2fpos(argvars, &pos, NULL((void*)0)) == FAIL0)
7868 return;
7869 line = pos.lnum;
7870 col = pos.col;
7871 coladd = pos.coladd;
7872 } else {
7873 line = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
7874 col = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7875 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
7876 coladd = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
7877 }
7878 if (line < 0 || col < 0
7879 || coladd < 0
7880 )
7881 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
7882 if (line > 0)
7883 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = line;
7884 if (col > 0)
7885 curwin->w_cursor.col = col - 1;
7886 curwin->w_cursor.coladd = coladd;
7887
7888 /* Make sure the cursor is in a valid position. */
7889 check_cursor();
7890 /* Correct cursor for multi-byte character. */
7891 if (has_mbyte)
7892 mb_adjust_cursor();
7893
7894 curwin->w_set_curswant = TRUE1;
7895 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
7896}
7897
7898/*
7899 * "deepcopy()" function
7900 */
7901static void f_deepcopy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7902{
7903 int noref = 0;
7904
7905 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
7906 noref = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7907 if (noref < 0 || noref > 1)
7908 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
7909 else {
7910 current_copyID += COPYID_INC2;
7911 item_copy(&argvars[0], rettv, TRUE1, noref == 0 ? current_copyID : 0);
7912 }
7913}
7914
7915/*
7916 * "delete()" function
7917 */
7918static void f_delete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7919{
7920 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
7921 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7922 else
7923 rettv->vval.v_number = os_remove((char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
7924}
7925
7926/*
7927 * "did_filetype()" function
7928 */
7929static void f_did_filetype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7930{
7931 rettv->vval.v_number = did_filetype;
7932}
7933
7934/*
7935 * "diff_filler()" function
7936 */
7937static void f_diff_filler(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7938{
7939 rettv->vval.v_number = diff_check_fill(curwin, get_tv_lnum(argvars));
7940}
7941
7942/*
7943 * "diff_hlID()" function
7944 */
7945static void f_diff_hlID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7946{
7947 linenr_T lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
7948 static linenr_T prev_lnum = 0;
7949 static int changedtick = 0;
7950 static int fnum = 0;
7951 static int change_start = 0;
7952 static int change_end = 0;
7953 static hlf_T hlID = (hlf_T)0;
7954 int filler_lines;
7955 int col;
7956
7957 if (lnum < 0) /* ignore type error in {lnum} arg */
7958 lnum = 0;
7959 if (lnum != prev_lnum
7960 || changedtick != curbuf->b_changedtick
7961 || fnum != curbuf->b_fnum) {
7962 /* New line, buffer, change: need to get the values. */
7963 filler_lines = diff_check(curwin, lnum);
7964 if (filler_lines < 0) {
7965 if (filler_lines == -1) {
7966 change_start = MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL);
7967 change_end = -1;
7968 if (diff_find_change(curwin, lnum, &change_start, &change_end))
7969 hlID = HLF_ADD; /* added line */
7970 else
7971 hlID = HLF_CHD; /* changed line */
7972 } else
7973 hlID = HLF_ADD; /* added line */
7974 } else
7975 hlID = (hlf_T)0;
7976 prev_lnum = lnum;
7977 changedtick = curbuf->b_changedtick;
7978 fnum = curbuf->b_fnum;
7979 }
7980
7981 if (hlID == HLF_CHD || hlID == HLF_TXD) {
7982 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* ignore type error in {col} */
7983 if (col >= change_start && col <= change_end)
7984 hlID = HLF_TXD; /* changed text */
7985 else
7986 hlID = HLF_CHD; /* changed line */
7987 }
7988 rettv->vval.v_number = hlID == (hlf_T)0 ? 0 : (int)hlID;
7989}
7990
7991/*
7992 * "empty({expr})" function
7993 */
7994static void f_empty(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7995{
7996 int n;
7997
7998 switch (argvars[0].v_type) {
7999 case VAR_STRING2:
8000 case VAR_FUNC3:
8001 n = argvars[0].vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)
8002 || *argvars[0].vval.v_string == NUL'\000';
8003 break;
8004 case VAR_NUMBER1:
8005 n = argvars[0].vval.v_number == 0;
8006 break;
8007 case VAR_FLOAT6:
8008 n = argvars[0].vval.v_float == 0.0;
8009 break;
8010 case VAR_LIST4:
8011 n = argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)
8012 || argvars[0].vval.v_list->lv_first == NULL((void*)0);
8013 break;
8014 case VAR_DICT5:
8015 n = argvars[0].vval.v_dict == NULL((void*)0)
8016 || argvars[0].vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0;
8017 break;
8018 default:
8019 EMSG2(_(e_intern2), "f_empty()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)("f_empty()"
));
8020 n = 0;
8021 }
8022
8023 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
8024}
8025
8026/*
8027 * "escape({string}, {chars})" function
8028 */
8029static void f_escape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8030{
8031 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
8032
8033 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_escaped(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]),
8034 get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf));
8035 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8036}
8037
8038/*
8039 * "eval()" function
8040 */
8041static void f_eval(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8042{
8043 char_u *s;
8044
8045 s = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
8046 if (s != NULL((void*)0))
8047 s = skipwhite(s);
8048
8049 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || eval1(&s, rettv, TRUE1) == FAIL0) {
8050 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
8051 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
8052 } else if (*s != NUL'\000')
8053 EMSG(_(e_trailing))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_trailing))));
8054}
8055
8056/*
8057 * "eventhandler()" function
8058 */
8059static void f_eventhandler(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8060{
8061 rettv->vval.v_number = vgetc_busy;
8062}
8063
8064/*
8065 * "executable()" function
8066 */
8067static void f_executable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8068{
8069 rettv->vval.v_number = os_can_exe(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
8070}
8071
8072/*
8073 * "exists()" function
8074 */
8075static void f_exists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8076{
8077 char_u *p;
8078 char_u *name;
8079 int n = FALSE0;
8080 int len = 0;
8081
8082 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8083 if (*p == '$') { /* environment variable */
8084 /* first try "normal" environment variables (fast) */
8085 if (os_getenv((char *)(p + 1)) != NULL((void*)0))
8086 n = TRUE1;
8087 else {
8088 /* try expanding things like $VIM and ${HOME} */
8089 p = expand_env_save(p);
8090 if (p != NULL((void*)0) && *p != '$')
8091 n = TRUE1;
8092 free(p);
8093 }
8094 } else if (*p == '&' || *p == '+') { /* option */
8095 n = (get_option_tv(&p, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1) == OK1);
8096 if (*skipwhite(p) != NUL'\000')
8097 n = FALSE0; /* trailing garbage */
8098 } else if (*p == '*') { /* internal or user defined function */
8099 n = function_exists(p + 1);
8100 } else if (*p == ':') {
8101 n = cmd_exists(p + 1);
8102 } else if (*p == '#') {
8103 if (p[1] == '#')
8104 n = autocmd_supported(p + 2);
8105 else
8106 n = au_exists(p + 1);
8107 } else { /* internal variable */
8108 char_u *tofree;
8109 typval_T tv;
8110
8111 /* get_name_len() takes care of expanding curly braces */
8112 name = p;
8113 len = get_name_len(&p, &tofree, TRUE1, FALSE0);
8114 if (len > 0) {
8115 if (tofree != NULL((void*)0))
8116 name = tofree;
8117 n = (get_var_tv(name, len, &tv, FALSE0, TRUE1) == OK1);
8118 if (n) {
8119 /* handle d.key, l[idx], f(expr) */
8120 n = (handle_subscript(&p, &tv, TRUE1, FALSE0) == OK1);
8121 if (n)
8122 clear_tv(&tv);
8123 }
8124 }
8125 if (*p != NUL'\000')
8126 n = FALSE0;
8127
8128 free(tofree);
8129 }
8130
8131 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
8132}
8133
8134/*
8135 * "exp()" function
8136 */
8137static void f_exp(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8138{
8139 float_T f;
8140
8141 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
8142 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
8143 rettv->vval.v_float = exp(f);
8144 else
8145 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
8146}
8147
8148/*
8149 * "expand()" function
8150 */
8151static void f_expand(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8152{
8153 char_u *s;
8154 int len;
8155 char_u *errormsg;
8156 int options = WILD_SILENT64|WILD_USE_NL4|WILD_LIST_NOTFOUND1;
8157 expand_T xpc;
8158 int error = FALSE0;
8159 char_u *result;
8160
8161 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8162 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
8163 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
8164 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)
8165 && !error) {
8166 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
8167 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
8168 }
8169
8170 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8171 if (*s == '%' || *s == '#' || *s == '<') {
8172 ++emsg_off;
8173 result = eval_vars(s, s, &len, NULL((void*)0), &errormsg, NULL((void*)0));
8174 --emsg_off;
8175 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
8176 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
8177 if (result != NULL((void*)0)) {
8178 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, result, -1);
8179 }
8180 } else
8181 rettv->vval.v_string = result;
8182 } else {
8183 /* When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
8184 * for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end. */
8185 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
8186 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error))
8187 options |= WILD_KEEP_ALL32;
8188 if (!error) {
8189 ExpandInit(&xpc);
8190 xpc.xp_context = EXPAND_FILES;
8191 if (p_wic)
8192 options += WILD_ICASE256;
8193 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
8194 rettv->vval.v_string = ExpandOne(&xpc, s, NULL((void*)0),
8195 options, WILD_ALL6);
8196 else {
8197 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
8198 ExpandOne(&xpc, s, NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL_KEEP8);
8199 for (int i = 0; i < xpc.xp_numfiles; i++) {
8200 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, xpc.xp_files[i], -1);
8201 }
8202 ExpandCleanup(&xpc);
8203 }
8204 } else
8205 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8206 }
8207}
8208
8209/*
8210 * Go over all entries in "d2" and add them to "d1".
8211 * When "action" is "error" then a duplicate key is an error.
8212 * When "action" is "force" then a duplicate key is overwritten.
8213 * Otherwise duplicate keys are ignored ("action" is "keep").
8214 */
8215void dict_extend(dict_T *d1, dict_T *d2, char_u *action)
8216{
8217 dictitem_T *di1;
8218 hashitem_T *hi2;
8219 int todo;
8220
8221 todo = (int)d2->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
8222 for (hi2 = d2->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi2) {
8223 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi2)((hi2)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi2)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
8224 --todo;
8225 di1 = dict_find(d1, hi2->hi_key, -1);
8226 if (d1->dv_scope != 0) {
8227 /* Disallow replacing a builtin function in l: and g:.
8228 * Check the key to be valid when adding to any
8229 * scope. */
8230 if (d1->dv_scope == VAR_DEF_SCOPE2
8231 && HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)
&dumdi)))->di_tv.v_type == VAR_FUNC3
8232 && var_check_func_name(hi2->hi_key,
8233 di1 == NULL((void*)0)))
8234 break;
8235 if (!valid_varname(hi2->hi_key))
8236 break;
8237 }
8238 if (di1 == NULL((void*)0)) {
8239 di1 = dictitem_copy(HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)
&dumdi))));
8240 if (dict_add(d1, di1) == FAIL0)
8241 dictitem_free(di1);
8242 } else if (*action == 'e') {
8243 EMSG2(_("E737: Key already exists: %s"), hi2->hi_key)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E737: Key already exists: %s"
))), (char_u *)(hi2->hi_key));
8244 break;
8245 } else if (*action == 'f' && HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)
&dumdi))) != di1) {
8246 clear_tv(&di1->di_tv);
8247 copy_tv(&HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)
&dumdi)))->di_tv, &di1->di_tv);
8248 }
8249 }
8250 }
8251}
8252
8253/*
8254 * "extend(list, list [, idx])" function
8255 * "extend(dict, dict [, action])" function
8256 */
8257static void f_extend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8258{
8259 char *arg_errmsg = N_("extend() argument")"extend() argument";
8260
8261 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4 && argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
8262 list_T *l1, *l2;
8263 listitem_T *item;
8264 long before;
8265 int error = FALSE0;
8266
8267 l1 = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
8268 l2 = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
8269 if (l1 != NULL((void*)0) && !tv_check_lock(l1->lv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg)))
8270 && l2 != NULL((void*)0)) {
8271 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8272 before = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
8273 if (error)
8274 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
8275
8276 if (before == l1->lv_len)
8277 item = NULL((void*)0);
8278 else {
8279 item = list_find(l1, before);
8280 if (item == NULL((void*)0)) {
8281 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), before)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(before
));
8282 return;
8283 }
8284 }
8285 } else
8286 item = NULL((void*)0);
8287 list_extend(l1, l2, item);
8288
8289 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
8290 }
8291 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5 && argvars[1].v_type ==
8292 VAR_DICT5) {
8293 dict_T *d1, *d2;
8294 char_u *action;
8295 int i;
8296
8297 d1 = argvars[0].vval.v_dict;
8298 d2 = argvars[1].vval.v_dict;
8299 if (d1 != NULL((void*)0) && !tv_check_lock(d1->dv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg)))
8300 && d2 != NULL((void*)0)) {
8301 /* Check the third argument. */
8302 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8303 static char *(av[]) = {"keep", "force", "error"};
8304
8305 action = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[2]);
8306 if (action == NULL((void*)0))
8307 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
8308 for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
8309 if (STRCMP(action, av[i])strcmp((char *)(action), (char *)(av[i])) == 0)
8310 break;
8311 if (i == 3) {
8312 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), action)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(action
));
8313 return;
8314 }
8315 } else
8316 action = (char_u *)"force";
8317
8318 dict_extend(d1, d2, action);
8319
8320 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
8321 }
8322 } else
8323 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "extend()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("extend()"));
8324}
8325
8326/*
8327 * "feedkeys()" function
8328 */
8329static void f_feedkeys(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8330{
8331 char_u *keys, *flags = NULL((void*)0);
8332 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
8333
8334 /* This is not allowed in the sandbox. If the commands would still be
8335 * executed in the sandbox it would be OK, but it probably happens later,
8336 * when "sandbox" is no longer set. */
8337 if (check_secure())
8338 return;
8339
8340 keys = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8341 if (*keys != NUL'\000') {
8342 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8343 flags = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], nbuf);
8344 }
8345
8346 vim_feedkeys(cstr_as_string((char *)keys),
8347 cstr_as_string((char *)flags));
8348 }
8349}
8350
8351/*
8352 * "filereadable()" function
8353 */
8354static void f_filereadable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8355{
8356 int fd;
8357 char_u *p;
8358 int n;
8359
8360#ifndef O_NONBLOCK04000
8361# define O_NONBLOCK04000 0
8362#endif
8363 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8364 if (*p && !os_isdir(p) && (fd = os_open((char *)p,
8365 O_RDONLY00 | O_NONBLOCK04000, 0)) >= 0) {
8366 n = TRUE1;
8367 close(fd);
8368 } else
8369 n = FALSE0;
8370
8371 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
8372}
8373
8374/*
8375 * Return 0 for not writable, 1 for writable file, 2 for a dir which we have
8376 * rights to write into.
8377 */
8378static void f_filewritable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8379{
8380 char *filename = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8381 rettv->vval.v_number = os_file_is_writable(filename);
8382}
8383
8384
8385static void findfilendir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int find_what)
8386{
8387 char_u *fname;
8388 char_u *fresult = NULL((void*)0);
8389 char_u *path = *curbuf->b_p_path == NUL'\000' ? p_path : curbuf->b_p_path;
8390 char_u *p;
8391 char_u pathbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
8392 int count = 1;
8393 int first = TRUE1;
8394 int error = FALSE0;
8395
8396 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8397 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8398
8399 fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8400
8401 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8402 p = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], pathbuf);
8403 if (p == NULL((void*)0))
8404 error = TRUE1;
8405 else {
8406 if (*p != NUL'\000')
8407 path = p;
8408
8409 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8410 count = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
8411 }
8412 }
8413
8414 if (count < 0) {
8415 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
8416 }
8417
8418 if (*fname != NUL'\000' && !error) {
8419 do {
8420 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2 || rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4)
8421 free(fresult);
8422 fresult = find_file_in_path_option(first ? fname : NULL((void*)0),
8423 first ? (int)STRLEN(fname)strlen((char *)(fname)) : 0,
8424 0, first, path,
8425 find_what,
8426 curbuf->b_ffname,
8427 find_what == FINDFILE_DIR1
8428 ? (char_u *)"" : curbuf->b_p_sua);
8429 first = FALSE0;
8430
8431 if (fresult != NULL((void*)0) && rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4)
8432 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, fresult, -1);
8433
8434 } while ((rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4 || --count > 0) && fresult != NULL((void*)0));
8435 }
8436
8437 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
8438 rettv->vval.v_string = fresult;
8439}
8440
8441
8442/*
8443 * Implementation of map() and filter().
8444 */
8445static void filter_map(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int map)
8446{
8447 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
8448 char_u *expr;
8449 listitem_T *li, *nli;
8450 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
8451 dictitem_T *di;
8452 hashtab_T *ht;
8453 hashitem_T *hi;
8454 dict_T *d = NULL((void*)0);
8455 typval_T save_val;
8456 typval_T save_key;
8457 int rem;
8458 int todo;
8459 char_u *ermsg = (char_u *)(map ? "map()" : "filter()");
8460 char *arg_errmsg = (map ? N_("map() argument")"map() argument"
8461 : N_("filter() argument")"filter() argument");
8462 int save_did_emsg;
8463 int idx = 0;
8464
8465 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
8466 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0)
8467 || tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg))))
8468 return;
8469 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
8470 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0)
8471 || tv_check_lock(d->dv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg))))
8472 return;
8473 } else {
8474 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), ermsg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)(ermsg));
8475 return;
8476 }
8477
8478 expr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
8479 /* On type errors, the preceding call has already displayed an error
8480 * message. Avoid a misleading error message for an empty string that
8481 * was not passed as argument. */
8482 if (expr != NULL((void*)0)) {
8483 prepare_vimvar(VV_VAL, &save_val);
8484 expr = skipwhite(expr);
8485
8486 /* We reset "did_emsg" to be able to detect whether an error
8487 * occurred during evaluation of the expression. */
8488 save_did_emsg = did_emsg;
8489 did_emsg = FALSE0;
8490
8491 prepare_vimvar(VV_KEY, &save_key);
8492 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
8493 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_typevv_di.di_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8494
8495 ht = &d->dv_hashtab;
8496 hash_lock(ht);
8497 todo = (int)ht->ht_used;
8498 for (hi = ht->ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
8499 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
8500 --todo;
8501 di = HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)&
dumdi)));
8502 if (tv_check_lock(di->di_tv.v_lock,
8503 (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg))))
8504 break;
8505 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
8506 if (filter_map_one(&di->di_tv, expr, map, &rem) == FAIL0
8507 || did_emsg)
8508 break;
8509 if (!map && rem)
8510 dictitem_remove(d, di);
8511 clear_tv(&vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
8512 }
8513 }
8514 hash_unlock(ht);
8515 } else {
8516 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_typevv_di.di_tv.v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
8517
8518 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = nli) {
8519 if (tv_check_lock(li->li_tv.v_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg))))
8520 break;
8521 nli = li->li_next;
8522 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = idx;
8523 if (filter_map_one(&li->li_tv, expr, map, &rem) == FAIL0
8524 || did_emsg)
8525 break;
8526 if (!map && rem)
8527 listitem_remove(l, li);
8528 ++idx;
8529 }
8530 }
8531
8532 restore_vimvar(VV_KEY, &save_key);
8533 restore_vimvar(VV_VAL, &save_val);
8534
8535 did_emsg |= save_did_emsg;
8536 }
8537
8538 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
8539}
8540
8541static int filter_map_one(typval_T *tv, char_u *expr, int map, int *remp)
8542{
8543 typval_T rettv;
8544 char_u *s;
8545 int retval = FAIL0;
8546
8547 copy_tv(tv, &vimvars[VV_VAL].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
8548 s = expr;
8549 if (eval1(&s, &rettv, TRUE1) == FAIL0)
8550 goto theend;
8551 if (*s != NUL'\000') { /* check for trailing chars after expr */
8552 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(s
));
8553 goto theend;
8554 }
8555 if (map) {
8556 /* map(): replace the list item value */
8557 clear_tv(tv);
8558 rettv.v_lock = 0;
8559 *tv = rettv;
8560 } else {
8561 int error = FALSE0;
8562
8563 /* filter(): when expr is zero remove the item */
8564 *remp = (get_tv_number_chk(&rettv, &error) == 0);
8565 clear_tv(&rettv);
8566 /* On type error, nothing has been removed; return FAIL to stop the
8567 * loop. The error message was given by get_tv_number_chk(). */
8568 if (error)
8569 goto theend;
8570 }
8571 retval = OK1;
8572theend:
8573 clear_tv(&vimvars[VV_VAL].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
8574 return retval;
8575}
8576
8577/*
8578 * "filter()" function
8579 */
8580static void f_filter(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8581{
8582 filter_map(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
8583}
8584
8585/*
8586 * "finddir({fname}[, {path}[, {count}]])" function
8587 */
8588static void f_finddir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8589{
8590 findfilendir(argvars, rettv, FINDFILE_DIR1);
8591}
8592
8593/*
8594 * "findfile({fname}[, {path}[, {count}]])" function
8595 */
8596static void f_findfile(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8597{
8598 findfilendir(argvars, rettv, FINDFILE_FILE0);
8599}
8600
8601/*
8602 * "float2nr({float})" function
8603 */
8604static void f_float2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8605{
8606 float_T f;
8607
8608 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1) {
8609 if (f < -0x7fffffff)
8610 rettv->vval.v_number = -0x7fffffff;
8611 else if (f > 0x7fffffff)
8612 rettv->vval.v_number = 0x7fffffff;
8613 else
8614 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)f;
8615 }
8616}
8617
8618/*
8619 * "floor({float})" function
8620 */
8621static void f_floor(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8622{
8623 float_T f;
8624
8625 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
8626 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
8627 rettv->vval.v_float = floor(f);
8628 else
8629 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
8630}
8631
8632/*
8633 * "fmod()" function
8634 */
8635static void f_fmod(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8636{
8637 float_T fx, fy;
8638
8639 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
8640 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &fx) == OK1
8641 && get_float_arg(&argvars[1], &fy) == OK1)
8642 rettv->vval.v_float = fmod(fx, fy);
8643 else
8644 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
8645}
8646
8647/*
8648 * "fnameescape({string})" function
8649 */
8650static void f_fnameescape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8651{
8652 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_fnameescape(
8653 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), FALSE0);
8654 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8655}
8656
8657/*
8658 * "fnamemodify({fname}, {mods})" function
8659 */
8660static void f_fnamemodify(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8661{
8662 char_u *fname;
8663 char_u *mods;
8664 int usedlen = 0;
8665 int len;
8666 char_u *fbuf = NULL((void*)0);
8667 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
8668
8669 fname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
8670 mods = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
8671 if (fname == NULL((void*)0) || mods == NULL((void*)0))
8672 fname = NULL((void*)0);
8673 else {
8674 len = (int)STRLEN(fname)strlen((char *)(fname));
8675 (void)modify_fname(mods, &usedlen, &fname, &fbuf, &len);
8676 }
8677
8678 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8679 if (fname == NULL((void*)0))
8680 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8681 else
8682 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(fname, len);
8683 free(fbuf);
8684}
8685
8686
8687/*
8688 * "foldclosed()" function
8689 */
8690static void foldclosed_both(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int end)
8691{
8692 linenr_T lnum;
8693 linenr_T first, last;
8694
8695 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8696 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
8697 if (hasFoldingWin(curwin, lnum, &first, &last, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0))) {
8698 if (end)
8699 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)last;
8700 else
8701 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)first;
8702 return;
8703 }
8704 }
8705 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8706}
8707
8708/*
8709 * "foldclosed()" function
8710 */
8711static void f_foldclosed(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8712{
8713 foldclosed_both(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
8714}
8715
8716/*
8717 * "foldclosedend()" function
8718 */
8719static void f_foldclosedend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8720{
8721 foldclosed_both(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
8722}
8723
8724/*
8725 * "foldlevel()" function
8726 */
8727static void f_foldlevel(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8728{
8729 linenr_T lnum;
8730
8731 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8732 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
8733 rettv->vval.v_number = foldLevel(lnum);
8734}
8735
8736/*
8737 * "foldtext()" function
8738 */
8739static void f_foldtext(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8740{
8741 linenr_T lnum;
8742 char_u *s;
8743 char_u *r;
8744 int len;
8745 char *txt;
8746
8747 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8748 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8749 if ((linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number > 0
8750 && (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number
8751 <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
8752 && vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)) {
8753 /* Find first non-empty line in the fold. */
8754 lnum = (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number;
8755 while (lnum < (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number) {
8756 if (!linewhite(lnum))
8757 break;
8758 ++lnum;
8759 }
8760
8761 /* Find interesting text in this line. */
8762 s = skipwhite(ml_get(lnum));
8763 /* skip C comment-start */
8764 if (s[0] == '/' && (s[1] == '*' || s[1] == '/')) {
8765 s = skipwhite(s + 2);
8766 if (*skipwhite(s) == NUL'\000'
8767 && lnum + 1 < (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number) {
8768 s = skipwhite(ml_get(lnum + 1));
8769 if (*s == '*')
8770 s = skipwhite(s + 1);
8771 }
8772 }
8773 txt = _("+-%s%3ld lines: ")gettext((char *)("+-%s%3ld lines: "));
8774 r = xmalloc(STRLEN(txt)strlen((char *)(txt))
8775 + STRLEN(vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_str)strlen((char *)(vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string
)) // for %s
8776 + 20 // for %3ld
8777 + STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s))); // concatenated
8778 sprintf((char *)r, txt, vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string,
8779 (long)((linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number
8780 - (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number + 1));
8781 len = (int)STRLEN(r)strlen((char *)(r));
8782 STRCAT(r, s)strcat((char *)(r), (char *)(s));
8783 /* remove 'foldmarker' and 'commentstring' */
8784 foldtext_cleanup(r + len);
8785 rettv->vval.v_string = r;
8786 }
8787}
8788
8789/*
8790 * "foldtextresult(lnum)" function
8791 */
8792static void f_foldtextresult(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8793{
8794 linenr_T lnum;
8795 char_u *text;
8796 char_u buf[51];
8797 foldinfo_T foldinfo;
8798 int fold_count;
8799
8800 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8801 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8802 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8803 /* treat illegal types and illegal string values for {lnum} the same */
8804 if (lnum < 0)
8805 lnum = 0;
8806 fold_count = foldedCount(curwin, lnum, &foldinfo);
8807 if (fold_count > 0) {
8808 text = get_foldtext(curwin, lnum, lnum + fold_count - 1,
8809 &foldinfo, buf);
8810 if (text == buf)
8811 text = vim_strsave(text);
8812 rettv->vval.v_string = text;
8813 }
8814}
8815
8816/*
8817 * "foreground()" function
8818 */
8819static void f_foreground(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8820{
8821}
8822
8823/*
8824 * "function()" function
8825 */
8826static void f_function(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8827{
8828 char_u *s;
8829
8830 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8831 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || *s == NUL'\000' || VIM_ISDIGIT(*s)((unsigned)(*s) - '0' < 10))
8832 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(s)
);
8833 /* Don't check an autoload name for existence here. */
8834 else if (vim_strchr(s, AUTOLOAD_CHAR'#') == NULL((void*)0) && !function_exists(s))
8835 EMSG2(_("E700: Unknown function: %s"), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E700: Unknown function: %s"
))), (char_u *)(s));
8836 else {
8837 if (STRNCMP(s, "s:", 2)strncmp((char *)(s), (char *)("s:"), (size_t)(2)) == 0 || STRNCMP(s, "<SID>", 5)strncmp((char *)(s), (char *)("<SID>"), (size_t)(5)) == 0) {
8838 char sid_buf[25];
8839 int off = *s == 's' ? 2 : 5;
8840
8841 /* Expand s: and <SID> into <SNR>nr_, so that the function can
8842 * also be called from another script. Using trans_function_name()
8843 * would also work, but some plugins depend on the name being
8844 * printable text. */
8845 sprintf(sid_buf, "<SNR>%" PRId64"l" "d" "_", (int64_t)current_SID);
8846 rettv->vval.v_string = xmalloc(STRLEN(sid_buf)strlen((char *)(sid_buf)) + STRLEN(s + off)strlen((char *)(s + off)) + 1);
8847 STRCPY(rettv->vval.v_string, sid_buf)strcpy((char *)(rettv->vval.v_string), (char *)(sid_buf));
8848 STRCAT(rettv->vval.v_string, s + off)strcat((char *)(rettv->vval.v_string), (char *)(s + off));
8849 } else
8850 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(s);
8851 rettv->v_type = VAR_FUNC3;
8852 }
8853}
8854
8855/*
8856 * "garbagecollect()" function
8857 */
8858static void f_garbagecollect(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8859{
8860 /* This is postponed until we are back at the toplevel, because we may be
8861 * using Lists and Dicts internally. E.g.: ":echo [garbagecollect()]". */
8862 want_garbage_collect = TRUE1;
8863
8864 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0 && get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) == 1)
8865 garbage_collect_at_exit = TRUE1;
8866}
8867
8868/*
8869 * "get()" function
8870 */
8871static void f_get(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8872{
8873 listitem_T *li;
8874 list_T *l;
8875 dictitem_T *di;
8876 dict_T *d;
8877 typval_T *tv = NULL((void*)0);
8878
8879 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
8880 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
8881 int error = FALSE0;
8882
8883 li = list_find(l, get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error));
8884 if (!error && li != NULL((void*)0))
8885 tv = &li->li_tv;
8886 }
8887 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
8888 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)) {
8889 di = dict_find(d, get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), -1);
8890 if (di != NULL((void*)0))
8891 tv = &di->di_tv;
8892 }
8893 } else
8894 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "get()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("get()"));
8895
8896 if (tv == NULL((void*)0)) {
8897 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8898 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
8899 } else
8900 copy_tv(tv, rettv);
8901}
8902
8903
8904/*
8905 * Get line or list of lines from buffer "buf" into "rettv".
8906 * Return a range (from start to end) of lines in rettv from the specified
8907 * buffer.
8908 * If 'retlist' is TRUE, then the lines are returned as a Vim List.
8909 */
8910static void get_buffer_lines(buf_T *buf, linenr_T start, linenr_T end, int retlist, typval_T *rettv)
8911{
8912 char_u *p;
8913
8914 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8915 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8916 if (retlist) {
8917 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
8918 }
8919
8920 if (buf == NULL((void*)0) || buf->b_ml.ml_mfp == NULL((void*)0) || start < 0)
8921 return;
8922
8923 if (!retlist) {
8924 if (start >= 1 && start <= buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
8925 p = ml_get_buf(buf, start, FALSE0);
8926 else
8927 p = (char_u *)"";
8928 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
8929 } else {
8930 if (end < start)
8931 return;
8932
8933 if (start < 1)
8934 start = 1;
8935 if (end > buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
8936 end = buf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
8937 while (start <= end) {
8938 list_append_string(
8939 rettv->vval.v_list, ml_get_buf(buf, start++, FALSE0), -1);
8940 }
8941 }
8942}
8943
8944/*
8945 * "getbufline()" function
8946 */
8947static void f_getbufline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8948{
8949 linenr_T lnum;
8950 linenr_T end;
8951 buf_T *buf;
8952
8953 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
8954 ++emsg_off;
8955 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
8956 --emsg_off;
8957
8958 lnum = get_tv_lnum_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
8959 if (argvars[2].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8960 end = lnum;
8961 else
8962 end = get_tv_lnum_buf(&argvars[2], buf);
8963
8964 get_buffer_lines(buf, lnum, end, TRUE1, rettv);
8965}
8966
8967/*
8968 * "getbufvar()" function
8969 */
8970static void f_getbufvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8971{
8972 buf_T *buf;
8973 buf_T *save_curbuf;
8974 char_u *varname;
8975 dictitem_T *v;
8976 int done = FALSE0;
8977
8978 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
8979 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
8980 ++emsg_off;
8981 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
8982
8983 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8984 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8985
8986 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
8987 /* set curbuf to be our buf, temporarily */
8988 save_curbuf = curbuf;
8989 curbuf = buf;
8990
8991 if (*varname == '&') { /* buffer-local-option */
8992 if (get_option_tv(&varname, rettv, TRUE1) == OK1)
8993 done = TRUE1;
8994 } else if (STRCMP(varname, "changedtick")strcmp((char *)(varname), (char *)("changedtick")) == 0) {
8995 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
8996 rettv->vval.v_number = curbuf->b_changedtick;
8997 done = TRUE1;
8998 } else {
8999 /* Look up the variable. */
9000 /* Let getbufvar({nr}, "") return the "b:" dictionary. */
9001 v = find_var_in_ht(&curbuf->b_vars->dv_hashtab,
9002 'b', varname, FALSE0);
9003 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
9004 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
9005 done = TRUE1;
9006 }
9007 }
9008
9009 /* restore previous notion of curbuf */
9010 curbuf = save_curbuf;
9011 }
9012
9013 if (!done && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9014 /* use the default value */
9015 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
9016
9017 --emsg_off;
9018}
9019
9020/*
9021 * "getchar()" function
9022 */
9023static void f_getchar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9024{
9025 varnumber_T n;
9026 int error = FALSE0;
9027
9028 /* Position the cursor. Needed after a message that ends in a space. */
9029 windgoto(msg_row, msg_col);
9030
9031 ++no_mapping;
9032 ++allow_keys;
9033 for (;; ) {
9034 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9035 /* getchar(): blocking wait. */
9036 n = safe_vgetc();
9037 else if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error) == 1)
9038 /* getchar(1): only check if char avail */
9039 n = vpeekc_any();
9040 else if (error || vpeekc_any() == NUL'\000')
9041 /* illegal argument or getchar(0) and no char avail: return zero */
9042 n = 0;
9043 else
9044 /* getchar(0) and char avail: return char */
9045 n = safe_vgetc();
9046
9047 if (n == K_IGNORE(-((253) + ((int)(KE_IGNORE) << 8))))
9048 continue;
9049 break;
9050 }
9051 --no_mapping;
9052 --allow_keys;
9053
9054 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_WIN].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
9055 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_LNUM].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
9056 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_COL].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
9057
9058 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
9059 if (IS_SPECIAL(n)((n) < 0) || mod_mask != 0) {
9060 char_u temp[10]; /* modifier: 3, mbyte-char: 6, NUL: 1 */
9061 int i = 0;
9062
9063 /* Turn a special key into three bytes, plus modifier. */
9064 if (mod_mask != 0) {
9065 temp[i++] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
9066 temp[i++] = KS_MODIFIER252;
9067 temp[i++] = mod_mask;
9068 }
9069 if (IS_SPECIAL(n)((n) < 0)) {
9070 temp[i++] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
9071 temp[i++] = K_SECOND(n)((n) == (0x80) ? 254 : (n) == '\000' ? 255 : ((-(n)) & 0xff
));
9072 temp[i++] = K_THIRD(n)(((n) == (0x80) || (n) == '\000') ? ('X') : (((unsigned)(-(n)
) >> 8) & 0xff));
9073 } else if (has_mbyte)
9074 i += (*mb_char2bytes)(n, temp + i);
9075 else
9076 temp[i++] = n;
9077 temp[i++] = NUL'\000';
9078 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9079 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(temp);
9080
9081 if (is_mouse_key(n)) {
9082 int row = mouse_row;
9083 int col = mouse_col;
9084 win_T *win;
9085 linenr_T lnum;
9086 win_T *wp;
9087 int winnr = 1;
9088
9089 if (row >= 0 && col >= 0) {
9090 /* Find the window at the mouse coordinates and compute the
9091 * text position. */
9092 win = mouse_find_win(&row, &col);
9093 (void)mouse_comp_pos(win, &row, &col, &lnum);
9094 for (wp = firstwin; wp != win; wp = wp->w_next)
9095 ++winnr;
9096 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_WIN].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = winnr;
9097 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_LNUM].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = lnum;
9098 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_COL].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = col + 1;
9099 }
9100 }
9101 }
9102}
9103
9104/*
9105 * "getcharmod()" function
9106 */
9107static void f_getcharmod(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9108{
9109 rettv->vval.v_number = mod_mask;
9110}
9111

9113 * "getcmdline()" function
9114 */
