9116{
9117 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9118 rettv->vval.v_string = get_cmdline_str();
9119}
9120
9121/*
9122 * "getcmdpos()" function
9123 */
9124static void f_getcmdpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9125{
9126 rettv->vval.v_number = get_cmdline_pos() + 1;
9127}
9128
9129/*
9130 * "getcmdtype()" function
9131 */
9132static void f_getcmdtype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9133{
9134 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9135 rettv->vval.v_string = xmallocz(1);
9136 rettv->vval.v_string[0] = get_cmdline_type();
9137}
9138
9139/*
9140 * "getcwd()" function
9141 */
9142static void f_getcwd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9143{
9144 char_u *cwd;
9145
9146 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9147 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9148 cwd = xmalloc(MAXPATHL4096);
9149 if (os_dirname(cwd, MAXPATHL4096) != FAIL0) {
9150 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(cwd);
9151#ifdef BACKSLASH_IN_FILENAME
9152 slash_adjust(rettv->vval.v_string);
9153#endif
9154 }
9155 free(cwd);
9156}
9157
9158/*
9159 * "getfontname()" function
9160 */
9161static void f_getfontname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9162{
9163 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9164 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9165}
9166
9167/*
9168 * "getfperm({fname})" function
9169 */
9170static void f_getfperm(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9171{
9172 char_u *perm = NULL((void*)0);
9173 char_u flags[] = "rwx";
9174
9175 char_u *filename = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9176 int32_t file_perm = os_getperm(filename);
9177 if (file_perm >= 0) {
9178 perm = vim_strsave((char_u *)"---------");
9179 for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
9180 if (file_perm & (1 << (8 - i)))
9181 perm[i] = flags[i % 3];
9182 }
9183 }
9184 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9185 rettv->vval.v_string = perm;
9186}
9187
9188/*
9189 * "getfsize({fname})" function
9190 */
9191static void f_getfsize(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9192{
9193 char *fname = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9194
9195 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
9196
9197 FileInfo file_info;
9198 if (os_fileinfo(fname, &file_info)) {
9199 uint64_t filesize = os_fileinfo_size(&file_info);
9200 if (os_isdir((char_u *)fname))
9201 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
9202 else {
9203 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)filesize;
9204
9205 /* non-perfect check for overflow */
9206 if ((uint64_t)rettv->vval.v_number != filesize) {
9207 rettv->vval.v_number = -2;
9208 }
9209 }
9210 } else {
9211 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
9212 }
9213}
9214
9215/*
9216 * "getftime({fname})" function
9217 */
9218static void f_getftime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9219{
9220 char *fname = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9221
9222 FileInfo file_info;
9223 if (os_fileinfo(fname, &file_info)) {
9224 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)file_info.stat.st_mtim.tv_sec;
9225 } else {
9226 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
9227 }
9228}
9229
9230/*
9231 * "getftype({fname})" function
9232 */
9233static void f_getftype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9234{
9235 char_u *fname;
9236 char_u *type = NULL((void*)0);
9237 char *t;
9238
9239 fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9240
9241 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9242 FileInfo file_info;
9243 if (os_fileinfo_link((char *)fname, &file_info)) {
9244 uint64_t mode = file_info.stat.st_mode;
9245#ifdef S_ISREG
9246 if (S_ISREG(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0100000)))
9247 t = "file";
9248 else if (S_ISDIR(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0040000)))
9249 t = "dir";
9250# ifdef S_ISLNK
9251 else if (S_ISLNK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0120000)))
9252 t = "link";
9253# endif
9254# ifdef S_ISBLK
9255 else if (S_ISBLK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0060000)))
9256 t = "bdev";
9257# endif
9258# ifdef S_ISCHR
9259 else if (S_ISCHR(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0020000)))
9260 t = "cdev";
9261# endif
9262# ifdef S_ISFIFO
9263 else if (S_ISFIFO(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0010000)))
9264 t = "fifo";
9265# endif
9266# ifdef S_ISSOCK
9267 else if (S_ISSOCK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0140000)))
9268 t = "fifo";
9269# endif
9270 else
9271 t = "other";
9272#else
9273# ifdef S_IFMT0170000
9274 switch (mode & S_IFMT0170000) {
9275 case S_IFREG0100000: t = "file"; break;
9276 case S_IFDIR0040000: t = "dir"; break;
9277# ifdef S_IFLNK0120000
9278 case S_IFLNK0120000: t = "link"; break;
9279# endif
9280# ifdef S_IFBLK0060000
9281 case S_IFBLK0060000: t = "bdev"; break;
9282# endif
9283# ifdef S_IFCHR0020000
9284 case S_IFCHR0020000: t = "cdev"; break;
9285# endif
9286# ifdef S_IFIFO0010000
9287 case S_IFIFO0010000: t = "fifo"; break;
9288# endif
9289# ifdef S_IFSOCK0140000
9290 case S_IFSOCK0140000: t = "socket"; break;
9291# endif
9292 default: t = "other";
9293 }
9294# else
9295 if (os_isdir(fname))
9296 t = "dir";
9297 else
9298 t = "file";
9299# endif
9300#endif
9301 type = vim_strsave((char_u *)t);
9302 }
9303 rettv->vval.v_string = type;
9304}
9305
9306/*
9307 * "getline(lnum, [end])" function
9308 */
9309static void f_getline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9310{
9311 linenr_T lnum;
9312 linenr_T end;
9313 int retlist;
9314
9315 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
9316 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9317 end = 0;
9318 retlist = FALSE0;
9319 } else {
9320 end = get_tv_lnum(&argvars[1]);
9321 retlist = TRUE1;
9322 }
9323
9324 get_buffer_lines(curbuf, lnum, end, retlist, rettv);
9325}
9326
9327/*
9328 * "getmatches()" function
9329 */
9330static void f_getmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9331{
9332 matchitem_T *cur = curwin->w_match_head;
9333 int i;
9334
9335 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9336 while (cur != NULL((void*)0)) {
9337 dict_T *dict = dict_alloc();
9338 if (cur->match.regprog == NULL((void*)0)) {
9339 // match added with matchaddpos()
9340 for (i = 0; i < MAXPOSMATCH8; ++i) {
9341 llpos_T *llpos;
9342 char buf[6];
9343
9344 llpos = &cur->pos.pos[i];
9345 if (llpos->lnum == 0) {
9346 break;
9347 }
9348 list_T *l = list_alloc();
9349 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->lnum);
9350 if (llpos->col > 0) {
9351 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->col);
9352 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->len);
9353 }
9354 sprintf(buf, "pos%d", i + 1);
9355 dict_add_list(dict, buf, l);
9356 }
9357 } else {
9358 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "pattern", 0L, cur->pattern);
9359 }
9360 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "group", 0L, syn_id2name(cur->hlg_id));
9361 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "priority", (long)cur->priority, NULL((void*)0));
9362 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "id", (long)cur->id, NULL((void*)0));
9363 list_append_dict(rettv->vval.v_list, dict);
9364 cur = cur->next;
9365 }
9366}
9367
9368/*
9369 * "getpid()" function
9370 */
9371static void f_getpid(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9372{
9373 rettv->vval.v_number = os_get_pid();
9374}
9375
9376/*
9377 * "getpos(string)" function
9378 */
9379static void f_getpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9380{
9381 pos_T *fp;
9382 list_T *l;
9383 int fnum = -1;
9384
9385 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9386 l = rettv->vval.v_list;
9387 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], TRUE1, &fnum);
9388 list_append_number(l, (fnum != -1) ? (varnumber_T)fnum : (varnumber_T)0);
9389 list_append_number(l, (fp != NULL((void*)0)) ? (varnumber_T)fp->lnum : (varnumber_T)0);
9390 list_append_number(l,
9391 (fp != NULL((void*)0))
9392 ? (varnumber_T)(fp->col == MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL) ? MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL) : fp->col + 1)
9393 : (varnumber_T)0);
9394 list_append_number(l,
9395 (fp != NULL((void*)0)) ? (varnumber_T)fp->coladd : (varnumber_T)0);
9396}
9397
9398/*
9399 * "getqflist()" and "getloclist()" functions
9400 */
9401static void f_getqflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9402{
9403 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9404 win_T *wp = NULL((void*)0);
9405 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) { /* getloclist() */
9406 wp = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
9407 if (wp == NULL((void*)0)) {
9408 return;
9409 }
9410 }
9411 (void)get_errorlist(wp, rettv->vval.v_list);
9412}
9413
9414/*
9415 * "getreg()" function
9416 */
9417static void f_getreg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9418{
9419 char_u *strregname;
9420 int regname;
9421 int arg2 = FALSE0;
9422 int error = FALSE0;
9423
9424 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9425 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
9426 error = strregname == NULL((void*)0);
9427 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9428 arg2 = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
9429 } else
9430 strregname = vimvars[VV_REG].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string;
9431 regname = (strregname == NULL((void*)0) ? '"' : *strregname);
9432 if (regname == 0)
9433 regname = '"';
9434
9435 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9436 rettv->vval.v_string = error ? NULL((void*)0) :
9437 get_reg_contents(regname, TRUE1, arg2);
9438}
9439
9440/*
9441 * "getregtype()" function
9442 */
9443static void f_getregtype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9444{
9445 char_u *strregname;
9446 int regname;
9447 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30 + 2];
9448 long reglen = 0;
9449
9450 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9451 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
9452 if (strregname == NULL((void*)0)) { /* type error; errmsg already given */
9453 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9454 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9455 return;
9456 }
9457 } else
9458 /* Default to v:register */
9459 strregname = vimvars[VV_REG].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string;
9460
9461 regname = (strregname == NULL((void*)0) ? '"' : *strregname);
9462 if (regname == 0)
9463 regname = '"';
9464
9465 buf[0] = NUL'\000';
9466 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
9467 switch (get_reg_type(regname, &reglen)) {
9468 case MLINE1: buf[0] = 'V'; break;
9469 case MCHAR0: buf[0] = 'v'; break;
9470 case MBLOCK2:
9471 buf[0] = Ctrl_V22;
9472 sprintf((char *)buf + 1, "%" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t)(reglen + 1));
9473 break;
9474 }
9475 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9476 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf);
9477}
9478
9479/*
9480 * "gettabvar()" function
9481 */
9482static void f_gettabvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9483{
9484 tabpage_T *tp;
9485 dictitem_T *v;
9486 char_u *varname;
9487 int done = FALSE0;
9488
9489 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9490 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9491
9492 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
9493 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
9494 if (tp != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
9495 /* look up the variable */
9496 v = find_var_in_ht(&tp->tp_vars->dv_hashtab, 0, varname, FALSE0);
9497 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
9498 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
9499 done = TRUE1;
9500 }
9501 }
9502
9503 if (!done && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9504 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
9505}
9506
9507/*
9508 * "gettabwinvar()" function
9509 */
9510static void f_gettabwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9511{
9512 getwinvar(argvars, rettv, 1);
9513}
9514
9515/*
9516 * "getwinposx()" function
9517 */
9518static void f_getwinposx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9519{
9520 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
9521}
9522
9523/*
9524 * "getwinposy()" function
9525 */
9526static void f_getwinposy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9527{
9528 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
9529}
9530
9531/*
9532 * Find window specified by "vp" in tabpage "tp".
9533 */
9534static win_T *
9535find_win_by_nr (
9536 typval_T *vp,
9537 tabpage_T *tp /* NULL for current tab page */
9538)
9539{
9540 win_T *wp;
9541 int nr;
9542
9543 nr = get_tv_number_chk(vp, NULL((void*)0));
9544
9545 if (nr < 0)
9546 return NULL((void*)0);
9547 if (nr == 0)
9548 return curwin;
9549
9550 for (wp = (tp == NULL((void*)0) || tp == curtab) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
9551 wp != NULL((void*)0); wp = wp->w_next)
9552 if (--nr <= 0)
9553 break;
9554 return wp;
9555}
9556
9557/*
9558 * "getwinvar()" function
9559 */
9560static void f_getwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9561{
9562 getwinvar(argvars, rettv, 0);
9563}
9564
9565/*
9566 * getwinvar() and gettabwinvar()
9567 */
9568static void
9569getwinvar (
9570 typval_T *argvars,
9571 typval_T *rettv,
9572 int off /* 1 for gettabwinvar() */
9573)
9574{
9575 win_T *win, *oldcurwin;
9576 char_u *varname;
9577 dictitem_T *v;
9578 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
9579 tabpage_T *oldtabpage = NULL((void*)0);
9580 int done = FALSE0;
9581
9582 if (off == 1)
9583 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
9584 else
9585 tp = curtab;
9586 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[off], tp);
9587 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[off + 1]);
9588 ++emsg_off;
9589
9590 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9591 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9592
9593 if (win != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
9594 /* Set curwin to be our win, temporarily. Also set the tabpage,
9595 * otherwise the window is not valid. */
9596 switch_win(&oldcurwin, &oldtabpage, win, tp, TRUE1);
9597
9598 if (*varname == '&') { /* window-local-option */
9599 if (get_option_tv(&varname, rettv, 1) == OK1)
9600 done = TRUE1;
9601 } else {
9602 /* Look up the variable. */
9603 /* Let getwinvar({nr}, "") return the "w:" dictionary. */
9604 v = find_var_in_ht(&win->w_vars->dv_hashtab, 'w', varname, FALSE0);
9605 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
9606 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
9607 done = TRUE1;
9608 }
9609 }
9610
9611 /* restore previous notion of curwin */
9612 restore_win(oldcurwin, oldtabpage, TRUE1);
9613 }
9614
9615 if (!done && argvars[off + 2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9616 /* use the default return value */
9617 copy_tv(&argvars[off + 2], rettv);
9618
9619 --emsg_off;
9620}
9621
9622/*
9623 * "glob()" function
9624 */
9625static void f_glob(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9626{
9627 int options = WILD_SILENT64|WILD_USE_NL4;
9628 expand_T xpc;
9629 int error = FALSE0;
9630
9631 /* When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
9632 * for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end. */
9633 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9634 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9635 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error))
9636 options |= WILD_KEEP_ALL32;
9637 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
9638 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)) {
9639 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
9640 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
9641 }
9642 }
9643 if (!error) {
9644 ExpandInit(&xpc);
9645 xpc.xp_context = EXPAND_FILES;
9646 if (p_wic)
9647 options += WILD_ICASE256;
9648 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
9649 rettv->vval.v_string = ExpandOne(&xpc, get_tv_string(&argvars[0]),
9650 NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL6);
9651 else {
9652 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9653 ExpandOne(&xpc, get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL_KEEP8);
9654 for (int i = 0; i < xpc.xp_numfiles; i++) {
9655 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, xpc.xp_files[i], -1);
9656 }
9657 ExpandCleanup(&xpc);
9658 }
9659 } else
9660 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9661}
9662
9663/// "globpath()" function
9664static void f_globpath(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9665{
9666 int flags = 0; // Flags for globpath.
9667 int error = false0;
9668
9669 // Return a string, or a list if the optional third argument is non-zero.
9670 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9671
9672 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9673 // When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
9674 // for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end.
9675 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)) {
9676 flags |= WILD_KEEP_ALL32;
9677 }
9678
9679 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
9680 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error)) {
9681 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
9682 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
9683 }
9684 }
9685
9686 char_u buf1[NUMBUFLEN30];
9687 char_u *file = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf1);
9688 if (file != NULL((void*)0) && !error) {
9689 garray_T ga;
9690 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char_u *), 10);
9691 globpath(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), file, &ga, flags);
9692
9693 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
9694 rettv->vval.v_string = ga_concat_strings_sep(&ga, "\n");
9695 } else {
9696 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9697 for (int i = 0; i < ga.ga_len; i++) {
9698 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list,
9699 ((char_u **)(ga.ga_data))[i], -1);
9700 }
9701 }
9702
9703 ga_clear_strings(&ga);
9704 } else {
9705 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9706 }
9707}
9708
9709/*
9710 * "has()" function
9711 */
9712static void f_has(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9713{
9714 int i;
9715 char_u *name;
9716 int n = FALSE0;
9717 static char *(has_list[]) =
9718 {
9719#ifdef UNIX
9720 "unix",
9721#endif
9722#if defined(WIN64) || defined(_WIN64)
9723 "win64",
9724#endif
9725#ifndef CASE_INSENSITIVE_FILENAME
9726 "fname_case",
9727#endif
9728#ifdef HAVE_ACL(HAVE_POSIX_ACL || HAVE_SOLARIS_ACL || HAVE_AIX_ACL)
9729 "acl",
9730#endif
9731 "arabic",
9732 "autocmd",
9733#if defined(SOME_BUILTIN_TCAPS) || defined(ALL_BUILTIN_TCAPS)
9734 "builtin_terms",
9735# ifdef ALL_BUILTIN_TCAPS
9736 "all_builtin_terms",
9737# endif
9738#endif
9739#if defined(FEAT_BROWSE) && (defined(USE_FILE_CHOOSER) \
9740 || defined(FEAT_GUI_W32) \
9741 || defined(FEAT_GUI_MOTIF))
9742 "browsefilter",
9743#endif
9744 "byte_offset",
9745 "cindent",
9746 "cmdline_compl",
9747 "cmdline_hist",
9748 "comments",
9749 "conceal",
9750 "cscope",
9751 "cursorbind",
9752 "cursorshape",
9753#ifdef DEBUG
9754 "debug",
9755#endif
9756 "dialog_con",
9757 "diff",
9758 "digraphs",
9759 "eval", /* always present, of course! */
9760 "ex_extra",
9761 "extra_search",
9762 "farsi",
9763 "file_in_path",
9764 "filterpipe",
9765 "find_in_path",
9766 "float",
9767 "folding",
9768#if defined(UNIX)
9769 "fork",
9770#endif
9771 "gettext",
9772#if defined(HAVE_ICONV_H) && defined(USE_ICONV)
9773 "iconv",
9774#endif
9775 "insert_expand",
9776 "jumplist",
9777 "keymap",
9778 "langmap",
9779 "libcall",
9780 "linebreak",
9781 "lispindent",
9782 "listcmds",
9783 "localmap",
9784#ifdef __APPLE__
9785 "mac",
9786 "macunix",
9787#endif
9788 "menu",
9789 "mksession",
9790 "modify_fname",
9791 "mouse",
9792#if defined(UNIX)
9793 "mouse_dec",
9794 "mouse_netterm",
9795 "mouse_sgr",
9796 "mouse_urxvt",
9797 "mouse_xterm",
9798#endif
9799 "multi_byte",
9800 "multi_lang",
9801 "path_extra",
9802 "persistent_undo",
9803 "postscript",
9804 "printer",
9805 "profile",
9806 "reltime",
9807 "quickfix",
9808 "rightleft",
9809 "scrollbind",
9810 "showcmd",
9811 "cmdline_info",
9812 "signs",
9813 "smartindent",
9814 "startuptime",
9815 "statusline",
9816 "spell",
9817 "syntax",
9818#if !defined(UNIX)
9819 "system",
9820#endif
9821 "tag_binary",
9822 "tag_old_static",
9823#ifdef TERMINFO1
9824 "terminfo",
9825#endif
9826 "termresponse",
9827 "textobjects",
9828#ifdef HAVE_TGETENT1
9829 "tgetent",
9830#endif
9831 "title",
9832 "user-commands", /* was accidentally included in 5.4 */
9833 "user_commands",
9834 "viminfo",
9835 "vertsplit",
9836 "virtualedit",
9837 "visual",
9838 "visualextra",
9839 "vreplace",
9840 "wildignore",
9841 "wildmenu",
9842 "windows",
9843 "winaltkeys",
9844 "writebackup",
9845 "nvim",
9846 NULL((void*)0)
9847 };
9848
9849 name = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9850 for (i = 0; has_list[i] != NULL((void*)0); ++i)
9851 if (STRICMP(name, has_list[i])strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)(has_list[i])) == 0) {
9852 n = TRUE1;
9853 break;
9854 }
9855
9856 if (n == FALSE0) {
9857 if (STRNICMP(name, "patch", 5)strncasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("patch"), (size_t)(5)) == 0) {
9858 if (name[5] == '-'
9859 && STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)) > 11
9860 && vim_isdigit(name[6])
9861 && vim_isdigit(name[8])
9862 && vim_isdigit(name[10])) {
9863 int major = atoi((char *)name + 6);
9864 int minor = atoi((char *)name + 8);
9865
9866 // Expect "patch-9.9.01234".
9867 n = (major < VIM_VERSION_MAJOR7
9868 || (major == VIM_VERSION_MAJOR7
9869 && (minor < VIM_VERSION_MINOR4
9870 || (minor == VIM_VERSION_MINOR4
9871 && has_patch(atoi((char *)name + 10))))));
9872 } else {
9873 n = has_patch(atoi((char *)name + 5));
9874 }
9875 } else if (STRICMP(name, "vim_starting")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("vim_starting")) == 0) {
9876 n = (starting != 0);
9877 } else if (STRICMP(name, "multi_byte_encoding")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("multi_byte_encoding")) == 0) {
9878 n = has_mbyte;
9879#if defined(USE_ICONV) && defined(DYNAMIC_ICONV)
9880 } else if (STRICMP(name, "iconv")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("iconv")) == 0) {
9881 n = iconv_enabled(false0);
9882#endif
9883 } else if (STRICMP(name, "syntax_items")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("syntax_items")) == 0) {
9884 n = syntax_present(curwin);
9885 }
9886 }
9887
9888 if (n == FALSE0 && provider_has_feature((char *)name)) {
9889 n = TRUE1;
9890 }
9891
9892 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
9893}
9894
9895/*
9896 * "has_key()" function
9897 */
9898static void f_has_key(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9899{
9900 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
9901 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
9902 return;
9903 }
9904 if (argvars[0].vval.v_dict == NULL((void*)0))
9905 return;
9906
9907 rettv->vval.v_number = dict_find(argvars[0].vval.v_dict,
9908 get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), -1) != NULL((void*)0);
9909}
9910
9911/*
9912 * "haslocaldir()" function
9913 */
9914static void f_haslocaldir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9915{
9916 rettv->vval.v_number = (curwin->w_localdir != NULL((void*)0));
9917}
9918
9919/*
9920 * "hasmapto()" function
9921 */
9922static void f_hasmapto(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9923{
9924 char_u *name;
9925 char_u *mode;
9926 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
9927 int abbr = FALSE0;
9928
9929 name = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9930 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9931 mode = (char_u *)"nvo";
9932 else {
9933 mode = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
9934 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9935 abbr = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
9936 }
9937
9938 if (map_to_exists(name, mode, abbr))
9939 rettv->vval.v_number = TRUE1;
9940 else
9941 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
9942}
9943
9944/*
9945 * "histadd()" function
9946 */
9947static void f_histadd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9948{
9949 int histype;
9950 char_u *str;
9951 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
9952
9953 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
9954 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
9955 return;
9956 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
9957 histype = str != NULL((void*)0) ? get_histtype(str) : -1;
9958 if (histype >= 0) {
9959 str = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
9960 if (*str != NUL'\000') {
9961 init_history();
9962 add_to_history(histype, str, FALSE0, NUL'\000');
9963 rettv->vval.v_number = TRUE1;
9964 return;
9965 }
9966 }
9967}
9968
9969/*
9970 * "histdel()" function
9971 */
9972static void f_histdel(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9973{
9974 int n;
9975 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
9976 char_u *str;
9977
9978 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
9979 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
9980 n = 0;
9981 else if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9982 /* only one argument: clear entire history */
9983 n = clr_history(get_histtype(str));
9984 else if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
9985 /* index given: remove that entry */
9986 n = del_history_idx(get_histtype(str),
9987 (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[1]));
9988 else
9989 /* string given: remove all matching entries */
9990 n = del_history_entry(get_histtype(str),
9991 get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf));
9992 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
9993}
9994
9995/*
9996 * "histget()" function
9997 */
9998static void f_histget(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9999{
10000 int type;
10001 int idx;
10002 char_u *str;
10003
10004 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
10005 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
10006 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10007 else {
10008 type = get_histtype(str);
10009 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10010 idx = get_history_idx(type);
10011 else
10012 idx = (int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
10013 /* -1 on type error */
10014 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(get_history_entry(type, idx));
10015 }
10016 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10017}
10018
10019/*
10020 * "histnr()" function
10021 */
10022static void f_histnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10023{
10024 int i;
10025
10026 char_u *history = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
10027
10028 i = history == NULL((void*)0) ? HIST_CMD0 - 1 : get_histtype(history);
10029 if (i >= HIST_CMD0 && i < HIST_COUNT5)
10030 i = get_history_idx(i);
10031 else
10032 i = -1;
10033 rettv->vval.v_number = i;
10034}
10035
10036/*
10037 * "highlightID(name)" function
10038 */
10039static void f_hlID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10040{
10041 rettv->vval.v_number = syn_name2id(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
10042}

10044/*
10045 * "highlight_exists()" function
10046 */
10047static void f_hlexists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10048{
10049 rettv->vval.v_number = highlight_exists(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
10050}

10052/*
10053 * "hostname()" function
10054 */
10055static void f_hostname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10056{
10057 char hostname[256];
10058
10059 os_get_hostname(hostname, 256);
10060 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10061 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave((char_u *)hostname);
10062}
10063
10064/*
10065 * iconv() function
10066 */
10067static void f_iconv(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10068{
10069 char_u buf1[NUMBUFLEN30];
10070 char_u buf2[NUMBUFLEN30];
10071 char_u *from, *to, *str;
10072 vimconv_T vimconv;
10073
10074 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10075 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10076
10077 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10078 from = enc_canonize(enc_skip(get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf1)));
10079 to = enc_canonize(enc_skip(get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], buf2)));
10080 vimconv.vc_type = CONV_NONE0;
10081 convert_setup(&vimconv, from, to);
10082
10083 /* If the encodings are equal, no conversion needed. */
10084 if (vimconv.vc_type == CONV_NONE0)
10085 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(str);
10086 else
10087 rettv->vval.v_string = string_convert(&vimconv, str, NULL((void*)0));
10088
10089 convert_setup(&vimconv, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
10090 free(from);
10091 free(to);
10092}
10093
10094/*
10095 * "indent()" function
10096 */
10097static void f_indent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10098{
10099 linenr_T lnum;
10100
10101 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
10102 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
10103 rettv->vval.v_number = get_indent_lnum(lnum);
10104 else
10105 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10106}
10107
10108/*
10109 * "index()" function
10110 */
10111static void f_index(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10112{
10113 list_T *l;
10114 listitem_T *item;
10115 long idx = 0;
10116 int ic = FALSE0;
10117
10118 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10119 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
10120 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
10121 return;
10122 }
10123 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
10124 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
10125 item = l->lv_first;
10126 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10127 int error = FALSE0;
10128
10129 /* Start at specified item. Use the cached index that list_find()
10130 * sets, so that a negative number also works. */
10131 item = list_find(l, get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error));
10132 idx = l->lv_idx;
10133 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10134 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
10135 if (error)
10136 item = NULL((void*)0);
10137 }
10138
10139 for (; item != NULL((void*)0); item = item->li_next, ++idx)
10140 if (tv_equal(&item->li_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0)) {
10141 rettv->vval.v_number = idx;
10142 break;
10143 }
10144 }
10145}
10146
10147static int inputsecret_flag = 0;
10148
10149
10150/*
10151 * This function is used by f_input() and f_inputdialog() functions. The third
10152 * argument to f_input() specifies the type of completion to use at the
10153 * prompt. The third argument to f_inputdialog() specifies the value to return
10154 * when the user cancels the prompt.
10155 */
10156static void get_user_input(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int inputdialog)
10157{
10158 char_u *prompt = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
10159 char_u *p = NULL((void*)0);
10160 int c;
10161 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
10162 int cmd_silent_save = cmd_silent;
10163 char_u *defstr = (char_u *)"";
10164 int xp_type = EXPAND_NOTHING;
10165 char_u *xp_arg = NULL((void*)0);
10166
10167 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10168 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10169
10170#ifdef NO_CONSOLE_INPUT
10171 /* While starting up, there is no place to enter text. */
10172 if (no_console_input())
10173 return;
10174#endif
10175
10176 cmd_silent = FALSE0; /* Want to see the prompt. */
10177 if (prompt != NULL((void*)0)) {
10178 /* Only the part of the message after the last NL is considered as
10179 * prompt for the command line */
10180 p = vim_strrchr(prompt, '\n');
10181 if (p == NULL((void*)0))
10182 p = prompt;
10183 else {
10184 ++p;
10185 c = *p;
10186 *p = NUL'\000';
10187 msg_start();
10188 msg_clr_eos();
10189 msg_puts_attr(prompt, echo_attr);
10190 msg_didout = FALSE0;
10191 msg_starthere();
10192 *p = c;
10193 }
10194 cmdline_row = msg_row;
10195
10196 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10197 defstr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
10198 if (defstr != NULL((void*)0))
10199 stuffReadbuffSpec(defstr);
10200
10201 if (!inputdialog && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10202 char_u *xp_name;
10203 int xp_namelen;
10204 long argt;
10205
10206 /* input() with a third argument: completion */
10207 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10208
10209 xp_name = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], buf);
10210 if (xp_name == NULL((void*)0))
10211 return;
10212
10213 xp_namelen = (int)STRLEN(xp_name)strlen((char *)(xp_name));
10214
10215 if (parse_compl_arg(xp_name, xp_namelen, &xp_type, &argt,
10216 &xp_arg) == FAIL0)
10217 return;
10218 }
10219 }
10220
10221 if (defstr != NULL((void*)0)) {
10222 int save_ex_normal_busy = ex_normal_busy;
10223 ex_normal_busy = 0;
10224 rettv->vval.v_string =
10225 getcmdline_prompt(inputsecret_flag ? NUL'\000' : '@', p, echo_attr,
10226 xp_type, xp_arg);
10227 ex_normal_busy = save_ex_normal_busy;
10228 }
10229 if (inputdialog && rettv->vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)
10230 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
10231 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10232 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(get_tv_string_buf(
10233 &argvars[2], buf));
10234
10235 free(xp_arg);
10236
10237 /* since the user typed this, no need to wait for return */
10238 need_wait_return = FALSE0;
10239 msg_didout = FALSE0;
10240 }
10241 cmd_silent = cmd_silent_save;
10242}
10243
10244/*
10245 * "input()" function
10246 * Also handles inputsecret() when inputsecret is set.
10247 */
10248static void f_input(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10249{
10250 get_user_input(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
10251}
10252
10253/*
10254 * "inputdialog()" function
10255 */
10256static void f_inputdialog(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10257{
10258 get_user_input(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
10259}
10260
10261/*
10262 * "inputlist()" function
10263 */
10264static void f_inputlist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10265{
10266 listitem_T *li;
10267 int selected;
10268 int mouse_used;
10269
10270#ifdef NO_CONSOLE_INPUT
10271 /* While starting up, there is no place to enter text. */
10272 if (no_console_input())
10273 return;
10274#endif
10275 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4 || argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
10276 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "inputlist()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("inputlist()"
));
10277 return;
10278 }
10279
10280 msg_start();
10281 msg_row = Rows - 1; /* for when 'cmdheight' > 1 */
10282 lines_left = Rows; /* avoid more prompt */
10283 msg_scroll = TRUE1;
10284 msg_clr_eos();
10285
10286 for (li = argvars[0].vval.v_list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
10287 msg_puts(get_tv_string(&li->li_tv));
10288 msg_putchar('\n');
10289 }
10290
10291 /* Ask for choice. */
10292 selected = prompt_for_number(&mouse_used);
10293 if (mouse_used)
10294 selected -= lines_left;
10295
10296 rettv->vval.v_number = selected;
10297}
10298
10299
10300static garray_T ga_userinput = {0, 0, sizeof(tasave_T), 4, NULL((void*)0)};
10301
10302/*
10303 * "inputrestore()" function
10304 */
10305static void f_inputrestore(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10306{
10307 if (!GA_EMPTY(&ga_userinput)((&ga_userinput)->ga_len <= 0)) {
10308 --ga_userinput.ga_len;
10309 restore_typeahead((tasave_T *)(ga_userinput.ga_data)
10310 + ga_userinput.ga_len);
10311 /* default return is zero == OK */
10312 } else if (p_verbose > 1) {
10313 verb_msg((char_u *)_("called inputrestore() more often than inputsave()")gettext((char *)("called inputrestore() more often than inputsave()"
)));
10314 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
10315 }
10316}
10317
10318/*
10319 * "inputsave()" function
10320 */
10321static void f_inputsave(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10322{
10323 // Add an entry to the stack of typeahead storage.
10324 tasave_T *p = GA_APPEND_VIA_PTR(tasave_T, &ga_userinput)ga_append_via_ptr(&ga_userinput, sizeof(tasave_T));
10325 save_typeahead(p);
10326}
10327
10328/*
10329 * "inputsecret()" function
10330 */
10331static void f_inputsecret(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10332{
10333 ++cmdline_star;
10334 ++inputsecret_flag;
10335 f_input(argvars, rettv);
10336 --cmdline_star;
10337 --inputsecret_flag;
10338}
10339
10340/*
10341 * "insert()" function
10342 */
10343static void f_insert(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10344{
10345 long before = 0;
10346 listitem_T *item;
10347 list_T *l;
10348 int error = FALSE0;
10349
10350 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4)
10351 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "insert()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("insert()"
));
10352 else if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
10353 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, (char_u *)_("insert() argument")gettext((char *)("insert() argument")))) {
10354 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10355 before = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
10356 if (error)
10357 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
10358
10359 if (before == l->lv_len)
10360 item = NULL((void*)0);
10361 else {
10362 item = list_find(l, before);
10363 if (item == NULL((void*)0)) {
10364 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), before)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(before
));
10365 l = NULL((void*)0);
10366 }
10367 }
10368 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
10369 list_insert_tv(l, &argvars[1], item);
10370 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
10371 }
10372 }
10373}
10374
10375/*
10376 * "invert(expr)" function
10377 */
10378static void f_invert(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10379{
10380 rettv->vval.v_number = ~get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
10381}
10382
10383/*
10384 * "isdirectory()" function
10385 */
10386static void f_isdirectory(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10387{
10388 rettv->vval.v_number = os_isdir(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
10389}
10390
10391/*
10392 * "islocked()" function
10393 */
10394static void f_islocked(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10395{
10396 lval_T lv;
10397 char_u *end;
10398 dictitem_T *di;
10399
10400 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10401 end = get_lval(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), NULL((void*)0), &lv, FALSE0, FALSE0,
10402 GLV_NO_AUTOLOAD4, FNE_CHECK_START2);
10403 if (end != NULL((void*)0) && lv.ll_name != NULL((void*)0)) {
10404 if (*end != NUL'\000')
10405 EMSG(_(e_trailing))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_trailing))));
10406 else {
10407 if (lv.ll_tv == NULL((void*)0)) {
10408 if (check_changedtick(lv.ll_name))
10409 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* always locked */
10410 else {
10411 di = find_var(lv.ll_name, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1);
10412 if (di != NULL((void*)0)) {
10413 /* Consider a variable locked when:
10414 * 1. the variable itself is locked
10415 * 2. the value of the variable is locked.
10416 * 3. the List or Dict value is locked.
10417 */
10418 rettv->vval.v_number = ((di->di_flags & DI_FLAGS_LOCK8)
10419 || tv_islocked(&di->di_tv));
10420 }
10421 }
10422 } else if (lv.ll_range)
10423 EMSG(_("E786: Range not allowed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E786: Range not allowed")))
);
10424 else if (lv.ll_newkey != NULL((void*)0))
10425 EMSG2(_(e_dictkey), lv.ll_newkey)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictkey))), (char_u *)(lv
.ll_newkey));
10426 else if (lv.ll_list != NULL((void*)0))
10427 /* List item. */
10428 rettv->vval.v_number = tv_islocked(&lv.ll_li->li_tv);
10429 else
10430 /* Dictionary item. */
10431 rettv->vval.v_number = tv_islocked(&lv.ll_di->di_tv);
10432 }
10433 }
10434
10435 clear_lval(&lv);
10436}
10437
10438
10439/*
10440 * Turn a dict into a list:
10441 * "what" == 0: list of keys
10442 * "what" == 1: list of values
10443 * "what" == 2: list of items
10444 */
10445static void dict_list(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int what)
10446{
10447 list_T *l2;
10448 dictitem_T *di;
10449 hashitem_T *hi;
10450 listitem_T *li;
10451 listitem_T *li2;
10452 dict_T *d;
10453 int todo;
10454
10455 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
10456 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
10457 return;
10458 }
10459 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0))
10460 return;
10461
10462 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10463
10464 todo = (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
10465 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
10466 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
10467 --todo;
10468 di = HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)&
dumdi)));
10469
10470 li = listitem_alloc();
10471 list_append(rettv->vval.v_list, li);
10472
10473 if (what == 0) {
10474 /* keys() */
10475 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10476 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
10477 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
10478 } else if (what == 1) {
10479 /* values() */
10480 copy_tv(&di->di_tv, &li->li_tv);
10481 } else {
10482 /* items() */
10483 l2 = list_alloc();
10484 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_LIST4;
10485 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
10486 li->li_tv.vval.v_list = l2;
10487 ++l2->lv_refcount;
10488
10489 li2 = listitem_alloc();
10490 list_append(l2, li2);
10491 li2->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10492 li2->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
10493 li2->li_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
10494
10495 li2 = listitem_alloc();
10496 list_append(l2, li2);
10497 copy_tv(&di->di_tv, &li2->li_tv);
10498 }
10499 }
10500 }
10501}
10502
10503/*
10504 * "items(dict)" function
10505 */
10506static void f_items(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10507{
10508 dict_list(argvars, rettv, 2);
10509}
10510
10511// "jobsend()" function
10512static void f_jobsend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10513{
10514 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
10515 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
10516
10517 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
10518 return;
10519 }
10520
10521 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
10522 // First argument is the job id and second is the string to write to
10523 // the job's stdin
10524 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
10525 return;
10526 }
10527
10528 Job *job = job_find(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
10529
10530 if (!job) {
10531 // Invalid job id
10532 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
10533 return;
10534 }
10535
10536 WBuffer *buf = wstream_new_buffer(xstrdup((char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string),
10537 strlen((char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string),
10538 1,
10539 free);
10540 rettv->vval.v_number = job_write(job, buf);
10541}
10542
10543// "jobstart()" function
10544static void f_jobstart(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10545{
10546 list_T *args = NULL((void*)0);
10547 listitem_T *arg;
10548 int i, argvl, argsl;
10549 char **argv = NULL((void*)0);
10550
10551 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
10552 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
10553
10554 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
10555 return;
10556 }
10557
10558 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_STRING2
10559 || argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2
10560 || (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_LIST4
10561 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)) {
10562 // Wrong argument types
10563 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
10564 return;
10565 }
10566
10567 argsl = 0;
10568 if (argvars[2].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
10569 args = argvars[2].vval.v_list;
10570 argsl = args->lv_len;
10571 // Assert that all list items are strings
10572 for (arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
10573 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
10574 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
10575 return;
10576 }
10577 }
10578 }
10579
10580 if (!os_can_exe(get_tv_string(&argvars[1]))) {
10581 // String is not executable
10582 EMSG2(e_jobexe, get_tv_string(&argvars[1]))emsg2((char_u *)(e_jobexe), (char_u *)(get_tv_string(&argvars
[1])));
10583 return;
10584 }
10585
10586 // Allocate extra memory for the argument vector and the NULL pointer
10587 argvl = argsl + 2;
10588 argv = xmalloc(sizeof(char_u *) * argvl);
10589
10590 // Copy program name
10591 argv[0] = xstrdup((char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string);
10592
10593 i = 1;
10594 // Copy arguments to the vector
10595 if (argsl > 0) {
10596 for (arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
10597 argv[i++] = xstrdup((char *)arg->li_tv.vval.v_string);
10598 }
10599 }
10600
10601 // The last item of argv must be NULL
10602 argv[i] = NULL((void*)0);
10603
10604 job_start(argv,
10605 xstrdup((char *)argvars[0].vval.v_string),
10606 on_job_stdout,
10607 on_job_stderr,
10608 on_job_exit,
10609 0,
10610 &rettv->vval.v_number);
10611
10612 if (rettv->vval.v_number <= 0) {
10613 if (rettv->vval.v_number == 0) {
10614 EMSG(_(e_jobtblfull))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_jobtblfull))));
10615 } else {
10616 EMSG(_(e_jobexe))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_jobexe))));
10617 }
10618 }
10619}
10620
10621// "jobstop()" function
10622static void f_jobstop(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10623{
10624 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
10625 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
10626
10627 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
10628 return;
10629 }
10630
10631 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
10632 // Only argument is the job id
10633 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
10634 return;
10635 }
10636
10637 Job *job = job_find(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
10638
10639 if (!job) {
10640 // Probably an invalid job id
10641 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
10642 return;
10643 }
10644
10645 job_stop(job);
10646 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
10647}
10648
10649/*
10650 * "join()" function
10651 */
10652static void f_join(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10653{
10654 garray_T ga;
10655 char_u *sep;
10656
10657 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
10658 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
10659 return;
10660 }
10661 if (argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0))
10662 return;
10663 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10664 sep = (char_u *)" ";
10665 else
10666 sep = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
10667
10668 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10669
10670 if (sep != NULL((void*)0)) {
10671 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
10672 list_join(&ga, argvars[0].vval.v_list, sep, TRUE1, 0);
10673 ga_append(&ga, NUL'\000');
10674 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *)ga.ga_data;
10675 } else
10676 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10677}
10678
10679/*
10680 * "keys()" function
10681 */
10682static void f_keys(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10683{
10684 dict_list(argvars, rettv, 0);
10685}
10686
10687/*
10688 * "last_buffer_nr()" function.
10689 */
10690static void f_last_buffer_nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10691{
10692 int n = 0;
10693
10694 FOR_ALL_BUFFERS(buf)for (buf_T *buf = firstbuf; buf != ((void*)0); buf = buf->
b_next) {
10695 if (n < buf->b_fnum) {
10696 n = buf->b_fnum;
10697 }
10698 }
10699
10700 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
10701}
10702
10703/*
10704 * "len()" function
10705 */
10706static void f_len(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10707{
10708 switch (argvars[0].v_type) {
10709 case VAR_STRING2:
10710 case VAR_NUMBER1:
10711 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)STRLEN(strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])))
10712 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])));
10713 break;
10714 case VAR_LIST4:
10715 rettv->vval.v_number = list_len(argvars[0].vval.v_list);
10716 break;
10717 case VAR_DICT5:
10718 rettv->vval.v_number = dict_len(argvars[0].vval.v_dict);
10719 break;
10720 default:
10721 EMSG(_("E701: Invalid type for len()"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E701: Invalid type for len()"
))));
10722 break;
10723 }
10724}
10725
10726static void libcall_common(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int out_type)
10727{
10728 rettv->v_type = out_type;
10729 if (out_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
10730 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10731 }
10732
10733 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
10734 return;
10735 }
10736
10737 // The first two args (libname and funcname) must be strings
10738 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_STRING2 || argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
10739 return;
10740 }
10741
10742 const char *libname = (char *) argvars[0].vval.v_string;
10743 const char *funcname = (char *) argvars[1].vval.v_string;
10744
10745 int in_type = argvars[2].v_type;
10746
10747 // input variables
10748 char *str_in = (in_type == VAR_STRING2)
10749 ? (char *) argvars[2].vval.v_string : NULL((void*)0);
10750 int64_t int_in = argvars[2].vval.v_number;
10751
10752 // output variables
10753 char **str_out = (out_type == VAR_STRING2)
10754 ? (char **) &rettv->vval.v_string : NULL((void*)0);
10755 int64_t int_out = 0;
10756
10757 bool_Bool success = os_libcall(libname, funcname,
10758 str_in, int_in,
10759 str_out, &int_out);
10760
10761 if (!success) {
10762 EMSG2(_(e_libcall), funcname)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_libcall))), (char_u *)(funcname
));
10763 return;
10764 }
10765
10766 if (out_type == VAR_NUMBER1) {
10767 rettv->vval.v_number = (int) int_out;
10768 }
10769}
10770
10771/*
10772 * "libcall()" function
10773 */
10774static void f_libcall(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10775{
10776 libcall_common(argvars, rettv, VAR_STRING2);
10777}
10778
10779/*
10780 * "libcallnr()" function
10781 */
10782static void f_libcallnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10783{
10784 libcall_common(argvars, rettv, VAR_NUMBER1);
10785}
10786
10787/*
10788 * "line(string)" function
10789 */
10790static void f_line(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10791{
10792 linenr_T lnum = 0;
10793 pos_T *fp;
10794 int fnum;
10795
10796 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], TRUE1, &fnum);
10797 if (fp != NULL((void*)0))
10798 lnum = fp->lnum;
10799 rettv->vval.v_number = lnum;
10800}
10801
10802/*
10803 * "line2byte(lnum)" function
10804 */
10805static void f_line2byte(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10806{
10807 linenr_T lnum;
10808
10809 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
10810 if (lnum < 1 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count + 1)
10811 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10812 else
10813 rettv->vval.v_number = ml_find_line_or_offset(curbuf, lnum, NULL((void*)0));
10814 if (rettv->vval.v_number >= 0)
10815 ++rettv->vval.v_number;
10816}
10817
10818/*
10819 * "lispindent(lnum)" function
10820 */
10821static void f_lispindent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10822{
10823 pos_T pos;
10824 linenr_T lnum;
10825
10826 pos = curwin->w_cursor;
10827 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
10828 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
10829 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = lnum;
10830 rettv->vval.v_number = get_lisp_indent();
10831 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
10832 } else
10833 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10834}
10835
10836/*
10837 * "localtime()" function
10838 */
10839static void f_localtime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10840{
10841 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)time(NULL((void*)0));
10842}
10843
10844
10845static void get_maparg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int exact)
10846{
10847 char_u *keys;
10848 char_u *which;
10849 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
10850 char_u *keys_buf = NULL((void*)0);
10851 char_u *rhs;
10852 int mode;
10853 int abbr = FALSE0;
10854 int get_dict = FALSE0;
10855 mapblock_T *mp;
10856 int buffer_local;
10857
10858 /* return empty string for failure */
10859 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10860 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10861
10862 keys = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10863 if (*keys == NUL'\000')
10864 return;
10865
10866 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10867 which = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
10868 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10869 abbr = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
10870 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10871 get_dict = get_tv_number(&argvars[3]);
10872 }
10873 } else
10874 which = (char_u *)"";
10875 if (which == NULL((void*)0))
10876 return;
10877
10878 mode = get_map_mode(&which, 0);
10879
10880 keys = replace_termcodes(keys, &keys_buf, TRUE1, TRUE1, FALSE0);
10881 rhs = check_map(keys, mode, exact, FALSE0, abbr, &mp, &buffer_local);
10882 free(keys_buf);
10883
10884 if (!get_dict) {
10885 /* Return a string. */
10886 if (rhs != NULL((void*)0))
10887 rettv->vval.v_string = str2special_save(rhs, FALSE0);
10888
10889 } else {
10890 rettv_dict_alloc(rettv);
10891 if (rhs != NULL((void*)0)) {
10892 // Return a dictionary.
10893 char_u *lhs = str2special_save(mp->m_keys, TRUE1);
10894 char_u *mapmode = map_mode_to_chars(mp->m_mode);
10895 dict_T *dict = rettv->vval.v_dict;
10896
10897 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "lhs", 0L, lhs);
10898 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "rhs", 0L, mp->m_orig_str);
10899 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "noremap", mp->m_noremap ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
10900 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "expr", mp->m_expr ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
10901 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "silent", mp->m_silent ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
10902 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "sid", (long)mp->m_script_ID, NULL((void*)0));
10903 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "buffer", (long)buffer_local, NULL((void*)0));
10904 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "nowait", mp->m_nowait ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
10905 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "mode", 0L, mapmode);
10906
10907 free(lhs);
10908 free(mapmode);
10909 }
10910 }
10911}
10912
10913/*
10914 * "log()" function
10915 */
10916static void f_log(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10917{
10918 float_T f;
10919
10920 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
10921 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
10922 rettv->vval.v_float = log(f);
10923 else
10924 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
10925}
10926
10927/*
10928 * "log10()" function
10929 */
10930static void f_log10(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10931{
10932 float_T f;
10933
10934 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
10935 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
10936 rettv->vval.v_float = log10(f);
10937 else
10938 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
10939}
10940
10941
10942/*
10943 * "map()" function
10944 */
10945static void f_map(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10946{
10947 filter_map(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
10948}
10949
10950/*
10951 * "maparg()" function
10952 */
10953static void f_maparg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10954{
10955 get_maparg(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
10956}
10957
10958/*
10959 * "mapcheck()" function
10960 */
10961static void f_mapcheck(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10962{
10963 get_maparg(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
10964}
10965
10966
10967static void find_some_match(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int type)
10968{
10969 char_u *str = NULL((void*)0);
10970 long len = 0;
10971 char_u *expr = NULL((void*)0);
10972 char_u *pat;
10973 regmatch_T regmatch;
10974 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
10975 char_u strbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
10976 char_u *save_cpo;
10977 long start = 0;
10978 long nth = 1;
10979 colnr_T startcol = 0;
10980 int match = 0;
10981 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
10982 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
10983 long idx = 0;
10984 char_u *tofree = NULL((void*)0);
10985
10986 /* Make 'cpoptions' empty, the 'l' flag should not be used here. */
10987 save_cpo = p_cpo;
10988 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
10989
10990 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10991 if (type == 3) {
10992 /* return empty list when there are no matches */
10993 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10994 } else if (type == 2) {
10995 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10996 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10997 }
10998
10999 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
11000 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0))
11001 goto theend;
11002 li = l->lv_first;
11003 } else {
11004 expr = str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
11005 len = (long)STRLEN(str)strlen((char *)(str));
11006 }
11007
11008 pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
11009 if (pat == NULL((void*)0))
11010 goto theend;
11011
11012 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11013 int error = FALSE0;
11014
11015 start = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11016 if (error)
11017 goto theend;
11018 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11019 li = list_find(l, start);
11020 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
11021 goto theend;
11022 idx = l->lv_idx; /* use the cached index */
11023 } else {
11024 if (start < 0)
11025 start = 0;
11026 if (start > len)
11027 goto theend;
11028 /* When "count" argument is there ignore matches before "start",
11029 * otherwise skip part of the string. Differs when pattern is "^"
11030 * or "\<". */
11031 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11032 startcol = start;
11033 else {
11034 str += start;
11035 len -= start;
11036 }
11037 }
11038
11039 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11040 nth = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
11041 if (error)
11042 goto theend;
11043 }
11044
11045 regmatch.regprog = vim_regcomp(pat, RE_MAGIC1 + RE_STRING2);
11046 if (regmatch.regprog != NULL((void*)0)) {
11047 regmatch.rm_ic = p_ic;
11048
11049 for (;; ) {
11050 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11051 if (li == NULL((void*)0)) {
11052 match = FALSE0;
11053 break;
11054 }
11055 free(tofree);
11056 str = echo_string(&li->li_tv, &tofree, strbuf, 0);
11057 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
11058 break;
11059 }
11060
11061 match = vim_regexec_nl(&regmatch, str, (colnr_T)startcol);
11062
11063 if (match && --nth <= 0)
11064 break;
11065 if (l == NULL((void*)0) && !match)
11066 break;
11067
11068 /* Advance to just after the match. */
11069 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11070 li = li->li_next;
11071 ++idx;
11072 } else {
11073 startcol = (colnr_T)(regmatch.startp[0]
11074 + (*mb_ptr2len)(regmatch.startp[0]) - str);
11075 if (startcol > (colnr_T)len || str + startcol <= regmatch.startp[0]) {
11076 match = FALSE0;
11077 break;
11078 }
11079 }
11080 }
11081
11082 if (match) {
11083 if (type == 3) {
11084 int i;
11085
11086 /* return list with matched string and submatches */
11087 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; ++i) {
11088 if (regmatch.endp[i] == NULL((void*)0)) {
11089 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, (char_u *)"", 0);
11090 } else {
11091 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list,
11092 regmatch.startp[i],
11093 (int)(regmatch.endp[i] - regmatch.startp[i]));
11094 }
11095 }
11096 } else if (type == 2) {
11097 /* return matched string */
11098 if (l != NULL((void*)0))
11099 copy_tv(&li->li_tv, rettv);
11100 else
11101 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(regmatch.startp[0],
11102 (int)(regmatch.endp[0] - regmatch.startp[0]));
11103 } else if (l != NULL((void*)0))
11104 rettv->vval.v_number = idx;
11105 else {
11106 if (type != 0)
11107 rettv->vval.v_number =
11108 (varnumber_T)(regmatch.startp[0] - str);
11109 else
11110 rettv->vval.v_number =
11111 (varnumber_T)(regmatch.endp[0] - str);
11112 rettv->vval.v_number += (varnumber_T)(str - expr);
11113 }
11114 }
11115 vim_regfree(regmatch.regprog);
11116 }
11117
11118theend:
11119 free(tofree);
11120 p_cpo = save_cpo;
11121}
11122
11123/*
11124 * "match()" function
11125 */
11126static void f_match(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11127{
11128 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 1);
11129}
11130
11131/*
11132 * "matchadd()" function
11133 */
11134static void f_matchadd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11135{
11136 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11137 char_u *grp = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf); /* group */
11138 char_u *pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf); /* pattern */
11139 int prio = 10; /* default priority */
11140 int id = -1;
11141 int error = FALSE0;
11142
11143 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11144
11145 if (grp == NULL((void*)0) || pat == NULL((void*)0))
11146 return;
11147 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11148 prio = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11149 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11150 id = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
11151 }
11152 if (error == TRUE1)
11153 return;
11154 if (id >= 1 && id <= 3) {
11155 EMSGN("E798: ID is reserved for \":match\": %" PRId64, id)emsgn((char_u *)("E798: ID is reserved for \":match\": %" "l"
"d"), (int64_t)(id));
11156 return;
11157 }
11158
11159 rettv->vval.v_number = match_add(curwin, grp, pat, prio, id, NULL((void*)0));
11160}
11161
11162static void f_matchaddpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
11163{
11164 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11165
11166 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11167 char_u *group;
11168 group = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
11169 if (group == NULL((void*)0)) {
11170 return;
11171 }
11172
11173 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
11174 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "matchaddpos()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("matchaddpos()"
));
11175 return;
11176 }
11177
11178 list_T *l;
11179 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
11180 if (l == NULL((void*)0)) {
11181 return;
11182 }
11183
11184 int error = false0;
11185 int prio = 10;
11186 int id = -1;
11187
11188 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11189 prio = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11190 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11191 id = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
11192 }
11193 }
11194 if (error == true1) {
11195 return;
11196 }
11197
11198 // id == 3 is ok because matchaddpos() is supposed to substitute :3match
11199 if (id == 1 || id == 2) {
11200 EMSGN("E798: ID is reserved for \"match\": %" PRId64, id)emsgn((char_u *)("E798: ID is reserved for \"match\": %" "l" "d"
), (int64_t)(id));
11201 return;
11202 }
11203
11204 rettv->vval.v_number = match_add(curwin, group, NULL((void*)0), prio, id, l);
11205}
11206
11207/*
11208 * "matcharg()" function
11209 */
11210static void f_matcharg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11211{
11212 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11213
11214 int id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
11215
11216 if (id >= 1 && id <= 3) {
11217 matchitem_T *m;
11218
11219 if ((m = (matchitem_T *)get_match(curwin, id)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
11220 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, syn_id2name(m->hlg_id), -1);
11221 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, m->pattern, -1);
11222 } else {
11223 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, NULL((void*)0), -1);
11224 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, NULL((void*)0), -1);
11225 }
11226 }
11227}
11228
11229/*
11230 * "matchdelete()" function
11231 */
11232static void f_matchdelete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11233{
11234 rettv->vval.v_number = match_delete(curwin,
11235 (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]), TRUE1);
11236}
11237
11238/*
11239 * "matchend()" function
11240 */
11241static void f_matchend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11242{
11243 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 0);
11244}

11246/*
11247 * "matchlist()" function
11248 */
11249static void f_matchlist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11250{
11251 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 3);
11252}
11253
11254/*
11255 * "matchstr()" function
11256 */
11257static void f_matchstr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11258{
11259 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 2);
11260}
11261
11262
11263static void max_min(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int domax)
11264{
11265 long n = 0;
11266 long i;
11267 int error = FALSE0;
11268
11269 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
11270 list_T *l;
11271 listitem_T *li;
11272
11273 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
11274 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11275 li = l->lv_first;
11276 if (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
11277 n = get_tv_number_chk(&li->li_tv, &error);
11278 for (;; ) {
11279 li = li->li_next;
11280 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
11281 break;
11282 i = get_tv_number_chk(&li->li_tv, &error);
11283 if (domax ? i > n : i < n)
11284 n = i;
11285 }
11286 }
11287 }
11288 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
11289 dict_T *d;
11290 int first = TRUE1;
11291 hashitem_T *hi;
11292 int todo;
11293
11294 d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict;
11295 if (d != NULL((void*)0)) {
11296 todo = (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
11297 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
11298 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
11299 --todo;
11300 i = get_tv_number_chk(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - (dumdi.di_key - (char_u *)&
dumdi)))->di_tv, &error);
11301 if (first) {
11302 n = i;
11303 first = FALSE0;
11304 } else if (domax ? i > n : i < n)
11305 n = i;
11306 }
11307 }
11308 }
11309 } else
11310 EMSG(_(e_listdictarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))));
11311 rettv->vval.v_number = error ? 0 : n;
11312}
11313
11314/*
11315 * "max()" function
11316 */
11317static void f_max(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11318{
11319 max_min(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
11320}
11321
11322/*
11323 * "min()" function
11324 */
11325static void f_min(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11326{
11327 max_min(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
11328}
11329
11330
11331/*
11332 * Create the directory in which "dir" is located, and higher levels when
11333 * needed.
11334 */
11335static int mkdir_recurse(char_u *dir, int prot)
11336{
11337 char_u *p;
11338 char_u *updir;
11339 int r = FAIL0;
11340
11341 /* Get end of directory name in "dir".
11342 * We're done when it's "/" or "c:/". */
11343 p = path_tail_with_sep(dir);
11344 if (p <= get_past_head(dir))
11345 return OK1;
11346
11347 /* If the directory exists we're done. Otherwise: create it.*/
11348 updir = vim_strnsave(dir, (int)(p - dir));
11349 if (os_isdir(updir))
11350 r = OK1;
11351 else if (mkdir_recurse(updir, prot) == OK1)
11352 r = vim_mkdir_emsg(updir, prot);
11353 free(updir);
11354 return r;
11355}
11356
11357/*
11358 * "mkdir()" function
11359 */
11360static void f_mkdir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11361{
11362 char_u *dir;
11363 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11364 int prot = 0755;
11365
11366 rettv->vval.v_number = FAIL0;
11367 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
11368 return;
11369
11370 dir = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[0], buf);
11371 if (*dir == NUL'\000')
11372 rettv->vval.v_number = FAIL0;
11373 else {
11374 if (*path_tail(dir) == NUL'\000')
11375 /* remove trailing slashes */
11376 *path_tail_with_sep(dir) = NUL'\000';
11377
11378 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11379 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11380 prot = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
11381 if (prot != -1 && STRCMP(get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), "p")strcmp((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[1])), (char *)("p"
)) == 0)
11382 mkdir_recurse(dir, prot);
11383 }
11384 rettv->vval.v_number = prot == -1 ? FAIL0 : vim_mkdir_emsg(dir, prot);
11385 }
11386}
11387
11388/*
11389 * "mode()" function
11390 */
11391static void f_mode(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11392{
11393 char_u buf[3];
11394
11395 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
11396 buf[2] = NUL'\000';
11397
11398 if (VIsual_active) {
11399 if (VIsual_select)
11400 buf[0] = VIsual_mode + 's' - 'v';
11401 else
11402 buf[0] = VIsual_mode;
11403 } else if (State == HITRETURN(0x200 + 0x01) || State == ASKMORE0x300 || State == SETWSIZE0x400
11404 || State == CONFIRM0x800) {
11405 buf[0] = 'r';
11406 if (State == ASKMORE0x300)
11407 buf[1] = 'm';
11408 else if (State == CONFIRM0x800)
11409 buf[1] = '?';
11410 } else if (State == EXTERNCMD0x600)
11411 buf[0] = '!';
11412 else if (State & INSERT0x10) {
11413 if (State & VREPLACE_FLAG0x80) {
11414 buf[0] = 'R';
11415 buf[1] = 'v';
11416 } else if (State & REPLACE_FLAG0x40)
11417 buf[0] = 'R';
11418 else
11419 buf[0] = 'i';
11420 } else if (State & CMDLINE0x08) {
11421 buf[0] = 'c';
11422 if (exmode_active)
11423 buf[1] = 'v';
11424 } else if (exmode_active) {
11425 buf[0] = 'c';
11426 buf[1] = 'e';
11427 } else {
11428 buf[0] = 'n';
11429 if (finish_op)
11430 buf[1] = 'o';
11431 }
11432
11433 /* Clear out the minor mode when the argument is not a non-zero number or
11434 * non-empty string. */
11435 if (!non_zero_arg(&argvars[0]))
11436 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
11437
11438 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf);
11439 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11440}
11441
11442
11443/*
11444 * "nextnonblank()" function
11445 */
11446static void f_nextnonblank(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11447{
11448 linenr_T lnum;
11449
11450 for (lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);; ++lnum) {
11451 if (lnum < 0 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
11452 lnum = 0;
11453 break;
11454 }
11455 if (*skipwhite(ml_get(lnum)) != NUL'\000')
11456 break;
11457 }
11458 rettv->vval.v_number = lnum;
11459}
11460
11461/*
11462 * "nr2char()" function
11463 */
11464static void f_nr2char(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11465{
11466 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11467
11468 if (has_mbyte) {
11469 int utf8 = 0;
11470
11471 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11472 utf8 = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
11473 if (utf8)
11474 buf[(*utf_char2bytes)((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]), buf)] = NUL'\000';
11475 else
11476 buf[(*mb_char2bytes)((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]), buf)] = NUL'\000';
11477 } else {
11478 buf[0] = (char_u)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
11479 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
11480 }
11481 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11482 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf);
11483}
11484
11485/*
11486 * "or(expr, expr)" function
11487 */
11488static void f_or(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11489{
11490 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0))
11491 | get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
11492}
11493
11494/*
11495 * "pathshorten()" function
11496 */
11497static void f_pathshorten(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11498{
11499 char_u *p;
11500
11501 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11502 p = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
11503 if (p == NULL((void*)0))
11504 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11505 else {
11506 p = vim_strsave(p);
11507 rettv->vval.v_string = p;
11508 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
11509 shorten_dir(p);
11510 }
11511}
11512
11513/*
11514 * "pow()" function
11515 */
11516static void f_pow(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11517{
11518 float_T fx, fy;
11519
11520 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
11521 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &fx) == OK1
11522 && get_float_arg(&argvars[1], &fy) == OK1)
11523 rettv->vval.v_float = pow(fx, fy);
11524 else
11525 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
11526}
11527
11528/*
11529 * "prevnonblank()" function
11530 */
11531static void f_prevnonblank(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11532{
11533 linenr_T lnum;
11534
11535 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
11536 if (lnum < 1 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
11537 lnum = 0;
11538 else
11539 while (lnum >= 1 && *skipwhite(ml_get(lnum)) == NUL'\000')
11540 --lnum;
11541 rettv->vval.v_number = lnum;
11542}
11543
11544/* This dummy va_list is here because:
11545 * - passing a NULL pointer doesn't work when va_list isn't a pointer
11546 * - locally in the function results in a "used before set" warning
11547 * - using va_start() to initialize it gives "function with fixed args" error */
11548static va_list ap;
11549
11550/*
11551 * "printf()" function
11552 */
11553static void f_printf(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11554{
11555 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11556 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11557 {
11558 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11559 int len;
11560 int saved_did_emsg = did_emsg;
11561 char *fmt;
11562
11563 /* Get the required length, allocate the buffer and do it for real. */
11564 did_emsg = FALSE0;
11565 fmt = (char *)get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[0], buf);
11566 len = vim_vsnprintf(NULL((void*)0), 0, fmt, ap, argvars + 1);
11567 if (!did_emsg) {
11568 char *s = xmalloc(len + 1);
11569 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *)s;
11570 (void)vim_vsnprintf(s, len + 1, fmt, ap, argvars + 1);
11571 }
11572 did_emsg |= saved_did_emsg;
11573 }
11574}
11575
11576/*
11577 * "pumvisible()" function
11578 */
11579static void f_pumvisible(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11580{
11581 if (pum_visible())
11582 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
11583}
11584
11585/*
11586 * "pyeval()" function
11587 */
11588static void f_pyeval(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11589{
11590 script_host_eval("python_eval", argvars, rettv);
11591}
11592
11593/*
11594 * "range()" function
11595 */
11596static void f_range(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11597{
11598 long start;
11599 long end;
11600 long stride = 1;
11601 long i;
11602 int error = FALSE0;
11603
11604 start = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error);
11605 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11606 end = start - 1;
11607 start = 0;
11608 } else {
11609 end = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
11610 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11611 stride = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11612 }
11613
11614 if (error)
11615 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
11616 if (stride == 0)
11617 EMSG(_("E726: Stride is zero"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E726: Stride is zero"))));
11618 else if (stride > 0 ? end + 1 < start : end - 1 > start)
11619 EMSG(_("E727: Start past end"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E727: Start past end"))));
11620 else {
11621 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11622 for (i = start; stride > 0 ? i <= end : i >= end; i += stride) {
11623 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)i);
11624 }
11625 }
11626}
11627
11628/*
11629 * "readfile()" function
11630 */
11631static void f_readfile(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11632{
11633 int binary = FALSE0;
11634 char_u *fname;
11635 FILE *fd;
11636 char_u buf[(IOSIZE(1024+1)/256)*256]; /* rounded to avoid odd + 1 */
11637 int io_size = sizeof(buf);
11638 int readlen; /* size of last fread() */
11639 char_u *prev = NULL((void*)0); /* previously read bytes, if any */
11640 long prevlen = 0; /* length of data in prev */
11641 long prevsize = 0; /* size of prev buffer */
11642 long maxline = MAXLNUM(0x7fffffffL);
11643 long cnt = 0;
11644 char_u *p; /* position in buf */
11645 char_u *start; /* start of current line */
11646
11647 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11648 if (STRCMP(get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), "b")strcmp((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[1])), (char *)("b"
)) == 0)
11649 binary = TRUE1;
11650 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11651 maxline = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
11652 }
11653
11654 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11655
11656 /* Always open the file in binary mode, library functions have a mind of
11657 * their own about CR-LF conversion. */
11658 fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
11659 if (*fname == NUL'\000' || (fd = mch_fopen((char *)fname, READBIN)fopen(((char *)fname), ("r"))) == NULL((void*)0)) {
11660 EMSG2(_(e_notopen), *fname == NUL ? (char_u *)_("<empty>") : fname)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_notopen))), (char_u *)(*fname
== '\000' ? (char_u *)gettext((char *)("<empty>")) : fname
));
11661 return;
11662 }
11663
11664 while (cnt < maxline || maxline < 0) {
11665 readlen = (int)fread(buf, 1, io_size, fd);
11666
11667 /* This for loop processes what was read, but is also entered at end
11668 * of file so that either:
11669 * - an incomplete line gets written
11670 * - a "binary" file gets an empty line at the end if it ends in a
11671 * newline. */
11672 for (p = buf, start = buf;
11673 p < buf + readlen || (readlen <= 0 && (prevlen > 0 || binary));
11674 ++p) {
11675 if (*p == '\n' || readlen <= 0) {
11676 listitem_T *li;
11677 char_u *s = NULL((void*)0);
11678 long_u len = p - start;
11679
11680 /* Finished a line. Remove CRs before NL. */
11681 if (readlen > 0 && !binary) {
11682 while (len > 0 && start[len - 1] == '\r')
11683 --len;
11684 /* removal may cross back to the "prev" string */
11685 if (len == 0)
11686 while (prevlen > 0 && prev[prevlen - 1] == '\r')
11687 --prevlen;
11688 }
11689 if (prevlen == 0)
11690 s = vim_strnsave(start, (int)len);
11691 else {
11692 /* Change "prev" buffer to be the right size. This way
11693 * the bytes are only copied once, and very long lines are
11694 * allocated only once. */
11695 s = xrealloc(prev, prevlen + len + 1);
11696 memcpy(s + prevlen, start, len);
11697 s[prevlen + len] = NUL'\000';
11698 prev = NULL((void*)0); /* the list will own the string */
11699 prevlen = prevsize = 0;
11700 }
11701
11702 li = listitem_alloc();
11703 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11704 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
11705 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = s;
11706 list_append(rettv->vval.v_list, li);
11707
11708 start = p + 1; /* step over newline */
11709 if ((++cnt >= maxline && maxline >= 0) || readlen <= 0)
11710 break;
11711 } else if (*p == NUL'\000')
11712 *p = '\n';
11713 /* Check for utf8 "bom"; U+FEFF is encoded as EF BB BF. Do this
11714 * when finding the BF and check the previous two bytes. */
11715 else if (*p == 0xbf && enc_utf8 && !binary) {
11716 /* Find the two bytes before the 0xbf. If p is at buf, or buf
11717 * + 1, these may be in the "prev" string. */
11718 char_u back1 = p >= buf + 1 ? p[-1]
11719 : prevlen >= 1 ? prev[prevlen - 1] : NUL'\000';
11720 char_u back2 = p >= buf + 2 ? p[-2]
11721 : p == buf + 1 && prevlen >= 1 ? prev[prevlen - 1]
11722 : prevlen >= 2 ? prev[prevlen - 2] : NUL'\000';
11723
11724 if (back2 == 0xef && back1 == 0xbb) {
11725 char_u *dest = p - 2;
11726
11727 /* Usually a BOM is at the beginning of a file, and so at
11728 * the beginning of a line; then we can just step over it.
11729 */
11730 if (start == dest)
11731 start = p + 1;
11732 else {
11733 /* have to shuffle buf to close gap */
11734 int adjust_prevlen = 0;
11735
11736 if (dest < buf) {
11737 adjust_prevlen = (int)(buf - dest); /* must be 1 or 2 */
11738 dest = buf;
11739 }
11740 if (readlen > p - buf + 1)
11741 memmove(dest, p + 1, readlen - (p - buf) - 1);
11742 readlen -= 3 - adjust_prevlen;
11743 prevlen -= adjust_prevlen;
11744 p = dest - 1;
11745 }
11746 }
11747 }
11748 } /* for */
11749
11750 if ((cnt >= maxline && maxline >= 0) || readlen <= 0)
11751 break;
11752 if (start < p) {
11753 /* There's part of a line in buf, store it in "prev". */
11754 if (p - start + prevlen >= prevsize) {
11755
11756 /* A common use case is ordinary text files and "prev" gets a
11757 * fragment of a line, so the first allocation is made
11758 * small, to avoid repeatedly 'allocing' large and
11759 * 'reallocing' small. */
11760 if (prevsize == 0)
11761 prevsize = (long)(p - start);
11762 else {
11763 long grow50pc = (prevsize * 3) / 2;
11764 long growmin = (long)((p - start) * 2 + prevlen);
11765 prevsize = grow50pc > growmin ? grow50pc : growmin;
11766 }
11767 prev = xrealloc(prev, prevsize);
11768 }
11769 /* Add the line part to end of "prev". */
11770 memmove(prev + prevlen, start, p - start);
11771 prevlen += (long)(p - start);
11772 }
11773 } /* while */
11774
11775 /*
11776 * For a negative line count use only the lines at the end of the file,
11777 * free the rest.
11778 */
11779 if (maxline < 0)
11780 while (cnt > -maxline) {
11781 listitem_remove(rettv->vval.v_list, rettv->vval.v_list->lv_first);
11782 --cnt;
11783 }
11784
11785 free(prev);
11786 fclose(fd);
11787}
11788
11789
11790/// list2proftime - convert a List to proftime_T
11791///
11792/// @param arg The input list, must be of type VAR_LIST and have
11793/// exactly 2 items
11794/// @param[out] tm The proftime_T representation of `arg`
11795/// @return OK In case of success, FAIL in case of error
11796static int list2proftime(typval_T *arg, proftime_T *tm) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
11797{
11798 if (arg->v_type != VAR_LIST4
11799 || arg->vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)
11800 || arg->vval.v_list->lv_len != 2) {
11801 return FAIL0;
11802 }
11803
11804 int error = false0;
11805 varnumber_T n1 = list_find_nr(arg->vval.v_list, 0L, &error);
11806 varnumber_T n2 = list_find_nr(arg->vval.v_list, 1L, &error);
11807 if (error) {
11808 return FAIL0;
11809 }
11810
11811 // in f_reltime() we split up the 64-bit proftime_T into two 32-bit
11812 // values, now we combine them again.
11813 union {
11814 struct { varnumber_T low, high; } split;
11815 proftime_T prof;
11816 } u = { .split.high = n1, .split.low = n2 };
11817
11818 *tm = u.prof;
11819
11820 return OK1;
11821}
11822
11823/// f_reltime - return an item that represents a time value
11824///
11825/// @param[out] rettv Without an argument it returns the current time. With
11826/// one argument it returns the time passed since the argument.
11827/// With two arguments it returns the time passed between
11828/// the two arguments.
11829static void f_reltime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
11830{
11831 proftime_T res;
11832 proftime_T start;
11833
11834 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11835 // no arguments: get current time.
11836 res = profile_start();
11837 } else if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11838 if (list2proftime(&argvars[0], &res) == FAIL0) {
11839 return;
11840 }
11841 res = profile_end(res);
11842 } else {
11843 // two arguments: compute the difference.
11844 if (list2proftime(&argvars[0], &start) == FAIL0
11845 || list2proftime(&argvars[1], &res) == FAIL0) {
11846 return;
11847 }
11848 res = profile_sub(res, start);
11849 }
11850
11851 // we have to store the 64-bit proftime_T inside of a list of int's
11852 // (varnumber_T is defined as int). For all our supported platforms, int's
11853 // are at least 32-bits wide. So we'll use two 32-bit values to store it.
11854 union {
11855 struct { varnumber_T low, high; } split;
11856 proftime_T prof;
11857 } u = { .prof = res };
11858
11859 // statically assert that the union type conv will provide the correct
11860 // results, if varnumber_T or proftime_T change, the union cast will need
11861 // to be revised.
11862 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(u.prof) == sizeof(u) && sizeof(u.split) == sizeof(u),clang diagnostic push clang diagnostic ignored "-Wc11-extensions"
_Static_assert(sizeof(u.prof) == sizeof(u) && sizeof
(u.split) == sizeof(u), "type punning will produce incorrect results on this platform"
); clang diagnostic pop
11863 "type punning will produce incorrect results on this platform")clang diagnostic push clang diagnostic ignored "-Wc11-extensions"
_Static_assert(sizeof(u.prof) == sizeof(u) && sizeof
(u.split) == sizeof(u), "type punning will produce incorrect results on this platform"
); clang diagnostic pop ;
11864
11865 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11866 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, u.split.high);
11867 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, u.split.low);
11868}
11869
11870/// f_reltimestr - return a string that represents the value of {time}
11871///
11872/// @return The string representation of the argument, the format is the
11873/// number of seconds followed by a dot, followed by the number
11874/// of microseconds.
11875static void f_reltimestr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11876 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
11877{
11878 proftime_T tm;
11879
11880 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11881 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11882 if (list2proftime(&argvars[0], &tm) == OK1) {
11883 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) xstrdup(profile_msg(tm));
11884 }
11885}
11886
11887/*
11888 * "remove()" function
11889 */
11890static void f_remove(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11891{
11892 list_T *l;
11893 listitem_T *item, *item2;
11894 listitem_T *li;
11895 long idx;
11896 long end;
11897 char_u *key;
11898 dict_T *d;
11899 dictitem_T *di;
11900 char *arg_errmsg = N_("remove() argument")"remove() argument";
11901
11902 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
11903 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11904 EMSG2(_(e_toomanyarg), "remove()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_toomanyarg))), (char_u *)
("remove()"));
11905 else if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)
11906 && !tv_check_lock(d->dv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg)))) {
11907 key = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
11908 if (key != NULL((void*)0)) {
11909 di = dict_find(d, key, -1);
11910 if (di == NULL((void*)0))
11911 EMSG2(_(e_dictkey), key)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictkey))), (char_u *)(key
));
11912 else {
11913 *rettv = di->di_tv;
11914 init_tv(&di->di_tv);
11915 dictitem_remove(d, di);
11916 }
11917 }
11918 }
11919 } else if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4)
