11920 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "remove()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("remove()"));
11921 else if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
11922 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, (char_u *)_(arg_errmsg)gettext((char *)(arg_errmsg)))) {
11923 int error = FALSE0;
11924
11925 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
11926 if (error)
11927 ; /* type error: do nothing, errmsg already given */
11928 else if ((item = list_find(l, idx)) == NULL((void*)0))
11929 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), idx)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(idx
));
11930 else {
11931 if (argvars[2].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11932 // Remove one item, return its value.
11933 vim_list_remove(l, item, item);
11934 *rettv = item->li_tv;
11935 free(item);
11936 } else {
11937 /* Remove range of items, return list with values. */
11938 end = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11939 if (error)
11940 ; /* type error: do nothing */
11941 else if ((item2 = list_find(l, end)) == NULL((void*)0))
11942 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), end)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(end
));
11943 else {
11944 int cnt = 0;
11945
11946 for (li = item; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
11947 ++cnt;
11948 if (li == item2)
11949 break;
11950 }
11951 if (li == NULL((void*)0)) /* didn't find "item2" after "item" */
11952 EMSG(_(e_invrange))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invrange))));
11953 else {
11954 vim_list_remove(l, item, item2);
11955 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11956 l = rettv->vval.v_list;
11957 l->lv_first = item;
11958 l->lv_last = item2;
11959 item->li_prev = NULL((void*)0);
11960 item2->li_next = NULL((void*)0);
11961 l->lv_len = cnt;
11962 }
11963 }
11964 }
11965 }
11966 }
11967}
11968
11969/*
11970 * "rename({from}, {to})" function
11971 */
11972static void f_rename(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11973{
11974 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
11975
11976 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
11977 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11978 else
11979 rettv->vval.v_number = vim_rename(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]),
11980 get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf));
11981}
11982
11983/*
11984 * "repeat()" function
11985 */
11986static void f_repeat(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11987{
11988 char_u *p;
11989 int n;
11990
11991 n = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
11992 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
11993 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11994 if (argvars[0].vval.v_list != NULL((void*)0)) {
11995 while (n-- > 0) {
11996 list_extend(rettv->vval.v_list, argvars[0].vval.v_list, NULL((void*)0));
11997 }
11998 }
11999 } else {
12000 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
12001 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12002 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12003
12004 int slen = (int)STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p));
12005 int len = slen * n;
12006 if (len <= 0)
12007 return;
12008
12009 char_u *r = xmallocz(len);
12010 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
12011 memmove(r + i * slen, p, (size_t)slen);
12012
12013 rettv->vval.v_string = r;
12014 }
12015}
12016
12017/*
12018 * "resolve()" function
12019 */
12020static void f_resolve(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12021{
12022 char_u *p;
12023#ifdef HAVE_READLINK
12024 char_u *buf = NULL((void*)0);
12025#endif
12026
12027 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
12028#ifdef FEAT_SHORTCUT
12029 {
12030 char_u *v = NULL((void*)0);
12031
12032 v = mch_resolve_shortcut(p);
12033 if (v != NULL((void*)0))
12034 rettv->vval.v_string = v;
12035 else
12036 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
12037 }
12038#else
12039# ifdef HAVE_READLINK
12040 {
12041 char_u *cpy;
12042 int len;
12043 char_u *remain = NULL((void*)0);
12044 char_u *q;
12045 int is_relative_to_current = FALSE0;
12046 int has_trailing_pathsep = FALSE0;
12047 int limit = 100;
12048
12049 p = vim_strsave(p);
12050
12051 if (p[0] == '.' && (vim_ispathsep(p[1])
12052 || (p[1] == '.' && (vim_ispathsep(p[2])))))
12053 is_relative_to_current = TRUE1;
12054
12055 len = STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p));
12056 if (len > 0 && after_pathsep(p, p + len)) {
12057 has_trailing_pathsep = TRUE1;
12058 p[len - 1] = NUL'\000'; /* the trailing slash breaks readlink() */
12059 }
12060
12061 q = path_next_component(p);
12062 if (*q != NUL'\000') {
12063 /* Separate the first path component in "p", and keep the
12064 * remainder (beginning with the path separator). */
12065 remain = vim_strsave(q - 1);
12066 q[-1] = NUL'\000';
12067 }
12068
12069 buf = xmallocz(MAXPATHL4096);
12070
12071 for (;; ) {
12072 for (;; ) {
12073 len = readlink((char *)p, (char *)buf, MAXPATHL4096);
12074 if (len <= 0)
12075 break;
12076 buf[len] = NUL'\000';
12077
12078 if (limit-- == 0) {
12079 free(p);
12080 free(remain);
12081 EMSG(_("E655: Too many symbolic links (cycle?)"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E655: Too many symbolic links (cycle?)"
))));
12082 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12083 goto fail;
12084 }
12085
12086 /* Ensure that the result will have a trailing path separator
12087 * if the argument has one. */
12088 if (remain == NULL((void*)0) && has_trailing_pathsep)
12089 add_pathsep(buf);
12090
12091 /* Separate the first path component in the link value and
12092 * concatenate the remainders. */
12093 q = path_next_component(vim_ispathsep(*buf) ? buf + 1 : buf);
12094 if (*q != NUL'\000') {
12095 cpy = remain;
12096 remain = remain ?
12097 concat_str(q - 1, remain) : (char_u *) xstrdup((char *)q - 1);
12098 free(cpy);
12099 q[-1] = NUL'\000';
12100 }
12101
12102 q = path_tail(p);
12103 if (q > p && *q == NUL'\000') {
12104 /* Ignore trailing path separator. */
12105 q[-1] = NUL'\000';
12106 q = path_tail(p);
12107 }
12108 if (q > p && !path_is_absolute_path(buf)) {
12109 /* symlink is relative to directory of argument */
12110 cpy = xmalloc(STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p)) + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)) + 1);
12111 STRCPY(cpy, p)strcpy((char *)(cpy), (char *)(p));
12112 STRCPY(path_tail(cpy), buf)strcpy((char *)(path_tail(cpy)), (char *)(buf));
12113 free(p);
12114 p = cpy;
12115 } else {
12116 free(p);
12117 p = vim_strsave(buf);
12118 }
12119 }
12120
12121 if (remain == NULL((void*)0))
12122 break;
12123
12124 /* Append the first path component of "remain" to "p". */
12125 q = path_next_component(remain + 1);
12126 len = q - remain - (*q != NUL'\000');
12127 cpy = vim_strnsave(p, STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p)) + len);
12128 STRNCAT(cpy, remain, len)strncat((char *)(cpy), (char *)(remain), (size_t)(len));
12129 free(p);
12130 p = cpy;
12131
12132 /* Shorten "remain". */
12133 if (*q != NUL'\000')
12134 STRMOVE(remain, q - 1)memmove((remain), (q - 1), strlen((char *)(q - 1)) + 1);
12135 else {
12136 free(remain);
12137 remain = NULL((void*)0);
12138 }
12139 }
12140
12141 /* If the result is a relative path name, make it explicitly relative to
12142 * the current directory if and only if the argument had this form. */
12143 if (!vim_ispathsep(*p)) {
12144 if (is_relative_to_current
12145 && *p != NUL'\000'
12146 && !(p[0] == '.'
12147 && (p[1] == NUL'\000'
12148 || vim_ispathsep(p[1])
12149 || (p[1] == '.'
12150 && (p[2] == NUL'\000'
12151 || vim_ispathsep(p[2])))))) {
12152 /* Prepend "./". */
12153 cpy = concat_str((char_u *)"./", p);
12154 free(p);
12155 p = cpy;
12156 } else if (!is_relative_to_current) {
12157 /* Strip leading "./". */
12158 q = p;
12159 while (q[0] == '.' && vim_ispathsep(q[1]))
12160 q += 2;
12161 if (q > p)
12162 STRMOVE(p, p + 2)memmove((p), (p + 2), strlen((char *)(p + 2)) + 1);
12163 }
12164 }
12165
12166 /* Ensure that the result will have no trailing path separator
12167 * if the argument had none. But keep "/" or "//". */
12168 if (!has_trailing_pathsep) {
12169 q = p + STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p));
12170 if (after_pathsep(p, q))
12171 *path_tail_with_sep(p) = NUL'\000';
12172 }
12173
12174 rettv->vval.v_string = p;
12175 }
12176# else
12177 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
12178# endif
12179#endif
12180
12181 simplify_filename(rettv->vval.v_string);
12182
12183#ifdef HAVE_READLINK
12184fail:
12185 free(buf);
12186#endif
12187 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12188}
12189
12190/*
12191 * "reverse({list})" function
12192 */
12193static void f_reverse(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12194{
12195 list_T *l;
12196 listitem_T *li, *ni;
12197
12198 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4)
12199 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "reverse()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("reverse()"
));
12200 else if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
12201 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, (char_u *)_("reverse() argument")gettext((char *)("reverse() argument")))) {
12202 li = l->lv_last;
12203 l->lv_first = l->lv_last = NULL((void*)0);
12204 l->lv_len = 0;
12205 while (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
12206 ni = li->li_prev;
12207 list_append(l, li);
12208 li = ni;
12209 }
12210 rettv->vval.v_list = l;
12211 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
12212 ++l->lv_refcount;
12213 l->lv_idx = l->lv_len - l->lv_idx - 1;
12214 }
12215}
12216
12217#define SP_NOMOVE0x01 0x01 /* don't move cursor */
12218#define SP_REPEAT0x02 0x02 /* repeat to find outer pair */
12219#define SP_RETCOUNT0x04 0x04 /* return matchcount */
12220#define SP_SETPCMARK0x08 0x08 /* set previous context mark */
12221#define SP_START0x10 0x10 /* accept match at start position */
12222#define SP_SUBPAT0x20 0x20 /* return nr of matching sub-pattern */
12223#define SP_END0x40 0x40 /* leave cursor at end of match */
12224
12225
12226/*
12227 * Get flags for a search function.
12228 * Possibly sets "p_ws".
12229 * Returns BACKWARD, FORWARD or zero (for an error).
12230 */
12231static int get_search_arg(typval_T *varp, int *flagsp)
12232{
12233 int dir = FORWARD1;
12234 char_u *flags;
12235 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
12236 int mask;
12237
12238 if (varp->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12239 flags = get_tv_string_buf_chk(varp, nbuf);
12240 if (flags == NULL((void*)0))
12241 return 0; /* type error; errmsg already given */
12242 while (*flags != NUL'\000') {
12243 switch (*flags) {
12244 case 'b': dir = BACKWARD(-1); break;
12245 case 'w': p_ws = true1; break;
12246 case 'W': p_ws = false0; break;
12247 default: mask = 0;
12248 if (flagsp != NULL((void*)0))
12249 switch (*flags) {
12250 case 'c': mask = SP_START0x10; break;
12251 case 'e': mask = SP_END0x40; break;
12252 case 'm': mask = SP_RETCOUNT0x04; break;
12253 case 'n': mask = SP_NOMOVE0x01; break;
12254 case 'p': mask = SP_SUBPAT0x20; break;
12255 case 'r': mask = SP_REPEAT0x02; break;
12256 case 's': mask = SP_SETPCMARK0x08; break;
12257 }
12258 if (mask == 0) {
12259 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), flags)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(flags
));
12260 dir = 0;
12261 } else
12262 *flagsp |= mask;
12263 }
12264 if (dir == 0)
12265 break;
12266 ++flags;
12267 }
12268 }
12269 return dir;
12270}
12271
12272/*
12273 * Shared by search() and searchpos() functions
12274 */
12275static int search_cmn(typval_T *argvars, pos_T *match_pos, int *flagsp)
12276{
12277 int flags;
12278 char_u *pat;
12279 pos_T pos;
12280 pos_T save_cursor;
12281 bool_Bool save_p_ws = p_ws;
12282 int dir;
12283 int retval = 0; /* default: FAIL */
12284 long lnum_stop = 0;
12285 proftime_T tm;
12286 long time_limit = 0;
12287 int options = SEARCH_KEEP0x400;
12288 int subpatnum;
12289
12290 pat = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
12291 dir = get_search_arg(&argvars[1], flagsp); /* may set p_ws */
12292 if (dir == 0)
12293 goto theend;
12294 flags = *flagsp;
12295 if (flags & SP_START0x10)
12296 options |= SEARCH_START0x100;
12297 if (flags & SP_END0x40)
12298 options |= SEARCH_END0x40;
12299
12300 /* Optional arguments: line number to stop searching and timeout. */
12301 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12302 lnum_stop = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
12303 if (lnum_stop < 0)
12304 goto theend;
12305 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12306 time_limit = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], NULL((void*)0));
12307 if (time_limit < 0)
12308 goto theend;
12309 }
12310 }
12311
12312 /* Set the time limit, if there is one. */
12313 tm = profile_setlimit(time_limit);
12314
12315 /*
12316 * This function does not accept SP_REPEAT and SP_RETCOUNT flags.
12317 * Check to make sure only those flags are set.
12318 * Also, Only the SP_NOMOVE or the SP_SETPCMARK flag can be set. Both
12319 * flags cannot be set. Check for that condition also.
12320 */
12321 if (((flags & (SP_REPEAT0x02 | SP_RETCOUNT0x04)) != 0)
12322 || ((flags & SP_NOMOVE0x01) && (flags & SP_SETPCMARK0x08))) {
12323 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), get_tv_string(&argvars[1]))emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(get_tv_string
(&argvars[1])));
12324 goto theend;
12325 }
12326
12327 pos = save_cursor = curwin->w_cursor;
12328 subpatnum = searchit(curwin, curbuf, &pos, dir, pat, 1L,
12329 options, RE_SEARCH0, (linenr_T)lnum_stop, &tm);
12330 if (subpatnum != FAIL0) {
12331 if (flags & SP_SUBPAT0x20)
12332 retval = subpatnum;
12333 else
12334 retval = pos.lnum;
12335 if (flags & SP_SETPCMARK0x08)
12336 setpcmark();
12337 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
12338 if (match_pos != NULL((void*)0)) {
12339 /* Store the match cursor position */
12340 match_pos->lnum = pos.lnum;
12341 match_pos->col = pos.col + 1;
12342 }
12343 /* "/$" will put the cursor after the end of the line, may need to
12344 * correct that here */
12345 check_cursor();
12346 }
12347
12348 /* If 'n' flag is used: restore cursor position. */
12349 if (flags & SP_NOMOVE0x01)
12350 curwin->w_cursor = save_cursor;
12351 else
12352 curwin->w_set_curswant = TRUE1;
12353theend:
12354 p_ws = save_p_ws;
12355
12356 return retval;
12357}
12358
12359/*
12360 * "round({float})" function
12361 */
12362static void f_round(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12363{
12364 float_T f;
12365
12366 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
12367 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
12368 rettv->vval.v_float = round(f);
12369 else
12370 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
12371}
12372
12373// "rpcnotify()" function
12374static void f_rpcnotify(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12375{
12376 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
12377 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
12378
12379 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
12380 return;
12381 }
12382
12383 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || argvars[0].vval.v_number < 0) {
12384 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Channel id must be a positive integer")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Channel id must be a positive integer"
));
12385 return;
12386 }
12387
12388 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
12389 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Event type must be a string")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Event type must be a string"
));
12390 return;
12391 }
12392
12393 Array args = ARRAY_DICT_INIT{.size = 0, .capacity = 0, .items = ((void*)0)};
12394
12395 for (typval_T *tv = argvars + 2; tv->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0; tv++) {
12396 ADD(args, vim_to_object(tv))do { if ((args).size == (args).capacity) { (args).capacity = (
args).capacity? (args).capacity<<1 : 8; (args).items = (
Object*)xrealloc((args).items, sizeof(Object) * (args).capacity
); } (args).items[(args).size++] = (vim_to_object(tv)); } while
(0);
12397 }
12398
12399 if (!channel_send_event((uint64_t)argvars[0].vval.v_number,
12400 (char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string,
12401 args)) {
12402 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Channel doesn't exist")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Channel doesn't exist"
));
12403 return;
12404 }
12405
12406 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
12407}
12408
12409// "rpcrequest()" function
12410static void f_rpcrequest(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12411{
12412 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
12413 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
12414
12415 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
12416 return;
12417 }
12418
12419 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || argvars[0].vval.v_number <= 0) {
12420 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Channel id must be a positive integer")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Channel id must be a positive integer"
));
12421 return;
12422 }
12423
12424 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
12425 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Method name must be a string")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Method name must be a string"
));
12426 return;
12427 }
12428
12429 Array args = ARRAY_DICT_INIT{.size = 0, .capacity = 0, .items = ((void*)0)};
12430
12431 for (typval_T *tv = argvars + 2; tv->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0; tv++) {
12432 ADD(args, vim_to_object(tv))do { if ((args).size == (args).capacity) { (args).capacity = (
args).capacity? (args).capacity<<1 : 8; (args).items = (
Object*)xrealloc((args).items, sizeof(Object) * (args).capacity
); } (args).items[(args).size++] = (vim_to_object(tv)); } while
(0);
12433 }
12434
12435 bool_Bool errored;
12436 Object result;
12437 if (!channel_send_call((uint64_t)argvars[0].vval.v_number,
12438 (char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string,
12439 args,
12440 &result,
12441 &errored)) {
12442 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "Channel doesn't exist")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("Channel doesn't exist"
));
12443 return;
12444 }
12445
12446 if (errored) {
12447 vim_report_error(result.data.string);
12448 goto end;
12449 }
12450
12451 Error conversion_error = {.set = false0};
12452 if (!object_to_vim(result, rettv, &conversion_error)) {
12453 EMSG(_("Error converting the call result"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Error converting the call result"
))));
12454 }
12455
12456end:
12457 api_free_object(result);
12458}
12459
12460// "rpcstart()" function
12461static void f_rpcstart(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12462{
12463 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
12464 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
12465
12466 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
12467 return;
12468 }
12469
12470 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_STRING2
12471 || (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)) {
12472 // Wrong argument types
12473 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
12474 return;
12475 }
12476
12477 list_T *args = NULL((void*)0);
12478 int argsl = 0;
12479 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
12480 args = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
12481 argsl = args->lv_len;
12482 // Assert that all list items are strings
12483 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
12484 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
12485 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
12486 return;
12487 }
12488 }
12489 }
12490
12491 // Allocate extra memory for the argument vector and the NULL pointer
12492 int argvl = argsl + 2;
12493 char **argv = xmalloc(sizeof(char_u *) * argvl);
12494
12495 // Copy program name
12496 argv[0] = xstrdup((char *)argvars[0].vval.v_string);
12497
12498 int i = 1;
12499 // Copy arguments to the vector
12500 if (argsl > 0) {
12501 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
12502 argv[i++] = xstrdup((char *)arg->li_tv.vval.v_string);
12503 }
12504 }
12505
12506 // The last item of argv must be NULL
12507 argv[i] = NULL((void*)0);
12508 uint64_t channel_id = channel_from_job(argv);
12509
12510 if (!channel_id) {
12511 EMSG(_(e_api_spawn_failed))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_api_spawn_failed))));
12512 }
12513
12514 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)channel_id;
12515}
12516
12517// "rpcstop()" function
12518static void f_rpcstop(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12519{
12520 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
12521 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
12522
12523 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
12524 return;
12525 }
12526
12527 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
12528 // Wrong argument types
12529 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
12530 return;
12531 }
12532
12533 rettv->vval.v_number = channel_close(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
12534}
12535
12536/*
12537 * "screenattr()" function
12538 */
12539static void f_screenattr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12540{
12541 int row;
12542 int col;
12543 int c;
12544
12545 row = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
12546 col = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
12547 if (row < 0 || row >= screen_Rows
12548 || col < 0 || col >= screen_Columns)
12549 c = -1;
12550 else
12551 c = ScreenAttrs[LineOffset[row] + col];
12552 rettv->vval.v_number = c;
12553}
12554
12555/*
12556 * "screenchar()" function
12557 */
12558static void f_screenchar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12559{
12560 int row;
12561 int col;
12562 int off;
12563 int c;
12564
12565 row = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
12566 col = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
12567 if (row < 0 || row >= screen_Rows
12568 || col < 0 || col >= screen_Columns)
12569 c = -1;
12570 else {
12571 off = LineOffset[row] + col;
12572 if (enc_utf8 && ScreenLinesUC[off] != 0)
12573 c = ScreenLinesUC[off];
12574 else
12575 c = ScreenLines[off];
12576 }
12577 rettv->vval.v_number = c;
12578}
12579
12580/*
12581 * "screencol()" function
12582 *
12583 * First column is 1 to be consistent with virtcol().
12584 */
12585static void f_screencol(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12586{
12587 rettv->vval.v_number = screen_screencol() + 1;
12588}
12589
12590/*
12591 * "screenrow()" function
12592 */
12593static void f_screenrow(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12594{
12595 rettv->vval.v_number = screen_screenrow() + 1;
12596}
12597
12598/*
12599 * "search()" function
12600 */
12601static void f_search(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12602{
12603 int flags = 0;
12604
12605 rettv->vval.v_number = search_cmn(argvars, NULL((void*)0), &flags);
12606}
12607
12608/*
12609 * "searchdecl()" function
12610 */
12611static void f_searchdecl(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12612{
12613 int locally = 1;
12614 int thisblock = 0;
12615 int error = FALSE0;
12616 char_u *name;
12617
12618 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* default: FAIL */
12619
12620 name = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
12621 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12622 locally = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error) == 0;
12623 if (!error && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12624 thisblock = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error) != 0;
12625 }
12626 if (!error && name != NULL((void*)0))
12627 rettv->vval.v_number = find_decl(name, (int)STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)),
12628 locally, thisblock, SEARCH_KEEP0x400) == FAIL0;
12629}
12630
12631/*
12632 * Used by searchpair() and searchpairpos()
12633 */
12634static int searchpair_cmn(typval_T *argvars, pos_T *match_pos)
12635{
12636 char_u *spat, *mpat, *epat;
12637 char_u *skip;
12638 bool_Bool save_p_ws = p_ws;
12639 int dir;
12640 int flags = 0;
12641 char_u nbuf1[NUMBUFLEN30];
12642 char_u nbuf2[NUMBUFLEN30];
12643 char_u nbuf3[NUMBUFLEN30];
12644 int retval = 0; /* default: FAIL */
12645 long lnum_stop = 0;
12646 long time_limit = 0;
12647
12648 /* Get the three pattern arguments: start, middle, end. */
12649 spat = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
12650 mpat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], nbuf1);
12651 epat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], nbuf2);
12652 if (spat == NULL((void*)0) || mpat == NULL((void*)0) || epat == NULL((void*)0))
12653 goto theend; /* type error */
12654
12655 /* Handle the optional fourth argument: flags */
12656 dir = get_search_arg(&argvars[3], &flags); /* may set p_ws */
12657 if (dir == 0)
12658 goto theend;
12659
12660 /* Don't accept SP_END or SP_SUBPAT.
12661 * Only one of the SP_NOMOVE or SP_SETPCMARK flags can be set.
12662 */
12663 if ((flags & (SP_END0x40 | SP_SUBPAT0x20)) != 0
12664 || ((flags & SP_NOMOVE0x01) && (flags & SP_SETPCMARK0x08))) {
12665 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), get_tv_string(&argvars[3]))emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(get_tv_string
(&argvars[3])));
12666 goto theend;
12667 }
12668
12669 /* Using 'r' implies 'W', otherwise it doesn't work. */
12670 if (flags & SP_REPEAT0x02)
12671 p_ws = false0;
12672
12673 /* Optional fifth argument: skip expression */
12674 if (argvars[3].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0
12675 || argvars[4].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12676 skip = (char_u *)"";
12677 else {
12678 skip = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[4], nbuf3);
12679 if (argvars[5].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12680 lnum_stop = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[5], NULL((void*)0));
12681 if (lnum_stop < 0)
12682 goto theend;
12683 if (argvars[6].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12684 time_limit = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[6], NULL((void*)0));
12685 if (time_limit < 0)
12686 goto theend;
12687 }
12688 }
12689 }
12690 if (skip == NULL((void*)0))
12691 goto theend; /* type error */
12692
12693 retval = do_searchpair(spat, mpat, epat, dir, skip, flags,
12694 match_pos, lnum_stop, time_limit);
12695
12696theend:
12697 p_ws = save_p_ws;
12698
12699 return retval;
12700}
12701
12702/*
12703 * "searchpair()" function
12704 */
12705static void f_searchpair(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12706{
12707 rettv->vval.v_number = searchpair_cmn(argvars, NULL((void*)0));
12708}
12709
12710/*
12711 * "searchpairpos()" function
12712 */
12713static void f_searchpairpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12714{
12715 pos_T match_pos;
12716 int lnum = 0;
12717 int col = 0;
12718
12719 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
12720
12721 if (searchpair_cmn(argvars, &match_pos) > 0) {
12722 lnum = match_pos.lnum;
12723 col = match_pos.col;
12724 }
12725
12726 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)lnum);
12727 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)col);
12728}
12729
12730/*
12731 * Search for a start/middle/end thing.
12732 * Used by searchpair(), see its documentation for the details.
12733 * Returns 0 or -1 for no match,
12734 */
12735long
12736do_searchpair (
12737 char_u *spat, /* start pattern */
12738 char_u *mpat, /* middle pattern */
12739 char_u *epat, /* end pattern */
12740 int dir, /* BACKWARD or FORWARD */
12741 char_u *skip, /* skip expression */
12742 int flags, /* SP_SETPCMARK and other SP_ values */
12743 pos_T *match_pos,
12744 linenr_T lnum_stop, /* stop at this line if not zero */
12745 long time_limit /* stop after this many msec */
12746)
12747{
12748 char_u *save_cpo;
12749 char_u *pat, *pat2 = NULL((void*)0), *pat3 = NULL((void*)0);
12750 long retval = 0;
12751 pos_T pos;
12752 pos_T firstpos;
12753 pos_T foundpos;
12754 pos_T save_cursor;
12755 pos_T save_pos;
12756 int n;
12757 int r;
12758 int nest = 1;
12759 int err;
12760 int options = SEARCH_KEEP0x400;
12761 proftime_T tm;
12762
12763 /* Make 'cpoptions' empty, the 'l' flag should not be used here. */
12764 save_cpo = p_cpo;
12765 p_cpo = empty_option;
12766
12767 /* Set the time limit, if there is one. */
12768 tm = profile_setlimit(time_limit);
12769
12770 /* Make two search patterns: start/end (pat2, for in nested pairs) and
12771 * start/middle/end (pat3, for the top pair). */
12772 pat2 = xmalloc(STRLEN(spat)strlen((char *)(spat)) + STRLEN(epat)strlen((char *)(epat)) + 15);
12773 pat3 = xmalloc(STRLEN(spat)strlen((char *)(spat)) + STRLEN(mpat)strlen((char *)(mpat)) + STRLEN(epat)strlen((char *)(epat)) + 23);
12774 sprintf((char *)pat2, "\\(%s\\m\\)\\|\\(%s\\m\\)", spat, epat);
12775 if (*mpat == NUL'\000')
12776 STRCPY(pat3, pat2)strcpy((char *)(pat3), (char *)(pat2));
12777 else
12778 sprintf((char *)pat3, "\\(%s\\m\\)\\|\\(%s\\m\\)\\|\\(%s\\m\\)",
12779 spat, epat, mpat);
12780 if (flags & SP_START0x10)
12781 options |= SEARCH_START0x100;
12782
12783 save_cursor = curwin->w_cursor;
12784 pos = curwin->w_cursor;
12785 clearpos(&firstpos){(&firstpos)->lnum = 0; (&firstpos)->col = 0; (
&firstpos)->coladd = 0; };
12786 clearpos(&foundpos){(&foundpos)->lnum = 0; (&foundpos)->col = 0; (
&foundpos)->coladd = 0; };
12787 pat = pat3;
12788 for (;; ) {
12789 n = searchit(curwin, curbuf, &pos, dir, pat, 1L,
12790 options, RE_SEARCH0, lnum_stop, &tm);
12791 if (n == FAIL0 || (firstpos.lnum != 0 && equalpos(pos, firstpos)(((pos).lnum == (firstpos).lnum) && ((pos).col == (firstpos
).col) && ((pos).coladd == (firstpos).coladd))))
12792 /* didn't find it or found the first match again: FAIL */
12793 break;
12794
12795 if (firstpos.lnum == 0)
12796 firstpos = pos;
12797 if (equalpos(pos, foundpos)(((pos).lnum == (foundpos).lnum) && ((pos).col == (foundpos
).col) && ((pos).coladd == (foundpos).coladd))) {
12798 /* Found the same position again. Can happen with a pattern that
12799 * has "\zs" at the end and searching backwards. Advance one
12800 * character and try again. */
12801 if (dir == BACKWARD(-1))
12802 decl(&pos);
12803 else
12804 incl(&pos);
12805 }
12806 foundpos = pos;
12807
12808 /* clear the start flag to avoid getting stuck here */
12809 options &= ~SEARCH_START0x100;
12810
12811 /* If the skip pattern matches, ignore this match. */
12812 if (*skip != NUL'\000') {
12813 save_pos = curwin->w_cursor;
12814 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
12815 r = eval_to_bool(skip, &err, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
12816 curwin->w_cursor = save_pos;
12817 if (err) {
12818 /* Evaluating {skip} caused an error, break here. */
12819 curwin->w_cursor = save_cursor;
12820 retval = -1;
12821 break;
12822 }
12823 if (r)
12824 continue;
12825 }
12826
12827 if ((dir == BACKWARD(-1) && n == 3) || (dir == FORWARD1 && n == 2)) {
12828 /* Found end when searching backwards or start when searching
12829 * forward: nested pair. */
12830 ++nest;
12831 pat = pat2; /* nested, don't search for middle */
12832 } else {
12833 /* Found end when searching forward or start when searching
12834 * backward: end of (nested) pair; or found middle in outer pair. */
12835 if (--nest == 1)
12836 pat = pat3; /* outer level, search for middle */
12837 }
12838
12839 if (nest == 0) {
12840 /* Found the match: return matchcount or line number. */
12841 if (flags & SP_RETCOUNT0x04)
12842 ++retval;
12843 else
12844 retval = pos.lnum;
12845 if (flags & SP_SETPCMARK0x08)
12846 setpcmark();
12847 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
12848 if (!(flags & SP_REPEAT0x02))
12849 break;
12850 nest = 1; /* search for next unmatched */
12851 }
12852 }
12853
12854 if (match_pos != NULL((void*)0)) {
12855 /* Store the match cursor position */
12856 match_pos->lnum = curwin->w_cursor.lnum;
12857 match_pos->col = curwin->w_cursor.col + 1;
12858 }
12859
12860 /* If 'n' flag is used or search failed: restore cursor position. */
12861 if ((flags & SP_NOMOVE0x01) || retval == 0)
12862 curwin->w_cursor = save_cursor;
12863
12864 free(pat2);
12865 free(pat3);
12866 if (p_cpo == empty_option)
12867 p_cpo = save_cpo;
12868 else
12869 /* Darn, evaluating the {skip} expression changed the value. */
12870 free_string_option(save_cpo);
12871
12872 return retval;
12873}
12874
12875/*
12876 * "searchpos()" function
12877 */
12878static void f_searchpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12879{
12880 pos_T match_pos;
12881 int lnum = 0;
12882 int col = 0;
12883 int n;
12884 int flags = 0;
12885
12886 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
12887
12888 n = search_cmn(argvars, &match_pos, &flags);
12889 if (n > 0) {
12890 lnum = match_pos.lnum;
12891 col = match_pos.col;
12892 }
12893
12894 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)lnum);
12895 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)col);
12896 if (flags & SP_SUBPAT0x20)
12897 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (varnumber_T)n);
12898}
12899
12900/*
12901 * "setbufvar()" function
12902 */
12903static void f_setbufvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12904{
12905 buf_T *buf;
12906 aco_save_T aco;
12907 char_u *varname, *bufvarname;
12908 typval_T *varp;
12909 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
12910
12911 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
12912 return;
12913 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
12914 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
12915 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
12916 varp = &argvars[2];
12917
12918 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)) {
12919 /* set curbuf to be our buf, temporarily */
12920 aucmd_prepbuf(&aco, buf);
12921
12922 if (*varname == '&') {
12923 long numval;
12924 char_u *strval;
12925 int error = FALSE0;
12926
12927 ++varname;
12928 numval = get_tv_number_chk(varp, &error);
12929 strval = get_tv_string_buf_chk(varp, nbuf);
12930 if (!error && strval != NULL((void*)0))
12931 set_option_value(varname, numval, strval, OPT_LOCAL4);
12932 } else {
12933 bufvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
12934 STRCPY(bufvarname, "b:")strcpy((char *)(bufvarname), (char *)("b:"));
12935 STRCPY(bufvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(bufvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
12936 set_var(bufvarname, varp, TRUE1);
12937 free(bufvarname);
12938 }
12939
12940 /* reset notion of buffer */
12941 aucmd_restbuf(&aco);
12942 }
12943}
12944
12945/*
12946 * "setcmdpos()" function
12947 */
12948static void f_setcmdpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12949{
12950 int pos = (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) - 1;
12951
12952 if (pos >= 0)
12953 rettv->vval.v_number = set_cmdline_pos(pos);
12954}
12955
12956/*
12957 * "setline()" function
12958 */
12959static void f_setline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12960{
12961 linenr_T lnum;
12962 char_u *line = NULL((void*)0);
12963 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
12964 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
12965 long added = 0;
12966 linenr_T lcount = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
12967
12968 lnum = get_tv_lnum(&argvars[0]);
12969 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
12970 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
12971 li = l->lv_first;
12972 } else
12973 line = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
12974
12975 /* default result is zero == OK */
12976 for (;; ) {
12977 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
12978 /* list argument, get next string */
12979 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
12980 break;
12981 line = get_tv_string_chk(&li->li_tv);
12982 li = li->li_next;
12983 }
12984
12985 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* FAIL */
12986 if (line == NULL((void*)0) || lnum < 1 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count + 1)
12987 break;
12988
12989 /* When coming here from Insert mode, sync undo, so that this can be
12990 * undone separately from what was previously inserted. */
12991 if (u_sync_once == 2) {
12992 u_sync_once = 1; /* notify that u_sync() was called */
12993 u_sync(TRUE1);
12994 }
12995
12996 if (lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
12997 /* existing line, replace it */
12998 if (u_savesub(lnum) == OK1 && ml_replace(lnum, line, TRUE1) == OK1) {
12999 changed_bytes(lnum, 0);
13000 if (lnum == curwin->w_cursor.lnum)
13001 check_cursor_col();
13002 rettv->vval.v_number = 0; /* OK */
13003 }
13004 } else if (added > 0 || u_save(lnum - 1, lnum) == OK1) {
13005 /* lnum is one past the last line, append the line */
13006 ++added;
13007 if (ml_append(lnum - 1, line, (colnr_T)0, FALSE0) == OK1)
13008 rettv->vval.v_number = 0; /* OK */
13009 }
13010
13011 if (l == NULL((void*)0)) /* only one string argument */
13012 break;
13013 ++lnum;
13014 }
13015
13016 if (added > 0)
13017 appended_lines_mark(lcount, added);
13018}
13019
13020
13021/*
13022 * Used by "setqflist()" and "setloclist()" functions
13023 */
13024static void set_qf_ll_list(win_T *wp, typval_T *list_arg, typval_T *action_arg, typval_T *rettv)
13025{
13026 char_u *act;
13027 int action = ' ';
13028
13029 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
13030
13031 if (list_arg->v_type != VAR_LIST4)
13032 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
13033 else {
13034 list_T *l = list_arg->vval.v_list;
13035
13036 if (action_arg->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
13037 act = get_tv_string_chk(action_arg);
13038 if (act == NULL((void*)0))
13039 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
13040 if (*act == 'a' || *act == 'r')
13041 action = *act;
13042 }
13043
13044 if (l != NULL((void*)0) && set_errorlist(wp, l, action,
13045 (char_u *)(wp == NULL((void*)0) ? "setqflist()" : "setloclist()")) == OK1)
13046 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13047 }
13048}
13049
13050/*
13051 * "setloclist()" function
13052 */
13053static void f_setloclist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13054{
13055 win_T *win;
13056
13057 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
13058
13059 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
13060 if (win != NULL((void*)0))
13061 set_qf_ll_list(win, &argvars[1], &argvars[2], rettv);
13062}
13063
13064/*
13065 * "setmatches()" function
13066 */
13067static void f_setmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13068{
13069 list_T *l;
13070 listitem_T *li;
13071 dict_T *d;
13072
13073 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
13074 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
13075 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
13076 return;
13077 }
13078 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
13079
13080 /* To some extent make sure that we are dealing with a list from
13081 * "getmatches()". */
13082 li = l->lv_first;
13083 while (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
13084 if (li->li_tv.v_type != VAR_DICT5
13085 || (d = li->li_tv.vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0)) {
13086 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
13087 return;
13088 }
13089 if (!(dict_find(d, (char_u *)"group", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
13090 && dict_find(d, (char_u *)"pattern", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
13091 && dict_find(d, (char_u *)"priority", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
13092 && dict_find(d, (char_u *)"id", -1) != NULL((void*)0))) {
13093 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
13094 return;
13095 }
13096 li = li->li_next;
13097 }
13098
13099 clear_matches(curwin);
13100 li = l->lv_first;
13101 while (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
13102 d = li->li_tv.vval.v_dict;
13103 match_add(curwin, get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"group", FALSE0),
13104 get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"pattern", FALSE0),
13105 (int)get_dict_number(d, (char_u *)"priority"),
13106 (int)get_dict_number(d, (char_u *)"id"), NULL((void*)0));
13107 li = li->li_next;
13108 }
13109 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13110 }
13111}
13112
13113/*
13114 * "setpos()" function
13115 */
13116static void f_setpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13117{
13118 pos_T pos;
13119 int fnum;
13120 char_u *name;
13121
13122 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
13123 name = get_tv_string_chk(argvars);
13124 if (name != NULL((void*)0)) {
13125 if (list2fpos(&argvars[1], &pos, &fnum) == OK1) {
13126 if (--pos.col < 0)
13127 pos.col = 0;
13128 if (name[0] == '.' && name[1] == NUL'\000') {
13129 /* set cursor */
13130 if (fnum == curbuf->b_fnum) {
13131 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
13132 check_cursor();
13133 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13134 } else
13135 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
13136 } else if (name[0] == '\'' && name[1] != NUL'\000' && name[2] == NUL'\000') {
13137 /* set mark */
13138 if (setmark_pos(name[1], &pos, fnum) == OK1)
13139 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13140 } else
13141 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
13142 }
13143 }
13144}
13145
13146/*
13147 * "setqflist()" function
13148 */
13149static void f_setqflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13150{
13151 set_qf_ll_list(NULL((void*)0), &argvars[0], &argvars[1], rettv);
13152}
13153
13154/*
13155 * "setreg()" function
13156 */
13157static void f_setreg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13158{
13159 int regname;
13160 char_u *strregname;
13161 char_u *stropt;
13162 char_u *strval;
13163 int append;
13164 char_u yank_type;
13165 long block_len;
13166
13167 block_len = -1;
13168 yank_type = MAUTO0xff;
13169 append = FALSE0;
13170
13171 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(argvars);
13172 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* FAIL is default */
13173
13174 if (strregname == NULL((void*)0))
13175 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
13176 regname = *strregname;
13177 if (regname == 0 || regname == '@')
13178 regname = '"';
13179 else if (regname == '=')
13180 return;
13181
13182 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13183 stropt = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[2]);
13184 if (stropt == NULL((void*)0))
13185 return; /* type error */
13186 for (; *stropt != NUL'\000'; ++stropt)
13187 switch (*stropt) {
13188 case 'a': case 'A': /* append */
13189 append = TRUE1;
13190 break;
13191 case 'v': case 'c': /* character-wise selection */
13192 yank_type = MCHAR0;
13193 break;
13194 case 'V': case 'l': /* line-wise selection */
13195 yank_type = MLINE1;
13196 break;
13197 case 'b': case Ctrl_V22: /* block-wise selection */
13198 yank_type = MBLOCK2;
13199 if (VIM_ISDIGIT(stropt[1])((unsigned)(stropt[1]) - '0' < 10)) {
13200 ++stropt;
13201 block_len = getdigits(&stropt) - 1;
13202 --stropt;
13203 }
13204 break;
13205 }
13206 }
13207
13208 strval = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
13209 if (strval != NULL((void*)0))
13210 write_reg_contents_ex(regname, strval, -1,
13211 append, yank_type, block_len);
13212 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13213}
13214
13215/*
13216 * "settabvar()" function
13217 */
13218static void f_settabvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13219{
13220 tabpage_T *save_curtab;
13221 tabpage_T *tp;
13222 char_u *varname, *tabvarname;
13223 typval_T *varp;
13224
13225 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
13226
13227 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
13228 return;
13229
13230 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
13231 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
13232 varp = &argvars[2];
13233
13234 if (varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)
13235 && tp != NULL((void*)0)
13236 ) {
13237 save_curtab = curtab;
13238 goto_tabpage_tp(tp, FALSE0, FALSE0);
13239
13240 tabvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
13241 STRCPY(tabvarname, "t:")strcpy((char *)(tabvarname), (char *)("t:"));
13242 STRCPY(tabvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(tabvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
13243 set_var(tabvarname, varp, TRUE1);
13244 free(tabvarname);
13245
13246 /* Restore current tabpage */
13247 if (valid_tabpage(save_curtab))
13248 goto_tabpage_tp(save_curtab, FALSE0, FALSE0);
13249 }
13250}
13251
13252/*
13253 * "settabwinvar()" function
13254 */
13255static void f_settabwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13256{
13257 setwinvar(argvars, rettv, 1);
13258}
13259
13260/*
13261 * "setwinvar()" function
13262 */
13263static void f_setwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13264{
13265 setwinvar(argvars, rettv, 0);
13266}
13267
13268/*
13269 * "setwinvar()" and "settabwinvar()" functions
13270 */
13271
13272static void setwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int off)
13273{
13274 win_T *win;
13275 win_T *save_curwin;
13276 tabpage_T *save_curtab;
13277 char_u *varname, *winvarname;
13278 typval_T *varp;
13279 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
13280 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
13281
13282 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
13283 return;
13284
13285 if (off == 1)
13286 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
13287 else
13288 tp = curtab;
13289 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[off], tp);
13290 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[off + 1]);
13291 varp = &argvars[off + 2];
13292
13293 if (win != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)) {
13294 if (switch_win(&save_curwin, &save_curtab, win, tp, TRUE1) == FAIL0)
13295 return;
13296
13297 if (*varname == '&') {
13298 long numval;
13299 char_u *strval;
13300 int error = FALSE0;
13301
13302 ++varname;
13303 numval = get_tv_number_chk(varp, &error);
13304 strval = get_tv_string_buf_chk(varp, nbuf);
13305 if (!error && strval != NULL((void*)0))
13306 set_option_value(varname, numval, strval, OPT_LOCAL4);
13307 } else {
13308 winvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
13309 STRCPY(winvarname, "w:")strcpy((char *)(winvarname), (char *)("w:"));
13310 STRCPY(winvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(winvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
13311 set_var(winvarname, varp, TRUE1);
13312 free(winvarname);
13313 }
13314
13315 restore_win(save_curwin, save_curtab, TRUE1);
13316 }
13317}
13318
13319/// f_sha256 - sha256({string}) function
13320static void f_sha256(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13321{
13322 char_u *p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13323 const char_u *hash = sha256_bytes(p, (int) STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p)) , NULL((void*)0), 0);
13324
13325 // make a copy of the hash (sha256_bytes returns a static buffer)
13326 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) xstrdup((char *) hash);
13327 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13328}
13329
13330/*
13331 * "shellescape({string})" function
13332 */
13333static void f_shellescape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13334{
13335 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_shellescape(
13336 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), non_zero_arg(&argvars[1]), true1);
13337 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13338}
13339
13340/*
13341 * shiftwidth() function
13342 */
13343static void f_shiftwidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13344{
13345 rettv->vval.v_number = get_sw_value(curbuf);
13346}
13347
13348/*
13349 * "simplify()" function
13350 */
13351static void f_simplify(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13352{
13353 char_u *p;
13354
13355 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13356 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
13357 simplify_filename(rettv->vval.v_string); /* simplify in place */
13358 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13359}
13360
13361/*
13362 * "sin()" function
13363 */
13364static void f_sin(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13365{
13366 float_T f;
13367
13368 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
13369 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
13370 rettv->vval.v_float = sin(f);
13371 else
13372 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
13373}
13374
13375/*
13376 * "sinh()" function
13377 */
13378static void f_sinh(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13379{
13380 float_T f;
13381
13382 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
13383 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
13384 rettv->vval.v_float = sinh(f);
13385 else
13386 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
13387}
13388
13389
13390static int item_compare_ic;
13391static char_u *item_compare_func;
13392static dict_T *item_compare_selfdict;
13393static int item_compare_func_err;
13394#define ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999 999
13395
13396/*
13397 * Compare functions for f_sort() and f_uniq() below.
13398 */
13399static int item_compare(const void *s1, const void *s2)
13400{
13401 char_u *p1, *p2;
13402 char_u *tofree1, *tofree2;
13403 int res;
13404 char_u numbuf1[NUMBUFLEN30];
13405 char_u numbuf2[NUMBUFLEN30];
13406
13407 p1 = tv2string(&(*(listitem_T **)s1)->li_tv, &tofree1, numbuf1, 0);
13408 p2 = tv2string(&(*(listitem_T **)s2)->li_tv, &tofree2, numbuf2, 0);
13409 if (p1 == NULL((void*)0))
13410 p1 = (char_u *)"";
13411 if (p2 == NULL((void*)0))
13412 p2 = (char_u *)"";
13413 if (item_compare_ic)
13414 res = STRICMP(p1, p2)strcasecmp((char *)(p1), (char *)(p2));
13415 else
13416 res = STRCMP(p1, p2)strcmp((char *)(p1), (char *)(p2));
13417 free(tofree1);
13418 free(tofree2);
13419 return res;
13420}
13421
13422static int item_compare2(const void *s1, const void *s2)
13423{
13424 int res;
13425 typval_T rettv;
13426 typval_T argv[3];
13427 int dummy;
13428
13429 /* shortcut after failure in previous call; compare all items equal */
13430 if (item_compare_func_err)
13431 return 0;
13432
13433 /* copy the values. This is needed to be able to set v_lock to VAR_FIXED
13434 * in the copy without changing the original list items. */
13435 copy_tv(&(*(listitem_T **)s1)->li_tv, &argv[0]);
13436 copy_tv(&(*(listitem_T **)s2)->li_tv, &argv[1]);
13437
13438 rettv.v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0; /* clear_tv() uses this */
13439 res = call_func(item_compare_func, (int)STRLEN(item_compare_func)strlen((char *)(item_compare_func)),
13440 &rettv, 2, argv, 0L, 0L, &dummy, TRUE1,
13441 item_compare_selfdict);
13442 clear_tv(&argv[0]);
13443 clear_tv(&argv[1]);
13444
13445 if (res == FAIL0)
13446 res = ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999;
13447 else
13448 res = get_tv_number_chk(&rettv, &item_compare_func_err);
13449 if (item_compare_func_err)
13450 res = ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999; /* return value has wrong type */
13451 clear_tv(&rettv);
13452 return res;
13453}
13454
13455/*
13456 * "sort({list})" function
13457 */
13458static void do_sort_uniq(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, bool_Bool sort)
13459{
13460 list_T *l;
13461 listitem_T *li;
13462 listitem_T **ptrs;
13463 long len;
13464 long i;
13465
13466 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
13467 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), sort ? "sort()" : "uniq()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)(sort
? "sort()" : "uniq()"));
13468 } else {
13469 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
13470 if (l == NULL((void*)0) || tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock,
13471 (char_u *)(sort ? _("sort() argument")gettext((char *)("sort() argument")) : _("uniq() argument")gettext((char *)("uniq() argument"))))) {
13472 return;
13473 }
13474 rettv->vval.v_list = l;
13475 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
13476 ++l->lv_refcount;
13477
13478 len = list_len(l);
13479 if (len <= 1)
13480 return; /* short list sorts pretty quickly */
13481
13482 item_compare_ic = FALSE0;
13483 item_compare_func = NULL((void*)0);
13484 item_compare_selfdict = NULL((void*)0);
13485
13486 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13487 /* optional second argument: {func} */
13488 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_FUNC3) {
13489 item_compare_func = argvars[1].vval.v_string;
13490 } else {
13491 int error = FALSE0;
13492
13493 i = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
13494 if (error)
13495 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
13496 if (i == 1)
13497 item_compare_ic = TRUE1;
13498 else
13499 item_compare_func = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
13500 }
13501
13502 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13503 /* optional third argument: {dict} */
13504 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
13505 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
13506 return;
13507 }
13508 item_compare_selfdict = argvars[2].vval.v_dict;
13509 }
13510 }
13511
13512 /* Make an array with each entry pointing to an item in the List. */
13513 ptrs = xmalloc((size_t)(len * sizeof (listitem_T *)));
13514
13515 i = 0;
13516 if (sort) {
13517 // sort(): ptrs will be the list to sort.
13518 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
13519 ptrs[i++] = li;
13520 }
13521
13522 item_compare_func_err = FALSE0;
13523 // Test the compare function.
13524 if (item_compare_func != NULL((void*)0)
13525 && item_compare2(&ptrs[0], &ptrs[1]) == ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999) {
13526 EMSG(_("E702: Sort compare function failed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E702: Sort compare function failed"
))));
13527 } else {
13528 // Sort the array with item pointers.
13529 qsort(ptrs, (size_t)len, sizeof (listitem_T *),
13530 item_compare_func == NULL((void*)0) ? item_compare : item_compare2);
13531
13532 if (!item_compare_func_err) {
13533 // Clear the list and append the items in the sorted order.
13534 l->lv_first = NULL((void*)0);
13535 l->lv_last = NULL((void*)0);
13536 l->lv_idx_item = NULL((void*)0);
13537 l->lv_len = 0;
13538
13539 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
13540 list_append(l, ptrs[i]);
13541 }
13542 }
13543 }
13544 } else {
13545 int (*item_compare_func_ptr)(const void *, const void *);
13546
13547 // f_uniq(): ptrs will be a stack of items to remove.
13548 item_compare_func_err = FALSE0;
13549 item_compare_func_ptr = item_compare_func ? item_compare2 : item_compare;
13550
13551 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0) && li->li_next != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
13552 if (item_compare_func_ptr(&li, &li->li_next) == 0) {
13553 ptrs[i++] = li;
13554 }
13555 if (item_compare_func_err) {
13556 EMSG(_("E882: Uniq compare function failed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E882: Uniq compare function failed"
))));
13557 break;
13558 }
13559 }
13560
13561 if (!item_compare_func_err) {
13562 while (--i >= 0) {
13563 li = ptrs[i]->li_next;
13564 ptrs[i]->li_next = li->li_next;
13565 if (li->li_next != NULL((void*)0)) {
13566 li->li_next->li_prev = ptrs[i];
13567 } else {
13568 l->lv_last = ptrs[i];
13569 }
13570 list_fix_watch(l, li);
13571 listitem_free(li);
13572 l->lv_len--;
13573 }
13574 }
13575 }
13576
13577 free(ptrs);
13578 }
13579}
13580
13581/// "sort"({list})" function
13582static void f_sort(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13583{
13584 do_sort_uniq(argvars, rettv, true1);
13585}
13586
13587/// "uniq({list})" function
13588static void f_uniq(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13589{
13590 do_sort_uniq(argvars, rettv, false0);
13591}
13592
13593/*
13594 * "soundfold({word})" function
13595 */
13596static void f_soundfold(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13597{
13598 char_u *s;
13599
13600 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13601 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13602 rettv->vval.v_string = eval_soundfold(s);
13603}
13604
13605/*
13606 * "spellbadword()" function
13607 */
13608static void f_spellbadword(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13609{
13610 char_u *word = (char_u *)"";
13611 hlf_T attr = HLF_COUNT;
13612 int len = 0;
13613
13614 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
13615
13616 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13617 /* Find the start and length of the badly spelled word. */
13618 len = spell_move_to(curwin, FORWARD1, TRUE1, TRUE1, &attr);
13619 if (len != 0)
13620 word = get_cursor_pos_ptr();
13621 } else if (curwin->w_p_spellw_onebuf_opt.wo_spell && *curbuf->b_s.b_p_spl != NUL'\000') {
13622 char_u *str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
13623 int capcol = -1;
13624
13625 if (str != NULL((void*)0)) {
13626 /* Check the argument for spelling. */
13627 while (*str != NUL'\000') {
13628 len = spell_check(curwin, str, &attr, &capcol, false0);
13629 if (attr != HLF_COUNT) {
13630 word = str;
13631 break;
13632 }
13633 str += len;
13634 }
13635 }
13636 }
13637
13638 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, word, len);
13639 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, (char_u *)(
13640 attr == HLF_SPB ? "bad" :
13641 attr == HLF_SPR ? "rare" :
13642 attr == HLF_SPL ? "local" :
13643 attr == HLF_SPC ? "caps" :
13644 ""), -1);
13645}
13646
13647/*
13648 * "spellsuggest()" function
13649 */
13650static void f_spellsuggest(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13651{
13652 char_u *str;
13653 int typeerr = FALSE0;
13654 int maxcount;
13655 garray_T ga;
13656 listitem_T *li;
13657 bool_Bool need_capital = false0;
13658
13659 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
13660
13661 if (curwin->w_p_spellw_onebuf_opt.wo_spell && *curwin->w_s->b_p_spl != NUL'\000') {
13662 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13663 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13664 maxcount = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &typeerr);
13665 if (maxcount <= 0)
13666 return;
13667 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13668 need_capital = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &typeerr);
13669 if (typeerr)
13670 return;
13671 }
13672 } else
13673 maxcount = 25;
13674
13675 spell_suggest_list(&ga, str, maxcount, need_capital, false0);
13676
13677 for (int i = 0; i < ga.ga_len; ++i) {
13678 str = ((char_u **)ga.ga_data)[i];
13679
13680 li = listitem_alloc();
13681 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13682 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
13683 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = str;
13684 list_append(rettv->vval.v_list, li);
13685 }
13686 ga_clear(&ga);
13687 }
13688}
13689
13690static void f_split(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13691{
13692 char_u *str;
13693 char_u *end;
13694 char_u *pat = NULL((void*)0);
13695 regmatch_T regmatch;
13696 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
13697 char_u *save_cpo;
13698 int match;
13699 colnr_T col = 0;
13700 int keepempty = FALSE0;
13701 int typeerr = FALSE0;
13702
13703 /* Make 'cpoptions' empty, the 'l' flag should not be used here. */
13704 save_cpo = p_cpo;
13705 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
13706
13707 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13708 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13709 pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
13710 if (pat == NULL((void*)0))
13711 typeerr = TRUE1;
13712 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
13713 keepempty = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &typeerr);
13714 }
13715 if (pat == NULL((void*)0) || *pat == NUL'\000')
13716 pat = (char_u *)"[\\x01- ]\\+";
13717
13718 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
13719
13720 if (typeerr)
13721 return;
13722
13723 regmatch.regprog = vim_regcomp(pat, RE_MAGIC1 + RE_STRING2);
13724 if (regmatch.regprog != NULL((void*)0)) {
13725 regmatch.rm_ic = FALSE0;
13726 while (*str != NUL'\000' || keepempty) {
13727 if (*str == NUL'\000')
13728 match = FALSE0; /* empty item at the end */
13729 else
13730 match = vim_regexec_nl(&regmatch, str, col);
13731 if (match)
13732 end = regmatch.startp[0];
13733 else
13734 end = str + STRLEN(str)strlen((char *)(str));
13735 if (keepempty || end > str || (rettv->vval.v_list->lv_len > 0
13736 && *str != NUL'\000' && match && end <
13737 regmatch.endp[0])) {
13738 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, str, (int)(end - str));
13739 }
13740 if (!match)
13741 break;
13742 /* Advance to just after the match. */
13743 if (regmatch.endp[0] > str)
13744 col = 0;
13745 else {
13746 /* Don't get stuck at the same match. */
13747 col = (*mb_ptr2len)(regmatch.endp[0]);
13748 }
13749 str = regmatch.endp[0];
13750 }
13751
13752 vim_regfree(regmatch.regprog);
13753 }
13754
13755 p_cpo = save_cpo;
13756}
13757
13758/*
13759 * "sqrt()" function
13760 */
13761static void f_sqrt(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13762{
13763 float_T f;
13764
13765 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
13766 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1)
13767 rettv->vval.v_float = sqrt(f);
13768 else
13769 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
13770}
13771
13772/*
13773 * "str2float()" function
13774 */
13775static void f_str2float(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13776{
13777 char_u *p = skipwhite(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
13778
13779 if (*p == '+')
13780 p = skipwhite(p + 1);
13781 (void)string2float(p, &rettv->vval.v_float);
13782 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
13783}
13784
13785/*
13786 * "str2nr()" function
13787 */
13788static void f_str2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13789{
13790 int base = 10;
13791 char_u *p;
13792 long n;
13793
13794 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13795 base = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
13796 if (base != 8 && base != 10 && base != 16) {
13797 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
13798 return;
13799 }
13800 }
13801
13802 p = skipwhite(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
13803 if (*p == '+')
13804 p = skipwhite(p + 1);
13805 vim_str2nr(p, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), base == 8 ? 2 : 0, base == 16 ? 2 : 0, &n, NULL((void*)0));
13806 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
13807}
13808
13809/*
13810 * "strftime({format}[, {time}])" function
13811 */
13812static void f_strftime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13813{
13814 char_u result_buf[256];
13815 time_t seconds;
13816 char_u *p;
13817
13818 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13819
13820 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13821 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
13822 seconds = time(NULL((void*)0));
13823 else
13824 seconds = (time_t)get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
13825
13826 struct tm curtime;
13827 struct tm *curtime_ptr = os_localtime_r(&seconds, &curtime);
13828 /* MSVC returns NULL for an invalid value of seconds. */
13829 if (curtime_ptr == NULL((void*)0))
13830 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave((char_u *)_("(Invalid)")gettext((char *)("(Invalid)")));
13831 else {
13832 vimconv_T conv;
13833 char_u *enc;
13834
13835 conv.vc_type = CONV_NONE0;
13836 enc = enc_locale();
13837 convert_setup(&conv, p_enc, enc);
13838 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
13839 p = string_convert(&conv, p, NULL((void*)0));
13840 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
13841 (void)strftime((char *)result_buf, sizeof(result_buf),
13842 (char *)p, curtime_ptr);
13843 else
13844 result_buf[0] = NUL'\000';
13845
13846 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
13847 free(p);
13848 convert_setup(&conv, enc, p_enc);
13849 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
13850 rettv->vval.v_string = string_convert(&conv, result_buf, NULL((void*)0));
13851 else
13852 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(result_buf);
13853
13854 /* Release conversion descriptors */
13855 convert_setup(&conv, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
13856 free(enc);
13857 }
13858}
13859
13860/*
13861 * "stridx()" function
13862 */
13863static void f_stridx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13864{
13865 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
13866 char_u *needle;
13867 char_u *haystack;
13868 char_u *save_haystack;
13869 char_u *pos;
13870 int start_idx;
13871
13872 needle = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
13873 save_haystack = haystack = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
13874 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
13875 if (needle == NULL((void*)0) || haystack == NULL((void*)0))
13876 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
13877
13878 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
13879 int error = FALSE0;
13880
13881 start_idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
13882 if (error || start_idx >= (int)STRLEN(haystack)strlen((char *)(haystack)))
13883 return;
13884 if (start_idx >= 0)
13885 haystack += start_idx;
13886 }
13887
13888 pos = (char_u *)strstr((char *)haystack, (char *)needle);
13889 if (pos != NULL((void*)0))
13890 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(pos - save_haystack);
13891}
13892
13893/*
13894 * "string()" function
13895 */
13896static void f_string(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13897{
13898 char_u *tofree;
13899 char_u numbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
13900
13901 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13902 rettv->vval.v_string = tv2string(&argvars[0], &tofree, numbuf, 0);
13903 /* Make a copy if we have a value but it's not in allocated memory. */
13904 if (rettv->vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0) && tofree == NULL((void*)0))
13905 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(rettv->vval.v_string);
13906}
13907
13908/*
13909 * "strlen()" function
13910 */
13911static void f_strlen(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13912{
13913 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(STRLEN(strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])))
13914 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))));
13915}
13916
13917/*
13918 * "strchars()" function
13919 */
13920static void f_strchars(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13921{
13922 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13923 varnumber_T len = 0;
13924
13925 while (*s != NUL'\000') {
13926 mb_cptr2char_adv(&s);
13927 ++len;
13928 }
13929 rettv->vval.v_number = len;
13930}
13931
13932/*
13933 * "strdisplaywidth()" function
13934 */
13935static void f_strdisplaywidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13936{
13937 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13938 int col = 0;
13939
13940 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
13941 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
13942
13943 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(linetabsize_col(col, s) - col);
13944}
13945
13946/*
13947 * "strwidth()" function
13948 */
13949static void f_strwidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13950{
13951 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13952
13953 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T) mb_string2cells(s);
13954}
13955
13956/*
13957 * "strpart()" function
13958 */
13959static void f_strpart(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
13960{
13961 char_u *p;
13962 int n;
13963 int len;
13964 int slen;
13965 int error = FALSE0;
13966
13967 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
13968 slen = (int)STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p));
13969
13970 n = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
13971 if (error)
13972 len = 0;
13973 else if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
13974 len = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
13975 else
13976 len = slen - n; /* default len: all bytes that are available. */
13977
13978 /*
13979 * Only return the overlap between the specified part and the actual
13980 * string.
13981 */
13982 if (n < 0) {
13983 len += n;
13984 n = 0;
13985 } else if (n > slen)
13986 n = slen;
13987 if (len < 0)
13988 len = 0;
13989 else if (n + len > slen)
13990 len = slen - n;
13991
13992 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
13993 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(p + n, len);
13994}
13995
13996/*
13997 * "strridx()" function
13998 */
13999static void f_strridx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14000{
14001 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14002 char_u *needle;
14003 char_u *haystack;
14004 char_u *rest;
14005 char_u *lastmatch = NULL((void*)0);
14006 int haystack_len, end_idx;
14007
14008 needle = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
14009 haystack = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
14010
14011 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
14012 if (needle == NULL((void*)0) || haystack == NULL((void*)0))
14013 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
14014
14015 haystack_len = (int)STRLEN(haystack)strlen((char *)(haystack));
14016 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
14017 /* Third argument: upper limit for index */
14018 end_idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
14019 if (end_idx < 0)
14020 return; /* can never find a match */
14021 } else
14022 end_idx = haystack_len;
14023
14024 if (*needle == NUL'\000') {
14025 /* Empty string matches past the end. */
14026 lastmatch = haystack + end_idx;
14027 } else {
14028 for (rest = haystack; *rest != NUL'\000'; ++rest) {
14029 rest = (char_u *)strstr((char *)rest, (char *)needle);
14030 if (rest == NULL((void*)0) || rest > haystack + end_idx)
14031 break;
14032 lastmatch = rest;
14033 }
14034 }
14035
14036 if (lastmatch == NULL((void*)0))
14037 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
14038 else
14039 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(lastmatch - haystack);
14040}
14041
14042/*
14043 * "strtrans()" function
14044 */
14045static void f_strtrans(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14046{
14047 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14048 rettv->vval.v_string = transstr(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
14049}
14050
14051/*
14052 * "submatch()" function
14053 */
14054static void f_submatch(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14055{
14056 int error = FALSE0;
14057 int no = (int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error);
14058 if (error) {
14059 return;
14060 }
14061
14062 int retList = 0;
14063
14064 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
14065 retList = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
14066 if (error) {
14067 return;
14068 }
14069 }
14070
14071 if (retList == 0) {
14072 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14073 rettv->vval.v_string = reg_submatch(no);
14074 } else {
14075 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
14076 rettv->vval.v_list = reg_submatch_list(no);
14077 }
14078}
14079
14080/*
14081 * "substitute()" function
14082 */
14083static void f_substitute(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14084{
14085 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14086 char_u subbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14087 char_u flagsbuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14088
14089 char_u *str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
14090 char_u *pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
14091 char_u *sub = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], subbuf);
14092 char_u *flg = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[3], flagsbuf);
14093
14094 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14095 if (str == NULL((void*)0) || pat == NULL((void*)0) || sub == NULL((void*)0) || flg == NULL((void*)0))
14096 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
14097 else
14098 rettv->vval.v_string = do_string_sub(str, pat, sub, flg);
14099}
14100
14101/*
14102 * "synID(lnum, col, trans)" function
14103 */
14104static void f_synID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14105{
14106 int id = 0;
14107 long lnum;
14108 long col;
14109 int trans;
14110 int transerr = FALSE0;
14111
14112 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
14113 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
14114 trans = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &transerr);
14115
14116 if (!transerr && lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
14117 && col >= 0 && col < (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum))))
14118 id = syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, (colnr_T)col, trans, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
14119
14120 rettv->vval.v_number = id;
14121}
14122
14123/*
14124 * "synIDattr(id, what [, mode])" function
14125 */
14126static void f_synIDattr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14127{
14128 char_u *p = NULL((void*)0);
14129 int id;
14130 char_u *what;
14131 char_u *mode;
14132 char_u modebuf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14133 int modec;
14134
14135 id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
14136 what = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
14137 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
14138 mode = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], modebuf);
14139 modec = TOLOWER_ASC(mode[0])(((mode[0]) < 'A' || (mode[0]) > 'Z') ? (mode[0]) : (mode
[0]) + ('a' - 'A'));
14140 if (modec != 't' && modec != 'c' && modec != 'g')
14141 modec = 0; /* replace invalid with current */
14142 } else {
14143 if (t_colors > 1)
14144 modec = 'c';
14145 else
14146 modec = 't';
14147 }
14148
14149
14150 switch (TOLOWER_ASC(what[0])(((what[0]) < 'A' || (what[0]) > 'Z') ? (what[0]) : (what
[0]) + ('a' - 'A'))) {
14151 case 'b':
14152 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'g') /* bg[#] */
14153 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
14154 else /* bold */
14155 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_BOLD0x02, modec);
14156 break;
14157
14158 case 'f': /* fg[#] or font */
14159 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
14160 break;
14161
14162 case 'i':
14163 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'n') /* inverse */
14164 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_INVERSE0x01, modec);
14165 else /* italic */
14166 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_ITALIC0x04, modec);
14167 break;
14168
14169 case 'n': /* name */
14170 p = get_highlight_name(NULL((void*)0), id - 1);
14171 break;
14172
14173 case 'r': /* reverse */
14174 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_INVERSE0x01, modec);
14175 break;
14176
14177 case 's':
14178 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'p') /* sp[#] */
14179 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
14180 else /* standout */
14181 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_STANDOUT0x20, modec);
14182 break;
14183
14184 case 'u':
14185 if (STRLEN(what)strlen((char *)(what)) <= 5 || TOLOWER_ASC(what[5])(((what[5]) < 'A' || (what[5]) > 'Z') ? (what[5]) : (what
[5]) + ('a' - 'A')) != 'c')
14186 /* underline */
14187 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_UNDERLINE0x08, modec);
14188 else
14189 /* undercurl */
14190 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_UNDERCURL0x10, modec);
14191 break;
14192 }
14193
14194 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
14195 p = vim_strsave(p);
14196 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14197 rettv->vval.v_string = p;
14198}
14199
14200/*
14201 * "synIDtrans(id)" function
14202 */
14203static void f_synIDtrans(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14204{
14205 int id;
14206
14207 id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
14208
14209 if (id > 0)
14210 id = syn_get_final_id(id);
14211 else
14212 id = 0;
14213
14214 rettv->vval.v_number = id;
14215}
14216
14217/*
14218 * "synconcealed(lnum, col)" function
14219 */
14220static void f_synconcealed(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14221{
14222 long lnum;
14223 long col;
14224 int syntax_flags = 0;
14225 int cchar;
14226 int matchid = 0;
14227 char_u str[NUMBUFLEN30];
14228
14229 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
14230 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
14231
14232 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
14233 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
14234
14235 memset(str, NUL'\000', sizeof(str));
14236
14237 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
14238 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count && col >= 0
14239 && col <= (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum))) && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole > 0) {
14240 (void)syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, col, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
14241 syntax_flags = get_syntax_info(&matchid);
14242
14243 // get the conceal character
14244 if ((syntax_flags & HL_CONCEAL0x20000) && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole < 3) {
14245 cchar = syn_get_sub_char();
14246 if (cchar == NUL'\000' && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole == 1 && lcs_conceal != NUL'\000') {
14247 cchar = lcs_conceal;
14248 }
14249 if (cchar != NUL'\000') {
14250 if (has_mbyte)
14251 (*mb_char2bytes)(cchar, str);
14252 else
14253 str[0] = cchar;
14254 }
14255 }
14256 }
14257
14258 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (syntax_flags & HL_CONCEAL0x20000) != 0);
14259 // -1 to auto-determine strlen
14260 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, str, -1);
14261 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, matchid);
14262}
14263
14264/*
14265 * "synstack(lnum, col)" function
14266 */
14267static void f_synstack(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14268{
14269 long lnum;
14270 long col;
14271
14272 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
14273 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
14274
14275 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
14276 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
14277
14278 if (lnum >= 1
14279 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
14280 && col >= 0
14281 && col <= (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum)))) {
14282 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
14283 (void)syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, (colnr_T)col, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1);
14284
14285 int id;
14286 int i = 0;
14287 while ((id = syn_get_stack_item(i++)) >= 0) {
14288 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, id);
14289 }
14290 }
14291}
14292
14293/// f_system - the VimL system() function
14294static void f_system(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14295{
14296 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14297 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
14298
14299 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
14300 return;
14301 }
14302
14303 // get input to the shell command (if any), and its length
14304 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN30];
14305 const char *input = (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
14306 ? (char *) get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf): NULL((void*)0);
14307 size_t input_len = input ? strlen(input) : 0;
14308
14309 // get shell command to execute
14310 const char *cmd = (char *) get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
14311
14312 // execute the command
14313 size_t nread = 0;
14314 char *res = NULL((void*)0);
14315 int status = os_system(cmd, input, input_len, &res, &nread);
14316
14317 set_vim_var_nr(VV_SHELL_ERROR, (long) status);
14318
14319#ifdef USE_CRNL
14320 // translate <CR><NL> into <NL>
14321 if (res != NULL((void*)0)) {
14322 char *d = res;
14323 for (char *s = res; *s; ++s) {
14324 if (s[0] == CAR'\015' && s[1] == NL'\012') {
14325 ++s;
14326 }
14327
14328 *d++ = *s;
14329 }
14330
14331 *d = NUL'\000';
14332 }
14333#endif
14334
14335 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) res;
14336}
14337
14338/*
14339 * "tabpagebuflist()" function
14340 */
14341static void f_tabpagebuflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14342{
14343 tabpage_T *tp;
14344 win_T *wp = NULL((void*)0);
14345
14346 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
14347 wp = firstwin;
14348 else {
14349 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]));
14350 if (tp != NULL((void*)0))
14351 wp = (tp == curtab) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
14352 }
14353 if (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
14354 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
14355 while (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
14356 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, wp->w_buffer->b_fnum);
14357 wp = wp->w_next;
14358 }
14359 }
14360}
14361
14362
14363/*
14364 * "tabpagenr()" function
14365 */
14366static void f_tabpagenr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14367{
14368 int nr = 1;
14369 char_u *arg;
14370
14371 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
14372 arg = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
14373 nr = 0;
14374 if (arg != NULL((void*)0)) {
14375 if (STRCMP(arg, "$")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("$")) == 0)
14376 nr = tabpage_index(NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
14377 else
14378 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(arg
));
14379 }
14380 } else
14381 nr = tabpage_index(curtab);
14382 rettv->vval.v_number = nr;
14383}
14384
14385
14386
14387/*
14388 * Common code for tabpagewinnr() and winnr().
14389 */
14390static int get_winnr(tabpage_T *tp, typval_T *argvar)
14391{
14392 win_T *twin;
14393 int nr = 1;
14394 win_T *wp;
14395 char_u *arg;
14396
14397 twin = (tp == curtab) ? curwin : tp->tp_curwin;
14398 if (argvar->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
14399 arg = get_tv_string_chk(argvar);
14400 if (arg == NULL((void*)0))
14401 nr = 0; /* type error; errmsg already given */
14402 else if (STRCMP(arg, "$")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("$")) == 0)
14403 twin = (tp == curtab) ? lastwin : tp->tp_lastwin;
14404 else if (STRCMP(arg, "#")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("#")) == 0) {
14405 twin = (tp == curtab) ? prevwin : tp->tp_prevwin;
14406 if (twin == NULL((void*)0))
14407 nr = 0;
14408 } else {
14409 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(arg
));
14410 nr = 0;
14411 }
14412 }
14413
14414 if (nr > 0)
14415 for (wp = (tp == curtab) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
14416 wp != twin; wp = wp->w_next) {
14417 if (wp == NULL((void*)0)) {
14418 /* didn't find it in this tabpage */
14419 nr = 0;
14420 break;
14421 }
14422 ++nr;
14423 }
14424 return nr;
14425}
14426
14427/*
14428 * "tabpagewinnr()" function
14429 */
14430static void f_tabpagewinnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14431{
14432 int nr = 1;
14433 tabpage_T *tp;
14434
14435 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]));
14436 if (tp == NULL((void*)0))
14437 nr = 0;
14438 else
14439 nr = get_winnr(tp, &argvars[1]);
14440 rettv->vval.v_number = nr;
14441}
14442
14443
14444/*
14445 * "tagfiles()" function
14446 */
14447static void f_tagfiles(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14448{
14449 char_u *fname;
14450 tagname_T tn;
14451
14452 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
14453 fname = xmalloc(MAXPATHL4096);
14454
14455 int first = TRUE1;
14456 while (get_tagfname(&tn, first, fname) == OK1) {
14457 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, fname, -1);
14458 first = FALSE0;
14459 }
14460
14461 tagname_free(&tn);
14462 free(fname);
14463}
14464
14465/*
14466 * "taglist()" function
14467 */
14468static void f_taglist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
14469{
14470 char_u *tag_pattern;
14471
14472 tag_pattern = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
14473
14474 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
14475 if (*tag_pattern == NUL'\000')
14476 return;
14477
14478 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
14479 (void)get_tags(rettv->vval.v_list, tag_pattern);
14480}

14483 * "tempname()" function
14484 */

14486{
14487 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
14488 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_tempname();
14489}
